1.name: Burning Brazier of Elf

description: When the hero's HP falls below 25%, recover 30% of max HP and dispel all negative effects. Activates 1 time only.
When the hero's HP falls below 25%, recover 36% of max HP and dispel all negative effects. Activates 1 time only.

30.name: Tarot Card of Loss
description: Reduces Crit Chance by 150 and increases ATK by 30%.
Reduces Crit Chance by 180 and increases ATK by 36%.

Every 10 sec, target a single enemy. Said enemy takes DMG that ignores DEF equal to 2.4% of current HP each second for 5 sec, and reduces Mana by 240. This skill is effective only in the Arena.
Every 10 sec, target a single enemy. Said enemy takes DMG that ignores DEF equal to 2.9% of current HP each second for 5 sec, and reduces Mana by 290. This skill is effective only in the Arena.

34.name: Mask of Draconic

44.story: A blazing tail of Velkazar, the Hellspawn Torturer. It looks like a serpent shrouded in flame.

59.story: This delicacy of Orvel is a must for anyone who can't stand the blazing summer heat. One sip of it brings down the heat, another makes the heat go away.

60.story: A brilliant necklace befitting Moon Rabbit LuLu. It is made from the refined fragments of a full moon. The magical power of the full moon seeps into the wearer's entire body the moment it is worn.

1.name: Kasel
1.subtitle: Warrior of the Holy Sword
1.description: The Chosen Warrior of the Holy Sword Aea, the sword that saved the world once before. He can push back enemies and enhance himself with the power of this holy sword.
1.story: A squire of the Kingdom of Orvelia. Traumatized by witnessing the deaths of his parents at the hands of the Demons invading the village, and later, the assassination of his sword teacher, he fears the idea of anyone around him dying. His past has driven him to seek out his sworn brother from his early years in the orphanage, Clause, who joined an expedition, but never returned.

inn.idle: Is it ok to rest...even if rest is needed...

recruit.greet: It's been a while. How are you?
talk: I hope the world becomes peaceful soon.
This sword...is heavy.
I don't believe in fate.
recruit.gift: Thank you. This will help end the battle quickly.

affinity.greet: I'm seeing you around quite often. Are you getting to the capital now?
talk: Will all this end once I find the power of the Holy Sword?
I don't want to be swayed by anyone else. I'll go my own way.
affinity.gift: A gift for an unpopular man like myself... Thank you.

relationship.greet: I am always thankful for your help.
talk: It would be a lie to say it isn't difficult, but that's life, I guess.
Thank you for sharing my burden. Really.
There is no such thing as a perfect life. Well, there are some perfect moments, though. Haha...

uw.name: The Holy Sword, Aea
description: Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 160% of ATK as P.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 192% of ATK as P.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 230% of ATK as P.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 276% of ATK as P.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 331% of ATK as P.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 400% of ATK as P.DMG.
uw.story: A legendary Holy Sword given to the world by Lua. This legendary artifact materialized 100 years ago when the Demons invaded the Orbis Continent through the Dimensional Gate. According to the legend, the Hero King Kyle used this sword to pierce the heart of the Dark Lord Angmund and brought an end to the war. However, the two simply vanished, and only Aea remained.

s1.name: Judgement Blade
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG 2 times to frontal enemies in a circle and knocks them down for {1} sec.
s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Ignores DEF when there is only 1 enemy.

s2.name: Valiant Dash
s2.description: Attacks the target 3 times, and then charges behind them to deal {0} P.DMG.
s2.dark: Target takes 25% increased P.DMG.

ut.name: Emperor's Gauntlet
description: [Valiant Dash] Increases DMG by 20% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Valiant Dash] Increases DMG by 24% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Valiant Dash] Increases DMG by 29% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.

[Valiant Dash] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
ut.story: Gauntlet imbued with the blessing of Lua, the Goddess of Light. Gauntlet passed down to the kings of the Orbis Continent. Contains the encouragement of the goddess that allows you to use Valiant Dash towards enemies without any fear.

s3.name: Proxy of God
s3.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to nearby enemies and inflicts Stun for 3 sec. Additionally, for {1} sec, ATK is increased by {2} and Dodge Rate is increased by {3} , while gaining immunity to CC. This status cannot be dispelled.

books.2: Increases Spd by {0} for the duration of skill.

s3.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s3.dark: ATK boost is increased by 40%.

ut.name: Proxy's Insignia
description: [Proxy of God] Additionally, Dodge Rate is increased by 250, and ATK Spd is increased by 100 for the duration of skill.
[Proxy of God] Additionally, Dodge Rate is increased by 250, and ATK Spd is increased by 120 for the duration of skill.
[Proxy of God] Additionally, Dodge Rate is increased by 250, and ATK Spd is increased by 140 for the duration of skill.
[Proxy of God] Additionally, Dodge Rate is increased by 250, and ATK Spd is increased by 170 for the duration of skill.
[Proxy of God] Additionally, Dodge Rate is increased by 250, and ATK Spd is increased by 210 for the duration of skill.
[Proxy of God] Additionally, Dodge Rate is increased by 250, and ATK Spd is increased by 250 for the duration of skill.
ut.story: A rune that proves that one is an agent of Lua, the Goddess of Light. The Rune of Proxy is an artifact of the Church of Lua, and it's given to the knight who wields the Aea, the Sword of Light. The Rune of Proxy pushes enemies with the power of light and increases ATK and morale.

s4.name: Goddess Strike
s4.description: Upon dodging, deals {0} P.DMG to frontal enemies in range, and reduces their ACC by {1} for 5 sec. After hitting the target, recovers 300 mana.
s4.light: ACC reduction rate is changed to 250.
s4.dark: Casting is boosted and Cooldown is reduced by 1 sec.

t5.dark: Upon attacking, attack 1 extra time dealing 40% of ATK as DMG.

2.name: Frey
2.subtitle: Priestess of Light
2.description: A childhood friend of Kasel's, she is a priestess who serves the Goddess. She heals and protects allies with the power of light. With the blessings of the Goddess, she can temporarily increase one's magic powers and resistance.
2.story: An apprentice priestess serving the Goddess Lua, the church has high expectations of her as a future priestess. From the early years of her training, she has amazed even the high priests with her strong faith and natural talent for channeling Lua's power. She herself considers priesthood her destined path, and her kind heart reflects her resolve. However, she shows no mercy toward evildoers.

inn.idle: Goddess Lua, whom within the Light resides - let our faith never waver.

recruit.greet: May Lua's blessing be with you.
talk: My relationship with Kasel? Haha, we're like family. I guess I'm like his guardian?
I wonder how High Priestess Iris is doing. I haven't seen her ever since I left...
Haha, don't Roi and Cleo make a nice couple?
recruit.gift: Wow, thank you.

affinity.greet: There you are. You didn't get hurt, did you?
talk: I see a bright light in my dreams sometimes. People with white wings with a brilliant sun behind them...
Who I like? Th-that's a secret between me and Lua.
affinity.gift: Thank you. I won't forget your thoughtfulness.

relationship.greet: I sincerely pray that Lua watches over you.
talk: Kasel's safety is important. He was chosen by the Goddess, after all.
All decisions can be met with disdain. I do not mind, as long as the Goddess is happy with it.
The relationship between God and priests is not so different from a relationship between simple people. Sometimes...we disagree.

uw.name: God's Authority, Rosmerta
description: Each auto attack has a 40% chance of healing the ally with the lowest HP by 42% of ATK.
Each auto attack has a 40% chance of healing the ally with the lowest HP by 50.4% of ATK.
Each auto attack has a 40% chance of healing the ally with the lowest HP by 58.8% of ATK.
Each auto attack has a 40% chance of healing the ally with the lowest HP by 71.4% of ATK.
Each auto attack has a 40% chance of healing the ally with the lowest HP by 86.1% of ATK.
Each auto attack has a 40% chance of healing the ally with the lowest HP by 105% of ATK.
uw.story: The Angels are said to be closer to Lua than any other race. When a high ranking angel dies, the remaining core is transferred to the haven of angels for resurrection. However, one such angel, Rosmerta, bestowed her core to the Church of Lua. This holy staff has been created from the core's divine energy.

s1.name: Miraculous Light
s1.description: Heals {0} HP of an ally with the lowest HP.

s1.dark: Healed allies take 25% reduced M.DMG for 10 sec.

books.2: Target's Heal rate is increased by {0}% for the duration of skill.

s2.dark: Shielded allies gain 20% ATK.

[Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 120 Mana every second for 4 sec.

[Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 250 Mana every second for 4 sec.
ut.story: Medal made by the saintess of miracles, Yvonne, with the revelation of the goddess. The Medal of Miracles is a sacred artifact that contains the magic of light. It is said that saintess Yvonne saved the city that was invaded by the demons with the blessing of light that was boosted with this medal.

s3.name: Heaven's Vengeance
s3.description: Attacks the target and the enemies near it 6 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG and blinding them for {1} sec.
s3.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, DMG is increased by 80%.
s3.dark: Blind duration is reduced by 2 sec and now targets a random enemy.

ut.name: Forgotten Arbiter's Feather
description: [Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 1 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 1.5 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 2 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 2.5 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 3 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 3.5 sec.
ut.story: Feather from the Guardian of the Sun. Feather of an Angel who saved the people by fighting against the Demons in the past. He left his feather as proof of his promise to return once again if the world falls into chaos. An artifact of the Church of Lua that summons holy rays of the sun to blind the enemy.

s4.name: Goddess Grace
s4.description: Increases M.DEF of 1 ally with the lowest HP by {1} for {0} sec every 15 sec.

books.2: Heals target's HP by {0}% for the duration of skill.

s4.light: Target's ATK Spd. is boosted by 250.
s4.dark: Number of targets changes to 2.

t5.dark: Allies healed by Frey receive 5% of her ATK as an ATK buff for 5 sec.

3.name: Cleo
3.subtitle: Sorceress of Purgatory
3.description: A sorceress from the Red Tower, this brave girl uses explosive fire magic to deal damage to multiple enemies, and then inflicts even greater damage by causing the embers to explode.
3.story: Cleo's earliest memory begins at the Tower of Sage. Raised by Dominiks the Great Sage as an orphan, she is both a genius wizard and a troublemaker. Her inability to control her own power has often led to trouble, including partial destruction of the Red Tower, her own residence. Despite this, her apparent immunity to the wrath of the Great Sage has caused her to be ostracized from her peers. Although this has led her to become selfish and inconsiderate, deep inside, she is still a kindhearted girl who fears abandonment by others.

inn.idle: Ah~ so bored. I wish there were some fun magic tools lying around.

recruit.greet: Hello! I'm Cleo. An Archmage!
talk: Want some meat? I can cook it for you?
Curious about fire magic? Hehehe, I could teach you, but not anyone can do it.
Why do people call me the Sorceress of Purgatory? I don't like it. Call me an Archmage!!
recruit.gift: Heh, I like you.

affinity.greet: You're late! How dare you make the Archmage wait!?
talk: Who do I like more, between Frey and Roi? Does that question even make sense? Of course, Frey!
I wonder where my mom is... As long as I'm alive, I should be able to meet her, right?
affinity.gift: Oh! I think it will fit the Archmage! Thank you!

relationship.greet: Oho, so you've come to see the best Archmage ever!
talk: Frey is more than a pillow to me!
Don't forget. It's thanks to me that we can get around so fast.
You'll stick around with us, right?

uw.name: Primal Flame, Flenos
description: Embers explode every 4 sec, dealing 80% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies nearby.
Embers explode every 4 sec, dealing 96% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies nearby.
Embers explode every 4 sec, dealing 114% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies nearby.
Embers explode every 4 sec, dealing 138% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies nearby.
Embers explode every 4 sec, dealing 166% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies nearby.
Embers explode every 4 sec, dealing 200% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies nearby.
uw.story: The essence of the First Flame of the world. The Fire Elemental Lord bestowed this beautiful gem to a human who entered into a contract with him. Over the ages, it ended up in the hands of an archmage, who turned it into the core of his staff. Later, the archmage presented this staff to his precious disciple.

s1.name: Fire Needle
s1.description: Attacks a random enemy 5 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG and inflicting 1 stack of Ember on the hit enemy.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Stacks 2 Embers each.

s2.name: Fire Ball
s2.description: Attacks the target and the enemies near it, dealing {0} M.DMG and stunning them for 2 sec. Deals {2} additional M.DMG for each stack of Ember on the enemy.
s2.dark: Mana cost is increased by 1, and attacks a random target 2 times.

ut.name: Flamel's Elixir
description: [Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 20% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.
[Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 24% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.
[Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 29% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.
[Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 35% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.
[Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 42% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.
[Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 50% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.
ut.story: An elixir that fire alchemist Flamel created by condensing flame essence. Flamel's flames continue to burn and burn. Every wizard praises him for his flames, and the flame essence that he made with the salamanders from the Dragia Volcano maximizes the effect of Fire Ball.

s3.name: Fire Rain
s3.description: Attacks all enemies 8 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG and inflicting 1 stack of Ember on them. Deals {1} additional M.DMG for each stack of Ember on the enemy.
s3.light: Cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
s3.dark: Stuns enemies with 5 Embers or more for 1 sec.

ut.name: Tome of Purgatory
description: [Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 20%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.
[Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 24%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.
[Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 29%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.
[Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 35%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.
[Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 42%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.
[Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 50%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.
ut.story: A scroll written by a fire sorceress who was known as the Goddess of Fire. A scroll left by the greatest Fire Sorceress of Orvelia, Vesta, when she was in the Tower of Sage. It's very powerful, but it also requires a lot of mana. Cleo took the Scroll of Burning Hell from the Tower of Sage, which was considered a forbidden scroll. Now she's using it to enhance her Fire Rain.

s4.name: Flame Diffusion
s4.description: Normal attacks get a 20% chance to attack 3 random enemies, dealing {0} M.DMG to the target and enemies near it and inflicting 1 stack of Ember. Ember deals a total of {1} M.DMG over 20 sec, reduces the target's M.DEF by 5%, and stacks up to max 5 times.
s4.light: Ember stack maximum is changed to 6.
s4.dark: Activation chance changes to 30%.

t5.dark: Ember DMG is increased by 200%.

4.name: Roi
4.subtitle: Swift Assassin
4.description: He is a former assassin with a hidden past. He specializes in single targets, launching strong, endless attacks on enemies while dashing around their blind spots.
4.story: He is Cleo's escort and is protecting her at Dominiks's request. A former member of a group of assassins, he risked his life and went rogue for some unknown reason. Having lived as an assassin, he rarely shows much respect toward others, but his hardships have made him an experienced and shrewd man who treats those who help him with fairness.

recruit.greet: What is it.
talk: I would appreciate if you didn't ask about the past.
It's been a while since it was so peaceful. I just hope Cleo doesn't start anything.
Stop trying to couple me with Cleo. Frey is enough, already. I'm only doing this because it must be done.
recruit.gift: I don't know if I deserve this....

affinity.greet: Hey, you should take a rest now.
talk: Aren't you sick of this? Cleo is my responsibility... I heard she'll be taking on an important role now.
Have you ever done something you regretted? If you think you'll regret it, then stop right now.
affinity.gift: You never forget... Thanks.

relationship.greet: Ah, you've come.
talk: Help Kasel when you can. He has a heavy burden.
While I'm not the devout type, I also rely on Lua. I can't do much but pray for the people I've killed, after all...
I do not mourn my past anymore. It can't be changed. What can be changed, however, is the future.

uw.name: Specter's Breath, Redeal
description: Each auto attack has a 25% chance of inflicting 1 stack of Bleed, and dealing 50% of ATK as extra DMG.
Each auto attack has a 28% chance of inflicting 1 stack of Bleed, and dealing 60% of ATK as extra DMG.
Each auto attack has a 31% chance of inflicting 1 stack of Bleed, and dealing 72% of ATK as extra DMG.
Each auto attack has a 34% chance of inflicting 1 stack of Bleed, and dealing 86% of ATK as extra DMG.
Each auto attack has a 37% chance of inflicting 1 stack of Bleed, and dealing 103% of ATK as extra DMG.
Each auto attack has a 40% chance of inflicting 1 stack of Bleed, and dealing 125% of ATK as extra DMG.
uw.story: The group of assassins known as the Laughing Mask has been the master of the Orvel's underworld for a long time. Only the best assassin of the Laughing Mask is allowed to wield this dreadful pair of daggers. It is said that the wounds inflicted by these daggers never heal, and that their victims inevitably bleed to death. According to the legend, these daggers were made from the scythe of the Grim Reaper.

s1.name: Merciless
s1.description: Attacks a random enemy 3 times, dealing a total of {0} P.DMG and inflicting 1 stack of Bleed on them that deals {2} P.DMG over {1} sec. Bleed can be stacked up to max 3 times.
s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Target takes 25% increased P.DMG for 10 sec.

s2.name: Curtain of Darkness
s2.description: For {0} sec, ATK is increased by {1} and Dodges all P.DMG attacks.

books.2: ATK Spd is increased by {0} for the duration of skill.

s2.dark: Auto attack DMG is boosted by 100% for the duration.

ut.name: Soma's Hood
description: [Curtain of Darkness] Increases ATK Boost by 20% and gains CC resist by 400 for the skill's duration.
[Curtain of Darkness] Increases ATK Boost by 24% and gains CC resist by 400 for the skill's duration.
[Curtain of Darkness] Increases ATK Boost by 29% and gains CC resist by 400 for the skill's duration.
[Curtain of Darkness] Increases ATK Boost by 35% and gains CC resist by 400 for the skill's duration.
[Curtain of Darkness] Increases ATK Boost by 42% and gains CC resist by 400 for the skill's duration.
[Curtain of Darkness] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and gains CC resist by 400 for the skill's duration.
ut.story: A dangerous hood made with the secret method of the Laughing Mask. It was made with the legendary soma that is said to provide endless vitality and the secret of the Laughing Mask. Soma's hood increases the morale of an assassin inside the dark curtain, increasing their ATK, and granting dexterity, maximizing P. Dodge.

s3.name: Blade Claw
s3.description: Moves behind the enemy with the lowest HP and deals [FFC800] {0} P.DMG. Per every stacked Bleed, DMG is increased by {1}% and all stacks of Bleed are removed after the attack. Upon Crit Hit, recovers 2 MP and skill cooldown is reset.
s3.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, DMG dealt is increased by 100%.
s3.dark: Cooldown is removed.

ut.name: Cracked Mask
description: [Blade Claw] DMG is increased by 20%, and Upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 300.
[Blade Claw] DMG is increased by 24%, and Upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 300.
[Blade Claw] DMG is increased by 29%, and Upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 300.
[Blade Claw] DMG is increased by 35%, and Upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 300.
[Blade Claw] DMG is increased by 42%, and Upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 300.
[Blade Claw] DMG is increased by 50%, and Upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 300.
ut.story: The mask that Roi destroyed when he left the Laughing Mask assassins. Assassins mercilessly aim for their enemy's vital points, and they wear masks to suppress their emotions when they eliminate their targets. Roi faces the split mask, and goes behind his enemies to kill them with his Blade Claws to protect his friends.

s4.name: Hack
s4.description: If a normal attack is landed as a Critical Hit, attacks the target 6 times to deal a total of {0} additional P.DMG.
s4.light: Each attack recovers 300 mana.
s4.dark: Has a 50% chance to stack 1 stack of Bleed.

t5.dark: Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 10% chance of ATK Spd increasing by 300 and Crit DMG increasing by 60% for 5 sec. Does not activate again during activation.

5.name: Gau
5.subtitle: Barbarian of Frozen Lands
5.description: A barbarian that rules the snowy plains of the frozen land, he undermines the morale of enemies with ear-deafening shouts and charges into them like a storm.
5.story: Gau is a powerful warrior from the Barbarian Kingdom. Whenever he swung his twin axes, a bloodbath would follow. As a warrior, he was feared for his peerless ferocity. However, he suddenly disappeared for 10 years. When he returned, he was a completely changed man. His violent Barbarian tendencies were all gone, even when others criticized him. Instead, he now faces them with smiles and jolly laughter. The kind, warm gaze he now shows to children and animals is especially surprising.

inn.idle: You have some business with a barbarian?

recruit.greet: Nice to meet you. Let's go hunting together sometime.
talk: I look strong? Eh, stop making me blush.
All those beauties around you, don't make me jealous, buddy!
I am indeed strong, hah.
recruit.gift: What's all this? Thanks, man.

affinity.greet: It's kind of embarrassing to be doing this.
talk: Have you seen Yanne lately? I wonder how she's doing...
What? How I know Lewisia? That kid... Even though she's older... It's not like it'll work out just because I like her...
affinity.gift: Thank you. I'll treat you next time.

relationship.greet: Ha! We meet again! Doing well?
talk: Ah...that little Lei became such a fine lady...and to think that her real age was...hahaha!
I'll shatter you to pieces! - Well, how was that? The kids laugh when I act like that.
Hahaha, me and some old dwarf drank a lot last time. Actually, we drank all the alcohol at the Inn! Hahahaha!!

uw.name: Holy Bird, Numinu
description: Per every 1% of HP lost, ATK is increased by 0.8% and ATK Spd is increased by 8.
Per every 1% of HP lost, ATK is increased by 1% and ATK Spd is increased by 10.
Per every 1% of HP lost, ATK is increased by 1.2% and ATK Spd is increased by 12.
Per every 1% of HP lost, ATK is increased by 1.4% and ATK Spd is increased by 14.
Per every 1% of HP lost, ATK is increased by 1.7% and ATK Spd is increased by 17.
Per every 1% of HP lost, ATK is increased by 2% and ATK Spd is increased by 20.
uw.story: It is said that there lives a sacred beast protecting the Barbarians in the Windland Snow Mountain. This beast, capable of dispelling the power of darkness, is supposed to be a blue phoenix composed of ice. Created in the shape of this beast is Numinu, its name means 'holy.' It has been crafted from enchanted ice that never melts. Considered a holy relic among Barbarians, this weapon is bestowed to their mightiest warrior. The wielder of this weapon is the most powerful warrior among Barbarians, and may be considered their king.

s1.name: Smash
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to enemies in range, and the first attack knocks them down for {1} sec.
s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Each use increases DMG by 15%. Stacks 10 times max.

s2.name: Battle Roar
s2.description: All allies' ATK is increased by {1} for {0} sec. Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from allies.
s2.dark: ATK Spd boost of 200 is added to the effect.

ut.name: Fighter's Horn
description: [Battle Roar] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases ATK Boost by 20%.
[Battle Roar] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases ATK Boost by 24%.
[Battle Roar] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases ATK Boost by 29%.
[Battle Roar] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases ATK Boost by 35%.
[Battle Roar] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases ATK Boost by 42%.
[Battle Roar] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases ATK Boost by 50%.
ut.story: Trumpet made with the horn of the guardian beast of Windland Snow Mountain, Orox. Orox of the Snowy Mountain grants noble warriors great power and the ability to see the truth. When a warrior who has received the blessing of Orox blows this horn, it will boost the morale of comrades and bring clarity to their minds.

s3.name: Vortex
s3.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to all enemies in range. The last attack freezes enemies for {1} sec. Gains CC immunity while casting.

books.2: Draws in nearby enemies while casting.

s3.light: Cooldown reduced by 3 sec.
s3.dark: Immune to all types of DMG while in use.

ut.name: Barbarian Mug
description: [Vortex] DMG is increased by 50%, and enemies hit by the last attack takes 5% more DMG for 10 sec.
[Vortex] DMG is increased by 50%, and enemies hit by the last attack takes 6% more DMG for 10 sec.
[Vortex] DMG is increased by 50%, and enemies hit by the last attack takes 7% more DMG for 10 sec.
[Vortex] DMG is increased by 50%, and enemies hit by the last attack takes 8.5% more DMG for 10 sec.
[Vortex] DMG is increased by 50%, and enemies hit by the last attack takes 10.5% more DMG for 10 sec.
[Vortex] DMG is increased by 50%, and enemies hit by the last attack takes 12.5% more DMG for 10 sec.
ut.story: Mug of the Barbarian King who first settled down in the snowy mountains. When the first Barbarian King settled down in Windland, he swore to become the guardian of the snowy mountains and shared this mug with the holy beings of the mountains. The protect magic of the frost wolf imbued in the Barbarian Mug increases the ATK of Vortex and the effect of Freeze.

s4.name: Enrage
s4.description: Upon attacking, ATK is increased by {1} for {0} sec. Can be stacked up to 10 times max.

books.2: CC resistance increases by 50 with each stack.

s4.light: ATK boost is increased by 40%.
s4.dark: Takes 5% more DMG per each stack, but gains a boost of 50 Crit Chance and Lifesteal per each stack as well.

t5.dark: Heals HP worth 10% of ATK every second, and every 1% of HP lost reduces received DMG by 0.6%.

6.name: Phillop
6.subtitle: King of Dwarves
6.description: A legendary dragon slayer who has hunted numerous dragons. Despite his small stature, his powerful shield bash destroys enemy formations, usually followed with a final blow.
6.story: He is the stout and upright king of the Dwarves. He fought alongside the Warrior of the Holy Sword against the Demon Army 100 years ago. His heroism in defeating the Dark Dragon Legion, the core division of the Demon Army, is well known throughout the land. In reality, he only sits on the throne out of a sense of obligation. Even as he complains about the boredom of his royal duties, he continues to work diligently.
6.like: Drinks, sand bath, smithing, and crafting
6.dislike: Long conferences, the royal throne, Demons (especially the Dark Dragons)

inn.idle: Can a human outdrink a dwarf?

recruit.greet: Woa, ha ha. Y'all remind me of back in the days.
talk: The king of dwarves? The title is nothing but a bother.
The size of the bed here doesn't quite fit. But I'm not going back home yet!
To compare to us dwarves, humans never know how to enjoy their life!
recruit.gift: Is this a remembrance of our encounter? Hahaha. I will treasure it.

affinity.greet: Welcome. Here! Raise your glass!
talk: The war from 100 years ago... I was as young as you when I was with King Kyle...
Sometimes, I miss my days as a warrior. Back then, I didn't have this many problems.
affinity.gift: You didn't have to. I would have preferred liquor, though. Ha ha!

relationship.greet: Hello, friend! Have a drink, eh?
talk: I killed plenty of Mad Dragons and Draconics back in my day. Enough to curl any dwarfish beard, eh.
Need a new weapon? I do have some Dwarfish axes back in my trunk.
Hahaha, you're a funny one. Yes, if you ever need the aid of the Dwarves, we will be there to help.

uw.name: Dragon's Ruins, Atein
description: Upon receiving DMG, stacks Dragon Rage for 10 sec. Per each stacked Dragon Rage, ATK and DEF are increased by 0.8%. Can be stacked up to 100 times max.
Upon receiving DMG, stacks Dragon Rage for 10 sec. Per each stacked Dragon Rage, ATK and DEF are increased by 1%. Can be stacked up to 100 times max.
Upon receiving DMG, stacks Dragon Rage for 10 sec. Per each stacked Dragon Rage, ATK and DEF are increased by 1.2%. Can be stacked up to 100 times max.
Upon receiving DMG, stacks Dragon Rage for 10 sec. Per each stacked Dragon Rage, ATK and DEF are increased by 1.4%. Can be stacked up to 100 times max.
Upon receiving DMG, stacks Dragon Rage for 10 sec. Per each stacked Dragon Rage, ATK and DEF are increased by 1.7%. Can be stacked up to 100 times max.
Upon receiving DMG, stacks Dragon Rage for 10 sec. Per each stacked Dragon Rage, ATK and DEF are increased by 2%. Can be stacked up to 100 times max.
uw.story: The Dark Dragons are Demons created to slay the dragons, the arbitrators of the world. During the war 100 years ago, these Dark Dragons killed and devoured countless dragons. A few of the surviving dragons have gone insane from the rage and the shame, and they eventually turned into Mad Dragons. They are now nothing more than giant monsters powered by their destructive instincts. Phillop and his Dwarves have been hunting these Dark Dragons and Mad Dragons since the Demon War, gathering their remains to forge legendary items.

s1.name: Collision
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG and knocks down the enemy for {1} sec.

books.2: Reduces hit enemies' P.DEF by {1}% for {0} sec.

s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 10% per each enemy hit.

s2.name: Headbutt
s2.description: Dashes toward the enemy and deals {0} P.DMG, knocking them back. Hit enemy's Attack Spd is reduced by {2}% for {1} sec.
s2.light: Deals extra P.DMG equal to 10% of max HP.
s2.dark: Effect changes to a 3 sec Stun to nearby enemies.

ut.name: Dwarfish Capricorn Helmet
description: [Headbutt] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 200 for 10 sec.
[Headbutt] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 240 for 10 sec.
[Headbutt] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 290 for 10 sec.
[Headbutt] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 350 for 10 sec.
[Headbutt] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 420 for 10 sec.
[Headbutt] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 500 for 10 sec.
ut.story: Ancient Dwarf King's capricorn helmet. It is made from the gold of dragons that was obtained after defeating the greedy dark dragon Bokrug. The magnificent golden horn of the helmet is imbued with the dark dragon's magic that will slow down an enemy who is hit with Headbutt.

s3.name: Earth Incarnate
s3.description: Increases P.DEF and M.DEF by {1} for {0} sec and heals {2}% of HP. Gains CC immunity.
s3.light: Deals 1% of Max HP as DMG per sec to nearby enemies.
s3.dark: Stuns nearby enemies for 3 sec.

ut.name: Dwarven Ceremonial Hammer
description: [Earth Incarnate] For the duration of skill, ATK Spd and Crit chance is increased by 250, and DEF boost is increased by 20%.
[Earth Incarnate] For the duration of skill, ATK Spd and Crit chance is increased by 250, and DEF boost is increased by 24%.
[Earth Incarnate] For the duration of skill, ATK Spd and Crit chance is increased by 250, and DEF boost is increased by 29%.
[Earth Incarnate] For the duration of skill, ATK Spd and Crit chance is increased by 250, and DEF boost is increased by 35%.
[Earth Incarnate] For the duration of skill, ATK Spd and Crit chance is increased by 250, and DEF boost is increased by 42%.
[Earth Incarnate] For the duration of skill, ATK Spd and Crit chance is increased by 250, and DEF boost is increased by 50%.
ut.story: A hammer that the ancient Dwarven King received as a gift from the Earth Elemental. It was a gift that the King received for saving the Gnome Kingdom from the attacks of the evil Earth Dragon Azi Dahaka. Upon using Earth Incarnate, this ceremonial hammer, imbued with the blessing of the spirit of the earth, increases DEF with the power of the earth's spirit, and grants immunity to HP recovery and CC.

s4.name: Destroy Armor
s4.description: Upon attacking, weakens enemy P.DEF by {1} for {0} sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.

books.2: Per every stack, enemy P. Dodge chance is reduced by {0}%.

s4.light: Enemies with 5 stacks take 1% extra P.DMG based off Max HP per attack.
s4.dark: Upon attack, dispel all positive effects and target receives 20% increased P.DMG for 20 sec. Has a cooldown of 20 sec.

t5.dark: When auto attacking, there is a 10% chance to Stun the target for 2 sec and deal extra DMG worth 10% of own HP.

7.name: Lakrak
7.subtitle: Hand Cannon's Hunter
7.description: A white goblin skilled in mechanical engineering, he uses a hand cannon to inflict explosive damage, harass enemies with special bullets, and inflict fatal damage to them.
7.story: This eccentric albino Goblin enjoys developing powerful weapons more than anything else. Having been harassed and ostracized by other Goblins due to his skin color, he feels no compassion toward his kind. He would gladly shoot, blow up, and smash even a fellow Goblin to test his weapons. However, he also expresses his gratitude to those who help him, and this is how he became Roi's friend. Unfortunately, he is terrible at remembering faces, so he often tries to shoot Roi before he recalls who he is.

inn.idle: No goblins here! Good place.

recruit.greet: Ach!! You weapon look good!!
talk: You fought goblins?! Won?! Kakakak, good!!
Ach, surprised me!! Eck, help experiment?! Good!! Right now!!!
Interested in Handcannons?! You good!! Smart!!
recruit.gift: Present?! Weapon mod fund?!! Good!! Add extra gunpowder!!

affinity.greet: Welcome!!! You want see my research?
talk: I want say human language well! A-B-C-Dee!!! D always problem!!!
No human like you! Distinct! You distinct friend! Now I have Roi and you!!!
affinity.gift: You bring something good!? I know good thing! Great!!!

relationship.greet: Kukakak! Today's research good!!
talk: Gunpowder! Explosions!!! Kakakak!!
Experiments! Experiments! More experiments! Weapon development fun!
Good research data, thanks!! Best friends!!

uw.name: Lakrak MK-1
description: Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 3%, ATK Spd by 30, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 3%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.

Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 3.6%, ATK Spd by 36, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 3.6%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.

Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 4.3%, ATK Spd by 43, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 4.3%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.

Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 5.1%, ATK Spd by 51, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 5.1%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.

Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 6.2%, ATK Spd by 62, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 6.2%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.

Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 7.5%, ATK Spd by 75, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 7.5%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.
uw.story: The destructive yet artistic magnum opus of a quirky Goblin inventor. This single-hand cannon packs the maximum amount of firepower a single Goblin can physically handle. Despite the dangerous amount of gunpowder used, this weapon has fortunately not blown up yet.

s1.name: Rapid Fire
s1.description: Attacks all frontal enemies in a straight line, dealing {0} P.DMG and pushing them back. If the target is not a Hero, deals {1} additional P.DMG and stuns them for {2} sec.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Stuns the enemy for 3 sec.

s2.name: Smoke Bomb
s2.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to enemies in range and inflicts Blind for 4 sec.

books.2: Deals DMG and Stuns the enemy for 1 sec.

s2.dark: Blind duration is increased by 2 sec.

ut.name: Special Gas Mask
description: [Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 1 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 1.2 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 1.4 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 1.7 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 2.1 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 2.5 sec.
ut.story: A high-performing mask that was made with special materials that Lakrak obtained from around the Orbis Continent. This mask is made from Harpy's first feather, a dragon's scales, a leaf from the World Tree, and the empire's mithril, which are all hard to find. This mask protects one from poisonous gas as well as the blinding effect of Smoke Bombs.

s3.name: Glue Bomb
s3.description: Attaches a Glue Bomb to a random enemy that explodes in {0} sec. The explosion deals max {1} P.DMG proportional to enemy's current HP to enemies in range, and inflicts Stun for 3 sec. Upon attaching the Glue Bomb, target is inflicted with Stun for 2 sec.
s3.light: Mana cost is increased by 1, and attacks a random target 2 times.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Goblincraft Special High-Density Gunpowder
description: [Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 200 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 240 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 290 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 350 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 420 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 500 mana.
ut.story: Gunpowder made with Lakrak's dangerous secret recipe. Lakrak believed that simple explosions weren't effective enough in terms of battle strategy, so he added some formic acid and stinging nettle poison to add a stunning effect. It requires an extremely accurate filtering process, and he uses it in secret to avoid abuse.

s4.name: Load Cannon
s4.description: Each auto attack has a 15% chance of firing a bomb that deals {1} P.DMG to enemies in range and stuns them for 2 sec.
s4.light: Activation chance is boosted by 10%.
s4.dark: Target takes 25% increased P.DMG.

t5.dark: Upon a Critical Hit, gain 5% Crit DMG and 30 CC Accuracy. Stacks up to 10 times.

8.name: Kaulah
8.subtitle: Shaman of Lightning
8.description: As the longtime Orc Chieftain of the Sky Wind tribe, he uses elemental attacks powered by the sky and wind. Strong bolts of lightning paralyze enemies, while allies are healed and blessed by the wind.
8.story: This great Orc shaman wields the power of lightning. He is the chieftain of the Skywind Tribe and a respected elder of the Orc Alliance. He has trained countless Orc shamans and is considered their spiritual leader. He is also one of the few shamans who has clairvoyant dreams, and he is wise enough to properly interpret them.

inn.idle: Do you need a hand from an Ork shaman?

recruit.greet: Let me introduce myself. I am the chief of the Skywind tribe, Kaulah.
talk: As I stay here, I came to think that the material civilization of humankind is astonishing.
I miss the wind of the mountaintops. I will have to climb up a nearby mountain, tomorrow.
Though I'm staying in this Inn on business, this uncomfortable bed stops me from having any prophetic dreams.
recruit.gift: I will remember your kindness.

affinity.greet: I hope my wind helps you rest, even if it's for a little while.
talk: I still can't get used to the city. But it's good to see lively people.
The wind will keep blowing, even if time passes... Just like your hardships will also pass.
affinity.gift: I'll use it well during this trip.

relationship.greet: I thought I felt a friendly wind. Welcome back, friend.
talk: Tough as a boulder. Gentle as the breeze. That is how your aura feels.
Have you ever climbed to the top of the mountains in Ogria? True beauty awaits on top of the summit.
I had a premonition last night. One where you saved the world...

uw.name: The Bluewind, Coventina
description: Grants a 10% chance to deal M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK and inflicts Electric Shock on 2 random enemies through a normal attack. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, stuns the target for 2 sec.

Grants a 12% chance to deal M.DMG equal to 120% of ATK stat and inflicts Electric Shock on 2 random enemies through a normal attack. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, stuns the target for 2 sec.

Grants a 14% chance to deal M.DMG equal to 140% of ATK stat and inflicts Electric Shock on 2 random enemies through a normal attack. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, stuns the target for 2 sec.

Grants a 17% chance to deal M.DMG equal to 170% of ATK stat and inflicts Electric Shock on 2 random enemies through a normal attack. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, stuns the target for 2 sec.

Grants a 21% chance to deal M.DMG equal to 210% of ATK stat and inflicts Electric Shock on 2 random enemies through a normal attack. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, stuns the target for 2 sec.

Grants a 25% chance to deal M.DMG equal to 250% of ATK stat and inflicts Electric Shock on 2 random enemies through a normal attack. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, stuns the target for 2 sec.
uw.story: A staff resembling the four-winged thunderbird. Indeed, it has been crafted from a feather of a thunderbird, a beast considered holy among the Skywind Orcs. The staff has the power to communicate with the sky, read the weather, and control the air. To a Skywind shaman who uses the power of lightning, this staff is the ultimate medium.

s1.name: Thunderbolt
s1.description: Drops 5 lightning bolts upon a random enemy, dealing {0} M.DMG and inflicting Electrify. Electrified enemy is stunned for {1} sec.
s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.

s2.description: HP of all allies is healed by {1} for {0} sec.

books.2: While in use, DMG Reduction is increased by {0} , and gains CC immunity.

s2.light: Allies take 25% less DMG while skill is in effect.
s2.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, additionally heal allies by 5% of their Max HP.

ut.name: Thunderbird Mask
description: [Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 200% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 240% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 290% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 350% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 420% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 500% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
ut.story: Mask of the auspicious thunderbird that brings rain. Once the Healing Droplets of the Skywind shaman begin, the soul of the thunderbird stays by those who were hit by Healing Rain and recovers their tired bodies.

s3.name: Swift Wind
s3.description: For {0} sec, all allies' ATK is increased by {1} , and ATK Spd is increased by {2}.

books.2: Crit Chance is increased by {0} for the duration of skill.

s3.light: ATK boost is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.

ut.name: Skywind Feather Decoration
description: [Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 20% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 24% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 29% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 35% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 42% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 50% boost effect is added.
ut.story: Feather from a thunderbird, guardian of rain and thunder. The high ranking shamans of the Skywind Tribe commune through the feathers of a thunderbird. Shamans use this feather accessory when using Swift Wind to become one with the thunderbird, increasing ATK and ATK Spd of all allies.

s4.name: Chain Lightning
s4.description: Deals {1} M.DMG to 4 enemies every {0} sec, and inflicts Electric Shock for {2} sec. Enemies inflicted with Electric Shock will take a total M.DMG of {4} over {3} sec.

books.2: Upon a Crit Hit, hit enemies are stunned for {0} sec.

s4.light: Crit Chance is increased by 400.
s4.dark: If there is 1 enemy, Stun duration is increased by 3 sec.

t5.dark: When taking DMG, decreases ATK Spd of the attacking enemy by 300 for 5 sec. This effect is activated only once every 5 sec.

9.name: Epis
9.subtitle: Captivating Demon
9.description: A cold-blooded hedonist demon. Using a huge scythe, she harvests the souls of enemies. She suddenly appears in the midst of enemies, slashing everything around her.
9.story: This playful and bewitching succubus acts on her own whims. As expected of her Demon lineage, she is a hedonist driven by what she finds fun and enjoyable. Even during the Demon War, she chose traveling around on her own over joining the invasion. In her eyes, fighting alongside Kyle was interesting enough for her to even betray her own kind. When she later met Kasel, she gladly joined his party, knowing that she found another fun adventure for herself. When she finds attractive men, she sometimes visits them in their dreams.
9.like: Anything that strikes interest or curiosity

inn.idle: Hm hmm hmm~ (humming)

recruit.greet: Are you free today?
talk: Are you blushing? How cute~
Now just where are you staring at? Don't worry, I won't tell anyone...
Hmm..what, you want to try something exciting~?
recruit.gift: Oh, for me? Ooh, now then, what could you want in return~?

affinity.greet: Welcome, dear! Did you close the door?
talk: Oh, what did you expect? Oh, you are devious.
You want to know why a demon is siding with the humans? Does it really look like that? Ha ha.
affinity.gift: Not bad. You seem to know a little something about seduction. So, does that make you more like me?

relationship.greet: Hmm~ based off your expression, I'm assuming you met me in your dreams last night?
talk: Aha~so, how was your dream? Satisfying? Or would you like to continue where it left off...
Haaaah...There's this thing on my mind. I keep thinking about you...Do you know why~?
These clothes seem to be getting tighter. I wonder if I've gained weight...? Do you want to check for me, back at my room?

uw.name: The Seductress, Guillotine
description: Upon attacking, there is a 25% chance of dealing 80% of ATK as extra M.DMG, and ATK being increased by 2%. ATK boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.
Upon attacking, there is a 25% chance of dealing 96% of ATK as extra M.DMG, and ATK being increased by 2.4%. ATK boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.
Upon attacking, there is a 25% chance of dealing 115% of ATK as extra M.DMG, and ATK being increased by 2.9%. ATK boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.
Upon attacking, there is a 25% chance of dealing 138% of ATK as extra M.DMG, and ATK being increased by 3.5%. ATK boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.
Upon attacking, there is a 25% chance of dealing 165% of ATK as extra M.DMG, and ATK being increased by 4.2%. ATK boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.
Upon attacking, there is a 25% chance of dealing 200% of ATK as extra M.DMG, and ATK being increased by 5%. ATK boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.
uw.story: A deadly scythe that matches the characters of its wielder, Epis. It reaps the souls of those who approach it to admire its beauty. Created from within Epis's own body, the weapon is much like a succubus itself. It delivers extreme pleasure to its victims before absorbing their life energy. It seems that, in a way, Epis tried to show some sort of kindness with this weapon.

s1.name: Absorbing Blow
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG that ignores enemy DEF, and heals {1}% of DMG as HP.
s1.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s1.dark: Ignores enemy Block.

s2.name: Nightmare
s2.description: Moves behind the furthest enemy and deals {0} M.DMG. Hit enemies take 30% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
s2.dark: Mana consumption is increased by 1, and upon using the skill, 'Absorbing Blow' is activated. Cannot use when there are no enemies in range.

ut.name: Succubus's Box
description: [Nightmare] Increases DMG by 50% and stuns the affected enemy for 2 sec.
[Nightmare] Increases DMG by 50% and stuns the affected enemy for 2.4 sec.
[Nightmare] Increases DMG by 50% and stuns the affected enemy for 2.9 sec.
[Nightmare] Increases DMG by 50% and stuns the affected enemy for 3.5 sec.
[Nightmare] Increases DMG by 50% and stuns the affected enemy for 4.2 sec.
[Nightmare] Increases DMG by 50% and stuns the affected enemy for 5 sec.
ut.story: Box containing the Nightmare Queen's sand of sleep. A box from the Demon World that contains magic sand that causes one to fall asleep. When the enemy falls asleep, attacks the enemy and deals M. DMG through a nightmare that cannot be dispelled.

s3.name: Devil's Prom
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to all enemies in range. Gains CC immunity while using this skill.

books.2: Upon a Crit Hit, heals {0}% of DMG as HP.

s3.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: DMG taken is reduced by 50% while skill is in use.

ut.name: Seductress Shoes
description: [Devil's Prom] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and DMG is increased by 20%.
[Devil's Prom] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and DMG is increased by 24%.
[Devil's Prom] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and DMG is increased by 29%.
[Devil's Prom] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and DMG is increased by 35%.
[Devil's Prom] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and DMG is increased by 42%.
[Devil's Prom] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and DMG is increased by 50%.
ut.story: Epis's treasured item. When Epis first arrived in the human world, she really got into human culture and attended a masquerade. The dancing of a girl wearing red heels caught her eyes, and she made a deal with her in exchange for the those shoes. Epis wears her seductive heels and get carried away when inflicting pain on her enemies with her dance.

s4.name: Harvest
s4.description: When an enemy is killed by this hero, ATK is increased by {1} for {0} sec, and all skill cooldown is reduced by 30%.

books.2: Per each kill, recovers 1 orb of mana.

s4.light: Each stack increases Mana recovery per sec by 50%.
s4.dark: While stack number is higher than 5, Mana is always at 100% and cooldowns are decreased by an additional 1 sec per each sec.

t5.dark: All of Epis's attacks decrease the M.DEF of hit enemies by 20% for 10 sec. ATK rises by 2% per each enemy hit. Maximum stack number is 10.

10.name: Selene
10.subtitle: Wind-piercing Arrow
10.description: An Elf Princess with a lofty air, she guards the sacred forest. Arrows filled with moon energy follow her will to track down enemies, and arrows filled with wind energy fiercely pierce the enemy.
10.story: This noble Elven princess admires the Holy Sword and its chosen warrior. She strives as much as she can to do what's right, and wants others to do the same. This is why she offers genuine criticism to anyone who strays from the path of righteousness, even if it's the Warrior of the Holy Sword. Unfortunately, her stout resolve is sometimes taken the wrong way by others. She often visits her younger sister Dosarta at her tower to keep her company.
10.like: Those who work in harmony and take responsibilities
10.dislike: Those who abandon their own beliefs Those who flee from danger

inn.idle: Oh, so humans sleep in places like this?

recruit.greet: Have you been doing well? May your day be full of light.
talk: Have I caught your attention?
Refined people are always welcome.
Why not, I guess I could hear you out.
recruit.gift: Thank you for the gift. It's beautiful.

affinity.greet: Today was a great day, having met you.
talk: I've lived to protect the forest since I was young. That's why I always loved the story of the Holy Sword.
The Warrior of the Holy Sword who defeated the Dark Lord and brought peace to the world 100 years ago... Now we must create a new legend.
affinity.gift: This is...! Thank you for your generosity.

relationship.greet: Today seems to be another nice, sunny day - full of the happiness and warmth.
talk: Perhaps I've been too hard on the Warrior, forcing my ideals and thoughts on him...
Visit Elidora Forest at some time. I will greet you personally.
This bow is a special token of friendship given to me by a Wind Elemental. You may touch it if you want.

uw.name: Green Winds, Notos
description: Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 200 for 10 sec, and for the duration of skill, each auto attack fires an arrow that deals extra 100% P.DMG.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 240 for 10 sec, and for the duration of skill, each auto attack fires an arrow that deals extra 120% P.DMG.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 280 for 10 sec, and for the duration of skill, each auto attack fires an arrow that deals extra 140% P.DMG.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 340 for 10 sec, and for the duration of skill, each auto attack fires an arrow that deals extra 170% P.DMG.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 410 for 10 sec, and for the duration of skill, each auto attack fires an arrow that deals extra 210% P.DMG.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 500 for 10 sec, and for the duration of skill, each auto attack fires an extra arrow that deals 250% P.DMG.
uw.story: A bow blessed with the breath of Sylph, the Wind Elemental. Only a person of noble character may wield it. When drawn, the bow nocks itself with a deadly magic arrow created from the breath of the Elemental. Guided by the Wind Elemental, the arrow never misses its target, no matter where it's hiding. Selene has shared special bonds with Elementals since childhood. She was especially close to Sylph, who enchanted her bow as a sign of their friendship.

s1.name: Arrow Rain
s1.description: Shoots 12 arrows to random enemies and deals a total of {0} P.DMG.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: There is a 20% chance to inflict Stun for 2 sec.

s2.name: Rush
s2.description: Upon attacking, summons 5 arrows that launch towards the enemy. Each arrow deals {0} P.DMG.
s2.light: Ignores DEF when there is only 1 enemy.
s2.dark: Makes the enemy flinch for 0.5 sec.

ut.name: Wind Spirit Seal Stone
description: [Rush] Increases DMG by 20% and has a 15% chance to summon 1 Rush Arrow upon a normal attack.
[Rush] Increases DMG by 24% and has a 15% chance to summon 1 Rush Arrow upon a normal attack.
[Rush] Increases DMG by 29% and has a 15% chance to summon 1 Rush Arrow upon a normal attack.
[Rush] Increases DMG by 35% and has a 15% chance to summon 1 Rush Arrow upon a normal attack.
[Rush] Increases DMG by 42% and has a 15% chance to summon 1 Rush Arrow upon a normal attack.
[Rush] Increases DMG by 50% and has a 15% chance to summon 1 Rush Arrow upon a normal attack.
ut.story: A stone in which a reckless wind bow elemental is sealed. The elemental caused all kinds of trouble with its evil tricks, so it was sealed by the Fairy King. The belligerent wind elemental infuses arrows with destructive wind, increasing its killing power by 5 times or more.

s3.name: Moonlight Flash
s3.description: Fires an arrow in a straight line, dealing P.DMG to all enemies in range proportional to their current HP. Deals a maximum of {0} P.DMG and inflicts knock down.
s3.light: Reduces cooldown by 3 sec.
s3.dark: Ignores enemy Block.

ut.name: Silver Arrow
description: [Moonlight Flash] DMG is increased by 20% and target takes 20% additional P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Moonlight Flash] DMG is increased by 24% and target takes 20% additional P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Moonlight Flash] DMG is increased by 29% and target takes 20% additional P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Moonlight Flash] DMG is increased by 35% and target takes 20% additional P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Moonlight Flash] DMG is increased by 42% and target takes 20% additional P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Moonlight Flash] DMG is increased by 50% and target takes 20% additional P.DMG for 10 sec.
ut.story: Arrowhead imbued with the blessing of the Goddess of Hunting and the Moon. An ancient artifact that is passed down to the best Elven hunter. It is said that the Goddess of Hunting and the Moon cared for the Elves who protected the holy forest, and she lent her power to them through the artifact. The silver arrow imbued with the power of the Goddess of the Moon has a mysterious power that allows the user to defeat his enemy and boost DMG.

s4.name: Moonlight Arrow
s4.description: Upon attacking, increases ATK by {1} and Crit Chance by {2} for {0} sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

books.2: Each attack increases hero's Crit DMG by {0}%.

s4.light: Max stack number is changed to 5.
s4.dark: Auto attack range is boosted by 20%.

t5.dark: Own Crit Chance is decreased by 300 and Crit DMG is increased by 100%.

11.name: Maria
11.subtitle: Fallen Witch
11.description: The saint who blessed the hero that saved the world long ago. The cursed, outraged crow shoots sharp feathers at enemies and completely breaks the enemy's formation.
11.story: Although she was a Holy Maiden of Lua in the past, she eventually fell into corruption. Now, this cynical, crow-commanding witch curses her former Goddess from the darkness. There was a time when she was a friend of Kyle and a heroine of the people. However, when Kyle disappeared, she hid herself from the world as well. She eventually came back as a fallen witch, threatening mankind as the spearhead of the Demon Army. These days, however, she appears to be plotting some scheme, not as a Demon commander, but completely on her own.

inn.idle: What's this? A greenhorn?

recruit.greet: Don't greet the Dark Forces so casually, kid.
talk: Don't worry. I'm staying for just the night. My room is upstairs, mind coming up? Hahaha...
You're quite to my liking. In the sense that I want to rip you apart, of course...
Do you know what I'd really like to see? You, begging for your life on your knees.
recruit.gift: A quaint gift, befitting of a greenhorn such as you.

affinity.greet: So what do you need?
talk: You still seem kind of clueless. You've still got a long way to go until you can face them.
You don't know... So, you don't know what Lua really looks like. It's better if you don't.
affinity.gift: Ha ha... Alright. This will be good feed for the crows.

relationship.greet: ..Hmph, you came. I see, you are no longer a mere novice.
talk: When I look at you, I am reminded of him in his youth...hmm...
I hate Lua for what she did...but you, you are different.
You are an odd one, accepting a corrupted witch into your fold...how cute.

uw.name: Lea's Messenger, Cocytus
description: Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 300% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 375% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 450% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 525% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 625% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 750% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
uw.story: A mysterious raven that can travel across dimensions. Its intelligence and shrewdness are certainly not those of a mere bird. In truth, it is a monster filled with dark energy, much like Demons. Indeed, it is said that this beast is as powerful as a high-ranking Demon. Some claim that it occasionally flies over fields of battle, speaking in human languages. Much of this creature's identity is still shrouded in mystery.

s1.name: Raven Storm
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and knocks them back. M.DEF is reduced by {2}% for {1} sec.

books.2: Reduces ATK Spd by {0}% for the duration of skill.

s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Has a 20% chance of inflicting a 3 sec Shackle.

s2.name: Claw of Restriction
s2.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to 2 enemies and shackles them for {1} sec. Targeted enemies receive extra M.DMG over time.

books.2: Enemy takes increased M.DMG by {0}% for the duration of skill.

s2.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 and the skill targets 3 enemies.
s2.dark: Shackle duration is increased by 1.5 sec.

ut.name: Spirit's Sabaton
description: [Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 10% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 12% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 14% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 17% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 21% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 25% for 10 sec.
ut.story: A claw armor that Maria gifted to Lea's messenger. The claw armor that is made with fancy gold contains a binding curse that never lets go of any enemy that it grabs. Enemies bound by the messenger's Sabaton will become defenseless against magic attacks and will receive great damage.

s3.name: Area of Darkness
s3.description: Draws in nearby enemies towards the center and deals {0} M.DMG. The last attack stuns enemies for 3 sec.
s3.light: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Pendant of Darkness
description: [Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 20%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 24%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 29%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 35%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 42%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 50%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
ut.story: Ashes of a grey messenger that announces the end. These are the ashes of the raven that flew into the Church of Lua right before the Republic of Gray collapsed a hundred years ago. Everyone ignored the ominous messenger, and only Priestess Maria cared for it until its last day. Even after its death, it has helped Maria expand her area of darkness by pouring its dark energy on her.

s4.name: Black Wind
s4.description: Enemies damaged by Maria has their ATK reduced by {1} for {0} sec.

books.0: ATK reduction rate is increased by {0}%.
books.1: ATK reduction rate is increased by {0}%.
books.2: Enemy Crit Chance is reduced by {0}% for the duration of skill.

s4.light: ATK reduction is increased by 40%.
s4.dark: Reduces enemy M. Crit Resistance by 25% for 10 sec.

t5.dark: Upon a Crit Hit, target's CC resistance is reduced by 250 for 10 sec, and all Skill Cooldown, excluding the skill in use, is reduced by 2% each.

12.name: Miruru
12.subtitle: Cursed Pirate Empress
12.description: The legendary pirate who was cursed and turned into a little girl. She has the amazing ability to drop cannonballs right on the enemy's head.
12.story: She once roamed the seas as the pirate empress, instilling fear in sailors' hearts. However, a cursed item has turned her into a child, and all her loyal allies and crew members soon left her. Not one to give up, she started again from the scratch, and now dreams of returning to her former glory. Unfortunately, the curse of childhood has made her way of thinking immature as well. Even so, she continues to chase her dream. Currently, she commands the second Miruru Pirates consisting of Goblins and Gnolls.

inn.idle: How about an alliance? I can give you 10% of all findings!

recruit.greet: Nice to meet you, too!
talk: Together, we can do anything! Even with this cursed body!
The sea is calling us !
I will get back my appearance someday.
recruit.gift: Gold! It's gold!

affinity.greet: Welcome! My Number One honorary subordinate!!!
talk: Hm... My past? Whenever I try to remember something... I go bam!!! And I just fall from the bed.
But there's something I remember. A burning thirst... and writing on a map... The Fountain of Life?
affinity.gift: You really are my subordinate! Now, the treasure trove of the Miruru Pirates is full!

relationship.greet: Heya~ welcome back!!
talk: Let us work hard today as well! For the sake of the Miruru Pirates!
Did you bring any treasure? Where? Where? Where? Show me!
My cannon? Yeah, I made it myself! It's awesome, right? Right?!

uw.name: Ultimate Weapon, Leviathan
description: Deals P.DMG equal to 100% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 20% more P.DMG for 10 seconds.
Deals P.DMG equal to 120% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 24% more P.DMG for 10 seconds.
Deals P.DMG equal to 140% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 29% more P.DMG for 10 seconds.
Deals P.DMG equal to 170% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 35% more P.DMG for 10 seconds.
Deals P.DMG equal to 210% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 42% more P.DMG for 10 seconds.
Deals P.DMG equal to 250% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 50% more P.DMG for 10 seconds.
uw.story: Back when Miruru reigned as the pirate empress, she was feared by sailors and a major threat to the naval forces of Orvelia and the empire. The cannons on her ship were especially terrifying to the Navy. The most powerful of them was the Leviathan, the ship's main cannon. After being cursed, she took one thing with her as she fled from her mutinous crew. Its value as a weapon is in fact far more valuable than any gold or loot. She took with her the Leviathan, the most powerful cannon in her arsenal. After numerous modifications, the once-terror of the sea now serves as a mobile artillery.

s1.name: Baaaam!
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to all enemies and pushes them back.
s1.light: Increase P.DMG that the target takes by 25% for 10 sec.
s1.dark: Upon activation, ATK is increased by 35% for 10 sec.

s2.name: Roll Over
s2.description: Deals {0} P.DMG 3 times to frontal enemies, and each attack has a {1}% chance of knocking them down for {2} sec.
s2.dark: For each enemy that takes DMG, reduce cooldown by 8%.

ut.name: Pirate King's Sextant
description: [Roll Over] increases DMG by 4% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.
[Roll Over] increases DMG by 4.8% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.
[Roll Over] increases DMG by 5.8% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.
[Roll Over] increases DMG by 7% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.
[Roll Over] increases DMG by 8.4% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.
[Roll Over] increases DMG by 10% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.
ut.story: Sextant of Pirate King Olga, who was the first to discover the new continent. Pirate King Olga went past the Orbis Continent to find a new continent, following a revelation from the gods. The sextant can calculate the most accurate location and angle in the world. Miruru uses the sextant to boost the damage from rolling bomb attacks, but she doesn't remember how she ended up with it.

s3.name: Miruru Pirates!
s3.description: Attacks a random target and the enemies near it 5 times, dealing a total of {1} P.DMG and reducing their ATK Spd by {2}. If the target is not a Hero, deals {3} additional P.DMG.
s3.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s3.dark: Removes ATK Spd debuff effect and adds a 3 sec Stun.

ut.name: Miruru Cannonball
description: [Miruru Pirates!] DMG is increased by 50%, and skill cooldown is reduced by 12%.
[Miruru Pirates!] DMG is increased by 50%, and skill cooldown is reduced by 14%.
[Miruru Pirates!] DMG is increased by 50%, and skill cooldown is reduced by 17%.
[Miruru Pirates!] DMG is increased by 50%, and skill cooldown is reduced by 21%.
[Miruru Pirates!] DMG is increased by 50%, and skill cooldown is reduced by 25%.
[Miruru Pirates!] DMG is increased by 50%, and skill cooldown is reduced by 30%.
ut.story: Cannonball engraved with the symbol of the Miruru Pirates. Miruru still vividly remembers her glorious past. Her fluttering flag emblazoned with a shark, and the sounds of explosions that were at her command. Those fond memories of enemy ships sinking in terror still remain within her. Miruru is using special cannonballs to attack enemies, while waiting for the glorious days to come back once again.

s4.name: Boooooom!
s4.description: When dealing a normal attack, shoots additional bullet with a 60% chance of dealing {0} P.DMG to all enemies.
s4.light: Increases ATK by 0.5% for 10 seconds upon a Crit Hit. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.
s4.dark: Activation chance changes to 80%.

t5.dark: Miruru stacks Darkness depending on the number of enemies she hits. When she reaches 50 stacks, she goes berserk, boosting her Atk Spd by 800 and her ATK by 20%.

13.name: Lorraine
13.subtitle: Grand Elidoran Scholar
13.description: The elf druid who joined the Human Allied Forces when the Dark Lord invaded. Communes with nature and attacks enemies using trees.
13.story: The Great Sage of Elidora is the wisest of the Druids. As one of the heroes who fought against the Demon invaders 100 years ago, she is often considered the wisest person on the entire Orbis Continent. She has taught and trained countless Elves, and possesses keen insight and mystic powers befitting her age. It is said that even the current king of Elidora as well as his children were all once her students. Having recently sensed a strange disturbance from the Elidora Forest, she is preparing the path for the wielder of the Holy Sword.

inn.idle: Do not be afraid. Ye may be much stronger.

recruit.greet: I'm Lorraine, an Elidora Elf. Salutations.
talk: I had a good time.
May the blessing of mother nature light thy way.
Human beings are astounding creatures, but you have a serious weakness. You are ruled by greed and cannot resist temptation.
recruit.gift: I will treasure this.

affinity.greet: I always welcome the chance to spend time with you.
talk: A major crossroad awaits you. Light and shadow... will converge into one path...
You mean my blue hair? Ah, it's a mistake from my past.
affinity.gift: I'll consider it as a gift given out of your generosity.

relationship.greet: You have grown strong, just, and pure.
talk: You seem to have the purest soul I've seen in a while.
It would be nice if these times of peaceful enjoyment could last forever...but that would be a vice.
I will never forget you. Not as the Sage, but as a simple elf.

uw.name: World Tree's Will, Roburu
description: Every 7 sec, deals 40% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 10%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 48% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 12%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 57% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 14%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 69% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 17%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 83% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 20%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 100% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 25%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
uw.story: The legend has it that, once every 100 years, the World Tree bestows one of its branches to a chosen one. The branch radiates with eternal life, granting immense power and knowledge to its owner. Fusing the branch with the Stone of the Forest, an Elven treasure, Lorraine created this staff. Now, she can call upon the forces of nature and remain connected to the World Tree wherever she goes.

s1.name: Thornbush Forest
s1.description: Attacks 3 times at random, dealing {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and inflicting 1 stack of Poison with each attack.

books.2: Leaves 2 stacks of Poison upon a Critical Hit.

s1.light: Hit count is increased by 1.
s1.dark: Enemies with 5 or more stacks of Poison are shackled for 3 sec upon hit.

s2.name: Tangled Vine
s2.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in a straight line, stacking 2 Poison and shackling them for {1} sec. After some time, deals a large amount of DMG based on the number of Poison stacks.

books.2: Target takes {0}% increased M.DMG for the duration of skill.

s2.dark: Enemies hit by the final explosion effect are stunned for 2 sec.

ut.name: Deadly Belladonna
description: [Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 200 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 240 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 290 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 350 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 420 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 500 MP from the affected enemy.
ut.story: The beautiful but poisonous Belladonna. It's a dangerous plant that only the Great Sage can handle. The little Belladonna that is mixed up with vines poisons enemies and makes them defenseless against magic attacks.

s3.name: Wrath of the Forest
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and knocks them down for 3 sec. Enemies inflicted by Poison takes {1}% more DMG per every stack.
s3.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.
s3.dark: Enemies with 5 or more stacks of Poison lose their positive effects.

ut.name: Root of the World Tree
description: [Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 20%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 24%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 29%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 35%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 42%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 50%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
ut.story: Proof of the unity between the Druids and the World Tree. The great sages of Elidora have always maintained a deep bond with the World Tree. The roots of the World Tree are proof of the deep bond with the Druids. They attack enemies with supernatural DMG whenever Druids shout the Wrath of the Forest to show nature's fury and hostility.

s4.name: Blade Leaf
s4.description: When dealing a normal attack, attacks a random enemy 3 times with a 30% chance of inflicting {0} M.DMG and 1 stack of Poison for 20 seconds. Poison inflicts a total of {1} M.DMG over 20 seconds.
s4.light: Poison stack maximum is changed to 6.
s4.dark: There is a 20% chance that hit enemies are shackled for 2 sec.
