t5.dark: Every 5 sec, targets all enemies and attacks with 'Thornbush Forest' with 30% chance on each enemy.

15.name: Clause
15.subtitle: Knight of Iron Defense
15.description: Kasel's 'older brother'. A true knight, he is a man of steel who protects allies at the front of the battlefield. He blocks the attacks of the enemies while taking them down, earning him the reputation akin to a castle wall.
15.story: This upright and righteous man protects Orvel as one of its knights. Many people consider him a dependable defender of Orvel, but due to his lack of interest in wealth and success, his actual rank within the order has never been very high. He grew up together with Kasel and Frey in the same orphanage, and he loves his land as the home of those precious to him. He recently volunteered to join the expedition to investigate the King's Plains.

inn.idle: Hahaha! All these familiar faces!

recruit.greet: Oh, there you are! How are you?
talk: How about applying for the Guardian Knights?
You look as trustworthy as ever.
Sometimes, the mouthguard of my helmet feels like it's trying to suffocate me. Hahaha!!
recruit.gift: Normally, I wouldn't accept - but I shall accept it as your sincerity.

affinity.greet: Ha ha! The Guardian Knights also need to rest. Come, take a seat here.
talk: I didn't expect Kasel to get that strong. He used to cry and follow me everywhere... And now he's the master of the Holy Sword... Ha ha.
Am I jealous of Kasel? No way! He's my brother, and I'm proud of him.
affinity.gift: All this... I'm flattered. I'll have to work even harder.

relationship.greet: Hahaha, good to see you again!
talk: My justice isn't really anything too fancy. A belief that I will never be ashamed of - that is my justice.
A high-ranking position doesn't mean you can get a lot done. It might get you stuck in the castle with all the paperwork.
I know I need to help that person, but right now, there are more pressing matters - the people suffering all across Orvelia.

uw.name: The Guardian, Exian
description: When HP falls below 35%, all allies' P.DMG Reduction is increased by 200 and ATK is increased by 100% of P.DEF. Gains CC immunity.
When HP falls below 35%, all allies' P.DMG Reduction is increased by 240 and ATK is increased by 120% of P.DEF. Gains CC immunity.
When HP falls below 35%, all allies' P.DMG Reduction is increased by 280 and ATK is increased by 144% of P.DEF. Gains CC immunity.
When HP falls below 35%, all allies' P.DMG Reduction is increased by 340 and ATK is increased by 173% of P.DEF. Gains CC immunity.
When HP falls below 35%, all allies' P.DMG Reduction is increased by 410 and ATK is increased by 207% of P.DEF. Gains CC immunity.
When HP falls below 35%, all allies' P.DMG Reduction is increased by 500 and ATK is increased by 250% of P.DEF. Gains CC immunity.
uw.story: A sword and shield set engraved with various Runes and infused with ancient magic. These legendary items are said to have been created eons ago by an ancient dragon named Exian, using its own scales. As one of the royal treasures of Orvel, the sword is bestowed only to the knight of the most honorable principles. Its wielder shall serve as the defender of the kingdom and its people, and the protector of life.

s1.name: Cut Ground
s1.description: Leaps into the air and deals {0} P.DMG to enemies in range, stunning them for {1} sec.

books.2: Stun duration is increased by {0} sec.

s1.light: Cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.
s1.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, the skill has a 100% chance to draw the target in.

s2.name: Shield Strike
s2.description: Deals {0} P.DMG proportional to DEF to enemies in range and knocks them back. Hit enemies' DEF is reduced by {1}%. Upon blocking an attack, skill cooldown is reduced by 0.5 sec.
s2.light: Target takes 25% increased P.DMG for 10 sec.
s2.dark: Stuns the enemy for 1 sec.

ut.name: Firm Determination
description: [Shield Strike] Reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 500 and Crit Chance by 100 for 10 sec.
[Shield Strike] Reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 500 and Crit Chance by 120 for 10 sec.
[Shield Strike] Reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 500 and Crit Chance by 140 for 10 sec.
[Shield Strike] Reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 500 and Crit Chance by 170 for 10 sec.
[Shield Strike] Reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 500 and Crit Chance by 210 for 10 sec.
[Shield Strike] Reduces P.Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 500 and Crit Chance by 250 for 10 sec.
ut.story: Old wooden shield of the knight of the Iron Wall. It's a precious shield that Clause used when he first started training. He has since engraved the names of his deceased comrades in order to remember his determination as a guardian knight. Each time he pushes away enemies with the shield, the knight's firm determination helps him tap into power beyond his limits.

s3.name: Guardian Shield
s3.description: All allies' P.DEF is increased by {1} for {0} sec and P.Crit Resistance is increased by {2}%.
s3.light: DEF boost is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Receives 25% reduced P.DMG for the duration.

ut.name: Guardian Knight Insignia
description: [Guardian Shield] Upon activation, removes negative effects on self, and DEF boost is increased by 20%.
[Guardian Shield] Upon activation, removes negative effects on self, and DEF boost is increased by 24%.
[Guardian Shield] Upon activation, removes negative effects on self, and DEF boost is increased by 29%.
[Guardian Shield] Upon activation, removes negative effects on self, and DEF boost is increased by 35%.
[Guardian Shield] Upon activation, removes negative effects on self, and DEF boost is increased by 42%.
[Guardian Shield] Upon activation, removes negative effects on self, and DEF boost is increased by 50%.
ut.story: Rune of the Orvel Guardian Knights. A Gold Lion Rune that is given to knights when they first join the Guardian Knights, along with the vow that they will give their lives to protect the kingdom. The rune from the Guardian Knights bolsters a knight's iron will and loyalty, increasing the effectiveness of the Guardian Shield.

s4.name: Vow of Knights
s4.description: Upon blocking, deals {0} P.DMG to frontal enemies and decreases ATK of affected targets by {2}% for {1} sec. Recovers 300 MP after hitting the target.
s4.light: Casting time is greatly boosted.
s4.dark: Reduce an additional 10% of ATK.

t5.dark: When an ally other than this hero is hit by an attack, increase all allies P.DEF by 20% and P.Crit Resist by 20%. (10 sec Cooldown)

16.name: Rephy
16.subtitle: Spiritual Guide
16.description: Half-human and half-animal, this creature guides souls using a spirit lamp. Heals allies with the power of souls. Disturbs enemies or recovers Mana of allies with the help of souls as well.
16.story: This pure and kindhearted Tamian soul guide can communicate with the dead. The Tamian race lives in harmony with nature, and they have the ability to read its flow and guide the souls of the dead. Rephy's ability as a soul guide is exceptional, even for a Tamian. He uses it to guide the souls of those who died in the forest and help them pass on, preventing them from turning evil. He is the most capable among the Tamians in discerning the paths of the stars, pacifying the souls of the dead, and properly guiding them to the afterlife.

inn.idle: Have you heard of the Tamian tribe?

recruit.greet: I'm Rephy, sage of the Tamian tribe.
talk: Human, come with me. Let's go, defeat the evil king and protect the forest.
You never get lost in this forest with me!
It is one of our tasks to guide those who died in the forest, helping them return to where they must..
recruit.gift: I got a gift from a human! Hooray!

affinity.greet: It's warm! The souls will like this place!
talk: Can you hear that? The stars outside the window are whispering to us!
Human, I'll invite you to our forest next time!
affinity.gift: A surprise gift? Humans really are good friends!

relationship.greet: Hi! Your soul is as pure as usual!
talk: The forest feels good! Clear air, refreshing winds, dancing fairies...
Leave the guiding to me! The souls will help us!
The stars say, today will be a good day! Let's go out!

uw.name: God's Lamp, Kurulati
description: Every 20 sec, an ally with the lowest HP turns invisible for 5 sec. An invisible ally becomes immune to P.DMG, and HP will not drop below 1%. MP Recovery per sec is increased to 120%.
Every 20 sec, an ally with the lowest HP turns invisible for 6 sec. An invisible ally becomes immune to P.DMG, and HP will not drop below 1%. MP Recovery per sec is increased to 144%.
Every 20 sec, an ally with the lowest HP turns invisible for 7 sec. An invisible ally becomes immune to P.DMG, and HP will not drop below 1%. MP Recovery per sec is increased to 172%.
Every 20 sec, an ally with the lowest HP turns invisible for 8 sec. An invisible ally becomes immune to P.DMG, and HP will not drop below 1%. MP Recovery per sec is increased to 207%.
Every 20 sec, an ally with the lowest HP turns invisible for 9 sec. An invisible ally becomes immune to P.DMG, and HP will not drop below 1%. MP Recovery per sec is increased to 248%.
Every 20 sec, an ally with the lowest HP turns invisible for 10 sec. An invisible ally becomes immune to P.DMG, and HP will not drop below 1%. MP Recovery per sec is increased to 300%.
uw.story: It is the duty of a soul guide to lead the lost souls onto the right path, to help them move on to the next life. This lamp, powered by a mysterious orb created long ago by a dragon from a distant land, is a treasure of the Tamians. The orb at its core allows nearby souls to materialize, making it possible for its wielder to talk to them directly. As such, it is the ultimate medium for a soul guide. Tamian chieftains have used this relic to carry out the sacred duties of a soul guide for generations. Now, in the face a great danger that threatens the world, the lamp has been passed on to Rephy, the most powerful soul guide in existence.

s1.name: Healing Soul
s1.description: Heals 4 allies with lowest HP {2}% of Max HP, and heals extra {1} HP over {0} sec. This effect cannot be dispelled.

books.2: MP recovery rate per sec is increased by {0}%.

s1.light: Mana Cost is increased by 1 and skill effect range changes to all allies.
s1.dark: Each heal has a 20% chance to remove negative effects.

s2.name: Salvation
s2.description: Dispels all negative effects. M.DEF is increased by {1} for {0} sec.

books.2: CC Resistance is increased by {1} for {0} sec.

s2.dark: Increases M.DEF by additional 10% of the caster's M.DEF.

ut.name: Seed of Birth
description: [Salvation] Increases M.DEF Boost by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 12%.
[Salvation] Increases M.DEF Boost by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 14%.
[Salvation] Increases M.DEF Boost by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 17%.
[Salvation] Increases M.DEF Boost by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 21%.
[Salvation] Increases M.DEF Boost by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 25%.
[Salvation] Increases M.DEF Boost by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 30%.
ut.story: A collection of the energy that is created when a life is born. It's very warm and gentle, so souls like it. Rephy uses it to start a fire in a lamp to borrow the power of the souls. When a seed is put in a lamp, it shines brightly, like when the sun was first born.

s3.name: Soulrush
s3.description: Deals a total of {1} M.DMG over 10 attacks to enemies within range. Hit enemies' ATK Spd is reduced by {2}%.

books.2: Target takes {0}% increased P.DMG and M.DMG.

s3.light: Each hit removes 250 mana from the target.
s3.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, Silence enemies in range for 1 sec.

ut.name: Haven of Souls
description: [Soulrush] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and heals all allies' HP by 8% of DMG.
[Soulrush] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and heals all allies' HP by 10% of DMG.
[Soulrush] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and heals all allies' HP by 12% of DMG.
[Soulrush] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and heals all allies' HP by14% of DMG.
[Soulrush] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and heals all allies' HP by 17% of DMG.
[Soulrush] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and heals all allies' HP by 20% of DMG.
ut.story: An ornament that was used for the memorial ceremonies of deceased royalty in ancient times. Inside the green jewel, there's a crystallized tear of the mythical creature that leads people to death. It's used as a resting places to comfort the emptiness within souls.

s4.name: Spiritual Tuning
s4.description: Every 7 sec, an ally with the lowest Hp recovers 1 orb of mana and {0} HP.

books.2: MP recovery rate is increased by {0}%.

s4.light: Uses the skill every 5 sec.
s4.dark: Also supplies 1 orb of mana to the ally with the highest ATK.

t5.dark: Upon attacking, there is a 10% chance to reduce all DEF of the target by 20% and reduce all the hero's cooldowns by 5%.

17.name: Dimael
17.subtitle: Shadow Hunter
17.description: A Dark Elf who hunts enemies in the shadows. His vengeful crossbow pierces his enemies with pitch-black darkness.
17.story: This lonely Dark Elf swore vengeance against his own race for the death of his sister. Having barely survived his deployment to the Aegina Desert, the only thing waiting for him back home was the dreadful news that his sister had been killed as an Elven sacrifice. As he cried out her name in the darkness, he began succumbing to madness. Eventually, he swore an oath of hatred and vengeance against his own kind, the murderers of his sister.
17.dislike: His fellow kinsmen who let his sister die

inn.idle: Ephigael...

recruit.greet: Ah..it's you.
talk: Stop staring.
Bothersome. Leave me be.
...Get to the point.
recruit.gift: ...For me? Hmph, why not. No point in letting it go to waste.

affinity.greet: This place isn't so bad.
talk: I like shaded areas. I hate the glaring brightness.
Darkness is my primal source of my power.
affinity.gift: Why do you keep giving me these things? I hate dealing with troublesome things like this.

relationship.greet: So, you're here. Find anything useful?
talk: When is the next hunt? I do hope it is as fruitful as the last.
This dark power is mine now. I shall continue to wield it as I see fit.
My revenge isn't truly over...but at least for the time being, I feel at ease.

uw.name: Tears of the Moon, Nerius
description: Each attack has a 10% chance of dealing 100% of ATK as M.DMG, and all skill cooldown is reduced by 10%.
Each attack has a 12% chance of dealing 120% of ATK as M.DMG, and all skill cooldown is reduced by 10%.
Each attack has a 14% chance of dealing 140% of ATK as M.DMG, and all skill cooldown is reduced by 10%.
Each attack has a 17% chance of dealing 170% of ATK as M.DMG, and all skill cooldown is reduced by 10%.
Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing 210% of ATK as M.DMG, and all skill cooldown is reduced by 10%.
Each attack has a 25% chance of dealing 250% of ATK as M.DMG, and all skill cooldown is reduced by 10%.
uw.story: A treasure of the Dark Elves created using a powerful moonlight stone from Arrovina and a moon tree branch of the highest quality. Nerius is a perfect medium for Moonlight Magic, and it is one of the most powerful magic weapons of the Dark Elves. However, it is said that the beautiful silver light of the moon can easily be tainted by darkness. A sublime love has turned into deep darkness, and the dark elf longing for vengeance has fused that darkness into this weapon.

s1.name: Dark Rampage
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to an enemy.
s1.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s1.dark: Has a 25% chance of Blinding the enemy for 5 sec.

s2.name: Black Shackle
s2.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and shackles them for {1} sec.
s2.dark: Hit enemies are drawn together.

ut.name: Unbreakable Bracelet
description: [Black Shackle] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the target by 10% for 10 sec.
[Black Shackle] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the target by 12% for 10 sec.
[Black Shackle] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the target by 14% for 10 sec.
[Black Shackle] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the target by 17% for 10 sec.
[Black Shackle] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the target by 21% for 10 sec.
[Black Shackle] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the target by 25% for 10 sec.
ut.story: A bracelet that was shared with Epigael a long time ago. It has shadow morion hanging, which is a precious jewel amongst the Dark Elves. It is said that those who cut off the shadow morion and will have a thread of their souls, which will lead them to meet again in the next life.

s3.name: Shadow Wave
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in a straight line and inflicts Blind for {1} sec.
s3.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.
s3.dark: Dispels positive effects of all enemies in range.

ut.name: Eye of Shadows
description: [Shadow Wave] DMG is increased by 50% and Blind duration is increased by 2 sec.
[Shadow Wave] DMG is increased by 50% and Blind duration is increased by 2.5 sec.
[Shadow Wave] DMG is increased by 50% and Blind duration is increased by 3 sec.
[Shadow Wave] DMG is increased by 50% and Blind duration is increased by 3.5 sec.
[Shadow Wave] DMG is increased by 50% and Blind duration is increased by 4 sec.
[Shadow Wave] DMG is increased by 50% and Blind duration is increased by 4.5 sec.
ut.story: Tear fragments of the beast Heltanios, who lived at the bottom of the Fountain of Life. It spews out pitch darkness, and those who see its eyes end up having their souls stolen by the powerful dark energy. Those who become the master of these eyes will obtain great power and insight. When Dimael was captured in Aegina and was at the brink of death, Maria embedded these eye fragments.

s4.name: Black Stain
s4.description: Each auto attack deals extra {0} M.DMG that ignores target's M.DEF.
s4.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s4.dark: There is a 10% chance that Skill 1 is fired upon an auto-attack.

t5.dark: Upon auto attacking, deal extra M.DMG worth 80% of ATK and recover 100 mana. There is a 10% chance of dealing double DMG and recovering double mana.

18.name: Reina
18.subtitle: Lightning Flash
18.description: A mercenary who wields a light, one-handed sword. Dodges attacks with nimble movements and pierces the enemy with the sharp end of her sword.
18.story: Reina von Stein was born the daughter of a noble family of the empire. Her free spirit and energetic personality seem to brighten up even those around her. She prefers a life of freedom as a mercenary over the suffocating life of an aristocrat. After working as a mercenary for a long time, and she's already lost all traces of her noble upbringing in her manners. Even as a child, she showed a natural talent with swords. Over the years, she developed her skills with a rapier, using a style that best suited her lithe physique. Recently, she turned down a strange contract. Ever since then, she has been feeling as if someone has been following and watching her.

inn.idle: A good job offer! Ah, but the employer is a bit...

recruit.greet: Whoa, handsome...Ah, hello!
talk: Need a mercenary? I'm one of the best.
Wow, such a cutie...oh, it's nothing, hehe...
Looking for Reina, the Lightning Flash? Hehe, yep, that's me!
recruit.gift: Eh? A present? Hehe, thanks. I'll give you a discount on the next job.

affinity.greet: Eek, this place is amazing!
talk: Do you have any clients to introduce me to? Someone good-looking if possible!!!
I don't like boring work! Heh heh!
affinity.gift: Wow! For me? Really? Heh heh, you're the best!

relationship.greet: Hey there, good looking! It's been a while!
talk: People these days! They think I'm some kind of pervert, but that's a misunderstanding! I just like men's bodies!
At times, I grow reminiscent of the better life. You know, like in moments where it's raining outside and you have to sleep in the mud.
Even while working as a mercenary, sometimes the jobs are't quite savory. It makes me think...about this and that...

uw.name: Lightning Flash, Livatis
description: Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 80 and Crit DMG is increased by 20% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 90 and Crit DMG is increased by 24% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 110 and Crit DMG is increased by 28% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 130 and Crit DMG is increased by 34% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 160 and Crit DMG is increased by 41% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 200 and Crit DMG is increased by 50% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
uw.story: The Stein family boasts a long lineage that dates back to the early days of the empire. The honor of the family, however, stems from the skills of its warriors, not its noble bloodline. Aria Stein was a legendary master of the blade. Remembered as one of the most skilled warriors in the history of the empire, she laid the foundation of the Stein family honor. Reina is her descendant. Aria's sword, Livatas, currently belongs to Reina. Light as a feather yet strong enough to withstand any strike, this sword helped Reina earn the nickname 'Flash.'

s1.name: Float Like a Butterfly
s1.description: Rapidly stabs the enemy, dealing {0} P.DMG. Upon a Crit Hit, stacks 1 Wound and resets cooldown. Per every stacked Wound, DMG dealt by Float Like a Butterfly is increased by 20%. Gains immunity to all DMG while the skill is in use.
s1.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 and Wound stack max is changed to 10. Deals 100% of ATK as extra DMG to enemies with 10 Wounds.
s1.dark: Cooldown is removed.

s2.name: Sharp End
s2.description: Increases ATK by {1} for {0} sec and increases Crit Chance by {2}. This effect cannot be dispelled.

books.2: Crit Chance boost is increased by {0}%.

s2.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, Crit Chance effect is changed to a 100% Crit DMG boost. Also gains a 25% DMG boost towards Bosses.

ut.name: Master's Ring
description: [Sharp End] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and recovers additional 40 MP upon a Crit Hit for the skill's duration.
[Sharp End] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and recovers additional 48 MP upon a Crit Hit for the skill's duration.
[Sharp End] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and recovers additional 58 MP upon a Crit Hit for the skill's duration.
[Sharp End] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and recovers additional 70 MP upon a Crit Hit for the skill's duration.
[Sharp End] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and recovers additional 84 MP upon a Crit Hit for the skill's duration.
[Sharp End] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and recovers additional 100 MP upon a Crit Hit for the skill's duration.
ut.story: The ring that Reina received after defeating her master. It's too big, so she wears it on her thumb. It looks simple and ungainly, but the spirit of fighting is hidden within the rune letters engraved in the ring. Staring at the ring of her master makes her feel like she will be getting more work today.

s3.name: Shooting Star
s3.description: Inflicts {0} P.DMG upon enemy with a continuous attack. The last hit blows the enemy away.
s3.light: Each crit boosts the last attack's DMG by 10%.
s3.dark: Gain immunity to all DMG while using skill.

ut.name: Medal of Swiftness
description: [Shooting Star] DMG is increased by 20% and upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 200.
[Shooting Star] DMG is increased by 24% and upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 200.
[Shooting Star] DMG is increased by 29% and upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 200.
[Shooting Star] DMG is increased by 35% and upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 200.
[Shooting Star] DMG is increased by 42% and upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 200.
[Shooting Star] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 200.
ut.story: A honorable medal given to the fastest mercenary. It's said to be a keepsake from Hersz, the fastest warrior in the world. Wearing this medal will make the bearer's body feel lighter, and they'll be able to predict the opponent's movements.

s4.name: Lucky Child
s4.description: Upon a Crit Hit, ATK is increased by {1} for {0} sec. Can be stacked up to 8 times max.

books.2: Penetration is increased by {0} for the duration of skill.

s4.light: Per each stack, DMG is increased by 4% to enemies other than heroes.
s4.dark: With 5 or more stacks, increases All Resistance by 20%.

t5.dark: When auto attacking, there is a 10% chance to increase Crit DMG by 100% for 5 sec.

19.name: Pavel
19.subtitle: Wizard of Ice Dragon
19.description: A wizard capable of using the Ice Dragon's magic powers after being cursed. He uses powerful icebound magic to freeze enemies.
19.story: A curious case of a human wizard possessed by the soul of an ice dragon. Having fought alongside Kyle 100 years ago, this ancient ice wizard has actually existed far before even then. The dragon's soul is usually asleep, but wakes up occasionally to speak to him in the voice of a lover. The empire considers him a key figure, and has dispatched Rodina to monitor and protect him. He himself, however, only wishes to live in peace and quiet, away from the concerns of the world.

inn.idle: ...So many people.

recruit.greet: ...Do you need something?
talk: So loud...
...I need to cool my head a bit.
What would Master have done...
recruit.gift: ..I accept.

affinity.greet: Why is this place so warm...?
talk: Be quiet... Let me rest now...
I can't feel any coldness from you...
affinity.gift: ....Thank you.

relationship.greet: ...You look well.
talk: I was originally human...so I can understand.
Are you curious about dragons...?
Her soul whispers to me...she is curious about you...

uw.name: Dragon Hearts, Andarta Andraste
description: Every 15 sec, deals 160% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 14 sec, deals 192% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 12.5 sec, deals 228% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 11 sec, deals 276% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 9.5 sec, deals 332% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 8 sec, deals 400% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
uw.story: Andarta and Andraste were two dragons who were defeated by the Demons during the war. They were a pair connected at the soul. They were lovers who understood each other better than anyone. Even as they lay dying, they refused to stay apart, and made one final request to Pavel, their comrade. Pavel granted their final wish by transferring their souls into their hearts, and then turning them into a pair of gems. Even though the two have lost their bodies, they remain together, and as inseparable as ever.

s1.name: Wedge of Cold Snap
s1.description: Deal {0} M.DMG to the targeted enemy and inflict Freeze for {1} sec. If any enemies are inflicted with Frost, deal DMG and inflict Freeze to them as well.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, Freeze duration is boosted by 5 sec.

s2.name: Ice Spear
s2.description: Attacks random enemies 5 times, dealing {0} M.DMG and inflicting Frost. When attacking enemies inflicted with Frost, creates an additional spear that deals extra half DMG. Additional spears do not inflict Frost. Enemies inflicted with Freeze take 50% increased DMG.
s2.dark: Target changes to the enemy with the highest ATK.

ut.name: Frozen Brooch
description: [Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 40% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.
[Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 48% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.
[Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 58% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.
[Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 70% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.
[Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 84% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.
[Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 100% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.
ut.story: The dragon of ice gifted this brooch to a young Pavel, and imbued it with its breath. But after the dragon of ice and Pavel became one, it reminds Pavel to not leave him. It can inflict pain that pierces the heart. Imbues a chill to Pavel's mana, making his magic even sharper.

s3.name: Icy Conquest
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to all enemies. Enemies inflicted with Frost becomes inflicted with Freeze for {1} sec. Enemies inflicted with Freeze take {2}% increased DMG.
s3.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s3.dark: Gain CC immunity while using said skill.

ut.name: Glacial Heart
description: [Icy Conquest] DMG is increased by 50% and Freeze duration is increased by 1 sec.
[Icy Conquest] DMG is increased by 50% and Freeze duration is increased by 1.2 sec.
[Icy Conquest] DMG is increased by 50% and Freeze duration is increased by 1.4 sec.
[Icy Conquest] DMG is increased by 50% and Freeze duration is increased by 1.7 sec.
[Icy Conquest] DMG is increased by 50% and Freeze duration is increased by 2.1 sec.
[Icy Conquest] DMG is increased by 50% and Freeze duration is increased by 2.5 sec.
ut.story: Frozen blood of the winter spirit. Pavel found it deep inside the Ice Cave and made it into earrings. A harsh chill and severe pain can be felt from it, but it increases Pavel's mana to its limit.

s4.name: Chill of Early Dawn
s4.description: Deals {1} M.DMG to 3 enemies every {0} sec and inflicts Frost on them to reduce their ATK Spd by 100 for 8 sec.
s4.light: Target's CC resistance is reduced by 250 for 10 sec.
s4.dark: Frost cannot be dispelled by dispel skills.

t5.dark: Every 3 sec, attacks all enemies and deals 50% of ATK as M.DMG, inflicting Frost with 50% chance. Enemies already inflicted with Frost takes 300% of ATK as M.DMG over time for 3 sec.

20.name: Demia
20.subtitle: Fortress of Steel
20.description: This guardian knight carries a gigantic lance and shield. Endures the attack of enemies with absolute fortitude and disturbs enemy lines with her lance.
20.story: Ziltrion Si Demia. The commander of the Guardian Knights of Orvel. She is a mighty and dignified knight who wields a lance and a giant shield. It is said that penetrating her shield is next to impossible. As a knight commander, she cherishes her subordinates, and is prepared to perform any task in service of her land. Having felt the recent change of the atmosphere within the royal palace, she hopes to quickly appoint Clause as the next commander so that she may protect Scarlet from the aggression of the nobles.

inn.idle: Make yourself fully prepared for the battle tomorrow.

recruit.greet: Nice to meet you, soldiers. I am Demia Ziltrion, head of the Royal Garrison.
talk: The royal garrison is strong. Nars Horrun will lead the troops in replacement of myself.
My father has spent years as the head of garrison, too. He wanted me to grow up as a normal child, but his blood runs through my vein.
I will defeat the Evil King and bring peace back to the realm.
recruit.gift: I should share this with my soldiers.

affinity.greet: Thank you for inviting me.
talk: Please let me know if you find out anything about the Dark Force.
We are ready to fight anytime. For Orvelia!
affinity.gift: I'll share this with the soldiers.

relationship.greet: I hear you have been looking for me. What is it?
talk: I worry about the princess. She's still young and gentle...it must be hard.
Hmph, why can't that tin can stay around and protect the princess...such a bothersome man...
Me? Um, well...going out to battle alongside you isn't all that bad. It is good exercise.

uw.name: The Blue Light, Arpheus
description: Increases P.DEF of all allies by 4%. Blocking an enemy attack has a 10% chance to recover 3% Mana and reduce Cooldown of all skills by 1 sec.
Increases P.DEF of all allies by 4.8%. Blocking an enemy attack has a 12% chance to recover 3.3% Mana and reduce Cooldown of all skills by 1 sec.
Increases P.DEF of all allies by 5.8%. Blocking an enemy attack has a 14% chance to recover 3.6% Mana and reduce Cooldown of all skills by 1 sec.
Increases P.DEF of all allies by 7%. Blocking an enemy attack has a 17% chance to recover 3.9% Mana and reduce Cooldown of all skills by 1 sec.
Increases P.DEF of all allies by 8.4%. Blocking an enemy attack has a 21% chance to recover 4.2% Mana and reduce Cooldown of all skills by 1 sec.
Increases P.DEF of all allies by 10%. Blocking an enemy attack has a 25% chance to recover 4.5% Mana and reduce Cooldown of all skills by 1 sec.
uw.story: One day, a vein exuding powerful mana was discovered in the territory of Ziltrion. While investigating, Demia found a blue ore, the likes of which she had never seen before. Numerous wizards and alchemists studied this mysterious ore with the characteristics of both gem and metal, but no one could figure out its identity. Jin the blacksmith, however, had a different idea. As soon as he saw the ore, he offered Demia to craft powerful gears out of it, with a big smile on his face. With it, he forged a lance and a shield, glowing blue with mana and tougher than diamond.

s1.name: Penetration
s1.description: Throws a spear at the furthest enemy, dealing {0} P.DMG and drawing the enemy in front of the hero. Then deals {1} P.DMG to enemies in range, stunning them for 3 sec.

books.2: Stun duration is increased by {0} sec.

s1.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, pull in 2 enemies.
s1.dark: All pulled enemies take 25% increased DMG from all sources for 10 sec.

s2.name: Will to Win
s2.description: Upon blocking enemy attack for {0} sec, triggers a shockwave that deals {1} P.DMG to enemies in range, reducing their ATK by {2}%.

books.2: Enemy ATK reduction is increased by {0}%.

s2.dark: Ally P.DEF is boosted by 20% for 10 sec after activation.

ut.name: Shield of Resolution
description: [Will to Win] Increases DMG by 50% and P.Weakness of the target by 10% for 10 sec.
[Will to Win] Increases DMG by 50% and P.Weakness of the target by 12% for 10 sec.
[Will to Win] Increases DMG by 50% and P.Weakness of the target by 14% for 10 sec.
[Will to Win] Increases DMG by 50% and P.Weakness of the target by 17% for 10 sec.
[Will to Win] Increases DMG by 50% and P.Weakness of the target by 21% for 10 sec.
[Will to Win] Increases DMG by 50% and P.Weakness of the target by 25% for 10 sec.
ut.story: A wooden shield that Demia used as a child for practice. It's been used over a thousand times and is very worn out. Demia uses it to regain her composure when she feels like she has hit a limit. Her pride as a knight of Orvelia resurfaces when she sees this old, worn-out shield.

s3.name: Steel Fortress
s3.description: Upon DMG block during casting, jump attack DMG is increased by 7%. Also, deals {1} P.DMG to enemy and inflicts stun. After casting, jumps and attacks the enemy, dealing {2} P.DMG and stunning them for {3} sec. Gains immunity to CC while the skill is in use.
s3.light: Upon jumping into the air, charge at the target with the highest ATK.
s3.dark: While casting, all allies take 20% reduced P.DMG.

ut.name: Aura of Protection
description: [Steel Fortress] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and jump attack's Stun duration is increased by 1 sec.
[Steel Fortress] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and jump attack's Stun duration is increased by 1.5 sec.
[Steel Fortress] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and jump attack's Stun duration is increased by 2 sec.
[Steel Fortress] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and jump attack's Stun duration is increased by 2.5 sec.
[Steel Fortress] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and jump attack's Stun duration is increased by 3 sec.
[Steel Fortress] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and jump attack's Stun duration is increased by 3.5 sec.
ut.story: A stone known to protect one's soul from being absorbed by evil. It only shines for a while at dawn, so it's hard to find. One day, when Demia was tired from battle, a comrade put this in her hands. Even though it's a comrade that she can't ever see again... Demia always takes this stone when going out to the battlefield. She does her best to uphold her vow to never let the sacrifices of her comrades be in vain.

s4.name: Spearhead
s4.description: All allies' P.DEF is increased by {0} and P.Block chance is increased by {1}.
s4.light: P.DEF is increased by 20% and P. Block is boosted by 50%.
s4.dark: Recovers HP equal to 40% of P.DEF upon blocking.

t5.dark: At the beginning of every battle, decrease the ATK of all enemies by 20% for 6 sec. This effect cannot be dispelled.

21.name: Naila
21.subtitle: Wind's Fighter
21.description: A harpy that specializes in melee combat using her knuckles. Quickly moves between the enemy, wreaking havoc upon them. Smashes enemies by launching powerful consecutive attacks.
21.story: A stout and honorable warrior of the Harpies, the wielders of the power of wind. Her dignity as a Harpy warrior is more important to her than anything else in the world. She draws upon her willpower and desire to uphold her warrior's honor to bring down any enemy. Her skills are exceptional, even among her peers, and she is the ideal role model for younger Harpy warriors.
21.like: Fellow kinsmen, those who possess a warrior's pride

inn.idle: What is the matter, human warrior?

recruit.greet: I want to spar with you one day.
talk: Himmullis...
It is an absurd thing to think that a borrowed power is one's own.
I never forget the pride of Elidora harpies.
recruit.gift: You sure know what harpies like.

affinity.greet: So, this is what a human's house looks like.
talk: My sister always told me to remember the pride of a Harpy.
I will become the best Harpy warrior in the world.
affinity.gift: I'll pay you back.

relationship.greet: How are you doing? Did you continue your training?
talk: A true warrior never stops developing their skills!
Honor, pride - some may call them useless, but they are important to me.
Next time, let's spar, one on one. Alright?

uw.name: Cursed Claws, Baroro
description: Upon a Crit Hit, deals 150% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 20% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.
Upon a Crit Hit, deals 180% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 24% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.
Upon a Crit Hit, deals 216% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 28% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.
Upon a Crit Hit, deals 258% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 34% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.
Upon a Crit Hit, deals 310% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 41% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.
Upon a Crit Hit, deals 500% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 50% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.
uw.story: A cursed pair of gauntlets crafted from the claws of the Mad Demon Baroro, which was defeated during the war. Several times the size of the average human hands, these gauntlets directly connect to the nerves of the wearer, allowing the wielder to control them effortlessly. Although they grant immense power, they also break into the mind of the wearer, slowing eating away at the soul. Only a true warrior of noble conviction, strong will and undying spirit may handle these cursed weapons. They are the perfect weapons for a warrior with a strong will that shines even in the darkness of the abyss.

s1.name: Fierce Winds
s1.description: Dashes toward the enemy 2 times, dealing {0} P.DMG to enemies in range, knocking them down for {1} sec. If the target is not a Hero, deals {2} additional P.DMG.
s1.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s1.dark: Target changes to the enemy with the highest ATK.

s2.name: Wind Reading
s2.description: All allies' P.Dodge Chance is increased by {1} for {0} sec, and ATK is increased by {2}.
s2.dark: Increases Naila's DMG dealt on non-Hero enemies by 30% for the duration of skill.

ut.name: Himmullis's Scarf
description: [Wind Reading] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and M.Dodge by 100.
[Wind Reading] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and M.Dodge by 120.
[Wind Reading] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and M.Dodge by 140.
[Wind Reading] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and M.Dodge by 170.
[Wind Reading] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and M.Dodge by 210.
[Wind Reading] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and M.Dodge by 250.
ut.story: The scarf that the dead Himmullis had on. Naila always has it on her. Himmullis use to always tell Naila to be proud of being a Harpy. The scarf contains the sadness of losing family, and this makes Naila furious.

s3.name: Dive Bomb
s3.description: Flies up and strikes {0} P.DMG to enemies in range. Knocked down enemies take {1}% increased DMG. If the target is not a Hero, deals {2} additional P.DMG.

books.2: Hit enemies are stunned for 3 sec.

s3.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Reduces cooldown by 10% per each enemy that takes Critical DMG.

ut.name: Tempest Pride
description: [Dive Bomb] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and target takes 10% more P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Dive Bomb] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and target takes 12% more P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Dive Bomb] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and target takes 14% more P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Dive Bomb] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and target takes 17% more P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Dive Bomb] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and target takes 21% more P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Dive Bomb] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and target takes 25% more P.DMG for 10 sec.
ut.story: A ritual offering of ancient religious people who worshipped the wind. It is a precious treasure among the Harpies, and it is said to be given to the most powerful Harpy warrior. The moment one wears this mask, they'll be able to freely use the wind. They can also attack at the speed of light.

s4.name: Tornado Strike
s4.description: Every 5th auto attack has a 40% chance of dealing extra {0} P.DMG to target and knocking them down.
s4.light: Activation chance changes to 60%.
s4.dark: Atk Spd is boosted by 300 when effect takes place.

t5.dark: Upon dodging, all skill cooldowns are reduced by 2%. Also, ATK is boosted by 3%, and Atk Spd is boosted by 30. The ATK and Atk Spd Boosts can stack up to 10 times.

22.name: Rodina
22.subtitle: Blizard's Sniper
22.description: She is a sniper from an empire located in an extremely cold environment. She aims calmly no matter the circumstance. The more she focuses, the more powerful she becomes.
22.story: The empire's top ranking sniper, and a lover of bears. She likes them so much that she always wears accessories resembling a bear's ears on her hat. So, she'll sometimes hunts tigers, but she'll never shoot a bear. Although her shooting skills are most suitable for assassination, she swore to never use them for unjust reasons. Instead, she uses them to protect others. Currently, she lives with Pavel in the Windland Snow Mountain as his personal guard delegated by the empire.
22.like: Bears, polar bears, grizzly bears, small bears, large bears
22.dislike: Those who do not value live

inn.idle: Preparations for the next journey ~hmhmhm~ (humming)

recruit.greet: Salutations! Have a good day~
talk: Eat well, fight well!!
So, I've heard grilled Muhrooms are delicious? I'll have one, yay!!
Do you like veggies? I love them!
recruit.gift: Thank you!! Thank you for the meals!!

affinity.greet: Oh! Thank you for the invite!
talk: I'm hungry! Please give me food!
Vegetables! Muhroom!
affinity.gift: Thank you for the food!

relationship.greet: Ah!? Salutations!! Have you eaten yet!
talk: A soldier's gun is equal to their life! Would you like to see my well-maintained rifle!?
The frost mage who lives in the Ice Cavern is far more gentle than you think! He still tries to pretend otherwise, so I turn a blind eye!
Is Sir Fluss not here? Thanks to him, life isn't all that bad!

uw.name: Rodina Custom Rifle Mod.0
description: Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing 200% of ATK as extra P.DMG and knocking back the enemy. Afterwards, ACC is increased by 100 for 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times max.
Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing 240% of ATK as extra P.DMG and knocking back the enemy. Afterwards, ACC is increased by 100 for 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times max.
Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing 288% of ATK as extra P.DMG and knocking back the enemy. Afterwards, ACC is increased by 100 for 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times max.
Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing 344% of ATK as extra P.DMG and knocking back the enemy. Afterwards, ACC is increased by 100 for 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times max.
Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing 414% of ATK as extra P.DMG and knocking back the enemy. Afterwards, ACC is increased by 100 for 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times max.
Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing 500% of ATK as extra P.DMG and knocking back the enemy. Afterwards, ACC is increased by 100 for 10 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times max.
uw.story: The essence of the most sophisticated imperial technology. Requiring superhuman precision, this rifle cannot be handled by a regular person. It has been magically enchanted to allow the shooter to see impossibly long distances. Even the greatest scope in the world, however, is useless in the hands of someone who can't aim with it. As such, the performance of this rifle has significantly depended on the skills of its users. Rodina, gifted with superb vision and precise control, is a suitable owner of this rifle. She went one step further and customized it to her preference, naming it Rodina Custom.

s1.name: Penetration Shot
s1.description: Upon activation, takes up a stance and starts casting. After casting ends, deals {0} P.DMG upon enemies in a straight line. DMG is increased by {1}% in proportion to the total casting time. If casting progresses beyond the 3rd stage, knock over enemies.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Gain CC immunity while using said skill.

s2.name: Target Aim
s2.description: Target receives {0}% increased damage from this hero. In addition, own ATK is increased by {1}.

books.2: Crit DMG is increased by {0}% for the duration of skill

s2.light: ATK Spd is boosted by 250 for the duration.
s2.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Crystal Support
description: [Target Aim] Changes the target to a random enemy when Rodina's target dies, increasing ATK by 20% for 10 sec.
[Target Aim] Changes the target to a random enemy when Rodina's target dies, increasing ATK by 24% for 10 sec.
[Target Aim] Changes the target to a random enemy when Rodina's target dies, increasing ATK by 29% for 10 sec.
[Target Aim] Changes the target to a random enemy when Rodina's target dies, increasing ATK by 35% for 10 sec.
[Target Aim] Changes the target to a random enemy when Rodina's target dies, increasing ATK by 42% for 10 sec.
[Target Aim] Changes the target to a random enemy when Rodina's target dies, increasing ATK by 50% for 10 sec.
ut.story: A sniper rifle support that Pavel made so that it would fit Rodina's small body. It's made of crystals so it's very firm and sturdy. This support is enough to aim at any target.

s3.name: Focused Fire
s3.description: Fires 10 shots at random. Deals {0} DMG upon attack, and per each attack, DMG is increased by {1}%.
s3.light: Reduces cooldown by 5% when Critical Hits occur.
s3.dark: Ignores enemy Block.

ut.name: Custom Bullet VII
description: [Focused Fire] Increases DMG by 20% and inflicts damage ignoring the target's DEF with the last 2 shots.
[Focused Fire] Increases DMG by 24% and inflicts damage ignoring the target's DEF with the last 2 shots.
[Focused Fire] Increases DMG by 29% and inflicts damage ignoring the target's DEF with the last 2 shots.
[Focused Fire] Increases DMG by 35% and inflicts damage ignoring the target's DEF with the last 2 shots.
[Focused Fire] Increases DMG by 42% and inflicts damage ignoring the target's DEF with the last 2 shots.
[Focused Fire] Increases DMG by 50% and inflicts damage ignoring the target's DEF with the last 2 shots.
ut.story: A barrage that was requested to the legendary blacksmith of the empire. It contains gunpowder made from the sturdy egg of a pitta and the jaw bone of a dragon turtle. It was made small so that Rodina can use it easily, but it has the power to destroy anything.

s4.name: Rapid Shot
s4.description: Every 10 sec, attacks the target 2 times, dealing a total of {0} P.DMG.
s4.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s4.dark: Enemies hit are stunned for 2 sec.

t5.dark: Increases ATK by 20% for 10 seconds and sets 3 random enemies as Rodina's target at the start of every battle.

23.name: Morrah
23.subtitle: Devil's Flame
23.description: A demon knight that uses the lava of the Dark Forces. Inflicts relentless burning pain on enemies, and fights battles of endurance utilizing her granite-like defense.
23.story: The former commander of the Dark Dragon Knights, she's the most gallant demon knight of the Demon Army. Currently, for some unknown reason, she is following the witch Maria and assisting her work. Many find it strange that the former champion of the Demon Army, who slaughtered countless enemies and even devoured dragons, now works for a mere witch as her servant. Nevertheless, she continues to faithfully serve her master.

inn.idle: What is it? Do you want to die?

recruit.greet: Do not mess with me.
talk: I will not fight anyone within this Inn. But, you'd better stay away from me outside.
Seems like your life is filled with leisure. In that case, how about giving me your head?
Don't talk to me.
recruit.gift: I want to see your blood, not this.

affinity.greet: How shabby.
talk: Stop bothering me if you don't want to die.
Don't bother me. I didn't have a choice.
affinity.gift: You think I'd like this?

relationship.greet: You're here. Is the next battle decided?
talk: I have pledged my allegience to Maria. However...I have a debt to pay to you as well.
General of the Draconics...Yes, that was my past. I didn't have any other goals...
I am a Demon created for destruction, a Draconic...but still...

uw.name: Flame of Victory, Carprain
description: Every 10 sec, deals 80% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Flame and has a 14% chance of knocking them down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%.
Every 10 sec, deals 96% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Flame and has a 16% chance of knocking them down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%.
Every 10 sec, deals 115% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Flame and has a 20% chance of knocking them down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%.
Every 10 sec, deals 138% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Flame and has a 24% chance of knocking them down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%.
Every 10 sec, deals 166% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Flame and has a 29% chance of knocking them down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%.
Every 10 sec, deals 200% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Flame and has a 35% chance of knocking them down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%.
uw.story: In the heart of the Dragia Volcano, there exists a smithy. Hundreds of years ago, Temeraire, the ancient fire dragon, created a set of magically enchanted gear. Using lava infused with the power of the volcanic fire, he forged a shield and a sword capable of incinerating anything. During the war against Demons, Temeraire presented these to a human warrior. Unfortunately, the warrior is said to have been defeated by Morrah. No one has seen this legendary gear since then. That is, until Morrah reappeared on the front line.

s1.name: Burning Power
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and knocks them down, inflicting 3 stacks of Flame. Then for {1} sec, each auto attack deals {2} M.DMG and inflicts 1 stack of Flame on enemy. Per each stacked Flame, DMG is increased by {3}%. Each Flame stack deals separate M.DMG and reduces Heal rate by 1%.
s1.light: ATK Spd. is increased by 200 for 15 sec.
s1.dark: Reduces cooldown by 6% per each enemy hit.

s2.name: Hellfire
s2.description: For {0} sec, all allies' M.DEF is increased by {1} and M.Block Chance is increased by {2}. Additionally, every {3} sec, inflicts 1 stack of Flame on nearby enemies.

books.2: M.Block Chance boost is increased by {0}%.

s2.dark: While Hellfire is active, deal DMG based on own M.DEF to nearby enemies.

ut.name: Hatchling Leather Gloves
description: [Hellfire] Upon blocking target's M.ATK during the skill's duration, DMG reduction is increased by 100 and M.Crit resistance is increased by 250.
[Hellfire] Upon blocking target's M.ATK during the skill's duration, DMG reduction is increased by 120 and M.Crit resistance is increased by 250.
[Hellfire] Upon blocking target's M.ATK during the skill's duration, DMG reduction is increased by 140 and M.Crit resistance is increased by 250.
[Hellfire] Upon blocking target's M.ATK during the skill's duration, DMG reduction is increased by 170 and M.Crit resistance is increased by 250.
[Hellfire] Upon blocking target's M.ATK during the skill's duration, DMG reduction is increased by 210 and M.Crit resistance is increased by 250.
[Hellfire] Upon blocking target's M.ATK during the skill's duration, DMG reduction is increased by 250 and M.Crit resistance is increased by 250.
ut.story: Gloves made with a dark Hatchling's bones and skin. Morrah made it a hundred years ago by collecting the Hatchlings she killed when she went out to hunt dragons. It's very durable to even withstand Morrah's flames, and even imbues a stronger power to let those flames blaze up even more. Morrah really likes these gloves.

s3.name: Lava Eruption
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and inflict knock down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by {1}%.
s3.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Heals HP equal to 40% of DMG dealt.

ut.name: Hellish Sealing Stone
description: [Lava Eruption] DMG is increased by 20% and target's M.DEF is decreased by 25% for 7 sec.
[Lava Eruption] DMG is increased by 24% and target's M.DEF is decreased by 25% for 7 sec.
[Lava Eruption] DMG is increased by 29% and target's M.DEF is decreased by 25% for 7 sec.
[Lava Eruption] DMG is increased by 35% and target's M.DEF is decreased by 25% for 7 sec.
[Lava Eruption] DMG is increased by 42% and target's M.DEF is decreased by 25% for 7 sec.
[Lava Eruption] DMG is increased by 50% and target's M.DEF is decreased by 25% for 7 sec.
ut.story: A strange fragment that came from the Dimensional Rift. Inside the fragment, there's a flame that kills anything that is living. The energy from its dimension is condensed within it. It's absolutely needed to complete Maria's plan.

s4.name: Fire Smash
s4.description: Upon Block, deals {1} M.DMG to enemies in range, and inflicts 3 stack of Flame.
s4.light: Increases own M.DEF by 5% per each block. Max stack is 10.
s4.dark: Target with over 100 stacks of Flame takes 40% increased M.DMG.

t5.dark: Flame stack DMG is increased by 100%, and max stack number is changed to 120

24.name: Baudouin
24.subtitle: Holy Ruffian
24.description: A freewheeling priest from the Order of Lua. He uses a holy explosion to protect the party, which heals allies and damages enemies at once.
24.story: As the most unlikely priest in the Church of Lua, Baudouin is, in a word, a maverick. Since childhood, he has always been a black sheep in the Church of Lua that emphasizes piety. He entered the church with the help of the High Priest Berman, but the religious life was painfully ill-suited for him. One day, however, he suddenly decided to quit his deviant ways, and started following the path of the high priesthood.

inn.idle: Whew, I see some quality wine in here! Another bottle for me, missy!

recruit.greet: Hey, whats up? You look pretty strong, eh?
talk: Stiff and stuffy isn't my style!
Oh, wanna brawl? I ain't gonna lose in a slugfest!
As god decrees, a man should live by his fist!
recruit.gift: Gahahaha, ain't you the generous one!! Sure, let's have a drink!

affinity.greet: This wild and unrestrained atmosphere! I love it!
talk: Violence should be met with violence! That's what the gods have said! Kwahahaha!
My friend! Let's have a drink!
affinity.gift: Kwahahaha, I'll give you Lua's blessing in return!

relationship.greet: Wow! Huh, you seem to be really blessed by the Goddess! You're practically shining!
talk: If I went to the Empire at that time...father, was I really right...
Eh, the Order of Lua isn't what you think it is, you know? God or not, it's still just a group of people.
There's one thing I want to say to you. Enjoy life while you can! You know, life is short! You don't want to regret anything!

uw.name: God's Book, Genesis
description: Increases the casting speed of all skills, and upon every skill use, increases ATK by 2% and DEF by 2% for all allies. This effect can stack up to 7 times.
Increases the casting speed of all skills, and upon every skill use, increases ATK by 2.4% and DEF by 2.4% for all allies. This effect can stack up to 7 times.
Increases the casting speed of all skills, and upon every skill use, increases ATK by 2.9% and DEF by 2.9% for all allies. This effect can stack up to 7 times.
Increases the casting speed of all skills, and upon every skill use, increases ATK by 3.5% and DEF by 3.5% for all allies. This effect can stack up to 7 times.
Increases the casting speed of all skills, and upon every skill use, increases ATK by 4.2% and DEF by 4.2% for all allies. This effect can stack up to 7 times.
Increases the casting speed of all skills, and upon every skill use, increases ATK by 5% and DEF by 5% for all allies. This effect can stack up to 7 times.
uw.story: Even among the holy relics bestowed to the high priests of the Church of Lua, the God's Book Genesis is special. According to the legend, this book, guarded throughout the ages by the Grand Priests of the church, was written by Lua herself. Iris, the current Grand Priest, upon receiving a revelation regarding Baudouin, entrusted this book to his step father, Berman. Later, the book was given to Baudouin when he became a high priest. It is said that this divine relic provides infinite holy energy to its owner, along with the power to unlock the true potential of those who have faith.

s1.name: Holy Nova
s1.description: Targets the ally with the lowest HP and allies nearby to heal {0} HP. Deals {1} M.DMG to enemies near the target, and reduces enemy ATK Spd by {3}% for {2} sec.

books.0: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.1: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.2: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.

s1.light: DMG and Heal rate is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Enemies hit are stunned for 1 sec.

s2.name: Spear of Light
s2.description: Deals {0} M.DMG, inflicts knockback, and shackles the target enemy for {1} sec. Enemies inflicted by shackle take 25% increased M.DMG while the effect lasts.
s2.dark: Number of targets changes to 2.

ut.name: Last Chapter of the Bible
description: [Spear of Light] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases M.Weakness of the target by 10% for 10 sec.
[Spear of Light] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases M.Weakness of the target by 12% for 10 sec.
[Spear of Light] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases M.Weakness of the target by 14% for 10 sec.
[Spear of Light] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases M.Weakness of the target by 17% for 10 sec.
[Spear of Light] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases M.Weakness of the target by 21% for 10 sec.
[Spear of Light] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases M.Weakness of the target by 25% for 10 sec.
ut.story: The last chapter of the legend that was too horrifying and terrifying to put in the Bible. It talks about the holy light that kills the darkest enemy in the world.

s3.name: Holy Sanctuary
s3.description: Grants Invincibility to all allies for {0} sec and heals {1} HP for the duration of skill.

books.2: ATK Spd is increased by {0} for the duration of skill.

s3.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s3.dark: In exchange for 2 additional Mana Cost and a 3 sec reduction of Invincibility duration, all allies gain 50% ATK.

ut.name: Well-Worn Rosary
description: [Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 120 Mana per sec.
[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 140 Mana per sec.
[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 170 Mana per sec.
[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 200 Mana per sec.
[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 250 Mana per sec.
[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 300 Mana per sec.
ut.story: The rosary that holy priest Evelyn of the Church of Lua carried until her death. It's as if Lua's holy voice can be heard from the rosary, praying that the world won't collapse. The undeniable holy energy engulfs the body, and it maximizes Baudouin's power.

s4.name: Training of God
s4.description: Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing {0} M.DMG to target and inflicting stun for {1} sec.
s4.light: Activation chance is boosted by 10%.
s4.dark: Attack range is boosted by 20%.

t5.dark: When attacking with Holy Nova and Spear of Light, deal extra M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK and reduce the used skill's cooldown by 20%.

25.name: Jane
25.subtitle: Alabaster Corpse
25.description: This girl has become an undead after fighting the Dark Forces in the past. She drags along the coffin that she sleeps in. She recovers herself by leaving a mark of death on her enemies.
25.story: She was once the princess of the fallen Republic of Gray. The Republic of Gray, wiped off the map by the Demon invaders during the Demon War, was the protector of countless secrets, including the ruins and technologies of an ancient civilization. Jane, too, lost her life to protect those secrets. Later, she was brought back to the world as an undead by Malduk, a high-ranking officer and a strategist of the Demon Army. She was given a new consciousness by a strange, dark magic. Now, she seeks to go on a journey to find her past self and her lost memories.

recruit.greet: ...Hello.
talk: Who are...you?
I...don't know you...
You...know me?
recruit.gift: Present...? Thanks...?

affinity.greet: Where... is this...?
talk: It's cold... No... Warm...
I... don't... remember... I... want... to remember...
affinity.gift: Gift...? Why do you keep giving me things?

relationship.greet: Welcome back...a greeting...for him...when he returns...
talk: Red lightning...warm hands...gentle eyes...no memory...
Lost memories...emptiness....
The coffin...the never changing warmth...

uw.name: Unchanging Mind, Erekura
description: Per every sec, deals 10% of ATK as M.DMG to nearby enemies, and reduces their ATK by 14%. When the passive skill is activated, recovers 30% of mana.
Per every sec, deals 12% of ATK as M.DMG to nearby enemies, and reduces their ATK by 17%. When the passive skill is activated, recovers 30% of mana.
Per every sec, deals 14% of ATK as M.DMG to nearby enemies, and reduces their ATK by 20%. When the passive skill is activated, recovers 30% of mana.
Per every sec, deals 17% of ATK as M.DMG to nearby enemies, and reduces their ATK by 24%. When the passive skill is activated, recovers 30% of mana.
Per every sec, deals 20% of ATK as M.DMG to nearby enemies, and reduces their ATK by 29%. When the passive skill is activated, recovers 30% of mana.
Per every sec, deals 25% of ATK as M.DMG to nearby enemies, and reduces their ATK by 35%. When the passive skill is activated, recovers 30% of mana.
uw.story: When Malduk's magic resurrected Jane as an undead, she should not have felt anything. Yet, she felt warm and comfortable as mysterious energy surrounded her dead body. She should not have been able to even feel it. But when Malduk took her, she instinctively reached out to the warm presence. Later, when a mysterious magic brought her back to consciousness, the first thing she did was to inspect her coffin, which radiated with tragic yet warm love. Inside, she found the following message carefully engraved: 'My unchanging love for you.'

s1.name: Funeral Rites
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range, stunning them for {1} sec.

books.2: Stun duration is increased by {0} sec.

s1.light: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
s1.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, the skill has a 100% chance to draw the target in.

s2.name: Mark of Death
s2.description: Engraves a Mark on all enemies for {0} sec and deals {1} M.DMG over time. Enemies engraved with Mark takes {2}% more M.DMG.
s2.light: Duration is reduced to 10 sec and DMG is boosted by 250%.
s2.dark: Engraved Mark is not be dispelled when negative effects are dispelled.

ut.name: Death-imbued Cushion
description: [Mark of Death] Increases ATK by 5% and Crit DMG by 10% for 20 sec when the marked enemy dies. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
[Mark of Death] Increases ATK by 5% and Crit DMG by 12% for 20 sec when the marked enemy dies. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
[Mark of Death] Increases ATK by 5% and Crit DMG by 14% for 20 sec when the marked enemy dies. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
[Mark of Death] Increases ATK by 5% and Crit DMG by 17% for 20 sec when the marked enemy dies. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
[Mark of Death] Increases ATK by 5% and Crit DMG by 21% for 20 sec when the marked enemy dies. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
[Mark of Death] Increases ATK by 5% and Crit DMG by 25% for 20 sec when the marked enemy dies. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
ut.story: The cushion that Jane hugs to sleep inside the coffin. It's imbued with the spirits that fell asleep with her inside the coffin. They constantly give the hollowness of death to Jane.

s3.name: Day of Ruin
s3.description: For {0} sec, deals a total of {1} M.DMG to all enemies and recovers {2}% of DMG as own HP. Gains immunity to CC. Marked enemies take increased DMG.
s3.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Has a 10% chance to Stun enemies for 1 sec.

ut.name: Flowers of a Forgotten Dukedom
description: [Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 20% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.
[Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 24% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.
[Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 29% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.
[Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 35% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.
[Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 42% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.
[Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 50% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.
ut.story: A flower of the Republic that can no longer be found. It is also known as the Flower of Boundaries that connects life and death, and it gets its nourishment from destruction. A painfully beautiful flower. If you gift it to someone, you will be able to share that person's last moment in a dream.

s4.name: Rest in Peace
s4.description: Upon taking a deathblow, enters a coffin for {0} sec and heals {1} + 6% of Max HP. Gains immunity to all DMG while inside the coffin.
s4.light: While inside the Coffin, deal DMG worth 5% of max HP to nearby enemies.
s4.dark: Upon activation, stun all enemies for 2 sec.

t5.dark: Each hit of Jane's attacks increase her ATK and Recovery Rate by 1% each. (Maximum stack number is 50)

26.name: Aisha
26.subtitle: The Violet Princess
26.description: A noble lady hailing from Orvelia. A genius who attained the title of ‘Violet’ from the Tower of the Sage. Using her fancy parasol, she fires powerful energy cannons towards the enemy.
26.story: A daughter of a noble family from Orvel. As one of the most talented wizards in the Tower of Sage, she has been granted the title of 'Purple' in recognition of her magic capability. She was raised in the Tower of Sage since childhood at her parents' request, but she still retains her dignity as an aristocrat. As a child, she never realized why her parents sent her away on her own, but now she understands their reasons. Now, she is back home, and is always attended by her handmaiden, who is like another member of the family to her.

inn.idle: Hmph, may as well just buy this entire Inn.

recruit.greet: Is it your first time meeting nobility?
talk: Hmm, what family are you from?
This skirt...the last touches were quite shabby.
Ugh, I prefer my chef's cooking to this...peasant food.
recruit.gift: My, thank you. Why not come over for tea sometime?

affinity.greet: This house isn't that nice.
talk: Ugh... I don't need food. I don't think I'll like it.
I'll bring a luxurious car next time I come.
affinity.gift: Thank you. Let me know if you want anything.

relationship.greet: Sister went out for a while, so do not worry.
talk: Do not be mislead by the smiles of nobles. Their smiles are but mere masks to hide themselves with.
I do not like the fact that I cannot call Priscilla 'Sister' at home. She's just like family!
The title of Violet...there is no hiearchy between The Seven, but I dislike being the last color of the spectrum!

uw.name: Noble Fate, Mahitra
description: Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 40% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 48% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 57% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 69% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 83% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 100% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
uw.story: In the Tower of Sage, the title of Purple indicates the pinnacle of mana capacity. Aisha's seemingly endless mana was simply too much for regular means of output. For this reason, the von Daphnel family bought out all the best mana stones they could find, and took them to Annette, the best technomagi in Orvel Castle. Annette gladly agreed to take on this new project. Soon after, she created Mahitra, a beautiful umbrella befitting an aristocratic wizard of noble destiny.

s1.name: Mystic Barrage
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies within a small range. Upon a Crit Hit, cooldown is reduced by 1 sec.
s1.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s1.dark: Upon a Crit Hit, recovers 300 mana.

s2.name: Destruction Ray
s2.description: Every 0.5 sec, deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in a straight line. After 5 sec, consumes 3% of mana every 0.5 sec while DMG is increased by 100%. Max duration is 10 sec.
s2.light: The mana cost of the Boosted Ray is half.
s2.dark: The mana cost of the Boosted Ray is doubled and the DMG increase is boosted from 100% to 200%.

ut.name: Noble Hand Mirror
description: [Destruction Ray] Increases DMG by 50% and recovers 500 MP immediately upon use.
[Destruction Ray] Increases DMG by 50% and recovers 600 MP immediately upon use.
[Destruction Ray] Increases DMG by 50% and recovers 720 MP immediately upon use.
[Destruction Ray] Increases DMG by 50% and recovers 860 MP immediately upon use.
[Destruction Ray] Increases DMG by 50% and recovers 1040 MP immediately upon use.
[Destruction Ray] Increases DMG by 50% and recovers 1250 MP immediately upon use.
ut.story: A sacred treasure passed down through generations of the von Daphnel family. It was a shaman tool to save mana in ancient times. After Aisha embedded the Noble Purple gem with her mana, its power came out. Now it shines brilliantly.

s3.name: Torrential Rainfall
s3.description: Deals {1} M.DMG to random enemies for {0} sec, and reduces target's M.DEF by 5%. Can be stacked up to max 5 times.
s3.light: Deals AoE DMG.
s3.dark: M.DEF reduction effect now stacks up to 10 times max.

ut.name: Ring of Infinite Mana
description: [Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 30 mana.
[Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 36 mana.
[Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 43 mana.
[Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 52 mana.
[Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 62 mana.
[Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 75 mana.
ut.story: A ring that was given along with the title of Purple from the Tower of Sage. It is an artifact of witch Eucaletus, who lived in the Swamp of Wisdom. The power it displays depends on the owner's ability. For some, it could be a source of unlimited mana. It's perfect for Aisha, who uses powerful magic cannons.

s4.name: Mystic Boost
s4.description: Upon a Crit Hit, deals extra {0} M.DMG to the enemy.
s4.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s4.dark: Ignores enemy Block.

t5.dark: Each skill use stacks Darkness. Each stack boosts her Mana regen per sec by 6% and boosts her Crit DMG by 2%. (Maximum Stack number is 50)

27.name: Leo
27.subtitle: Eternal Scribe
27.description: The Scribe of the Royal Great Library of Orvelia. Using runes, he heals allies and erases beneficial magic from foes.
27.story: In the royal palace of Orvel, there exists a library that is said to be infinite in space. Leo is a Gnome who has been protecting this library for a very long time. Having memorized every book in the library, he is the most knowledgeable person in the entire palace, and many visit the library, seeking his wisdom. However, he still seems to have difficulty interacting with others.

inn.idle: Wow, there are more people than there are books here.

recruit.greet: Hello. Nice to meet you.
talk: I want to know everything about this world.
The world sure is big...
Come to the library sometime. I'll introduce you to some nice books.
recruit.gift: For me? Really?

affinity.greet: Oh, it's so cozy!
talk: You don't have that many books! Should I bring you some from my house?
You can learn anything from books!
affinity.gift: Thank you! I'll invite you to our house sometime!

relationship.greet: Hello. What's today's news?
talk: I wrote in a lot of new entries today. Every day brings new knowledge.
There seems to be a lot of fun things outside. Maybe I should go out a bit more...
Do you have a minute? I brought a new book...

uw.name: Phoenix Quill, Belisa
description: At the beginning of each battle, increases P.DEF and M.DEF by 20%, ATK Spd by 200 for 15 sec, and adds an additional effect to the first skill used. Rune of Frailty - Increases Crit Chance by 500. Rune of Healing - Dispels CC inflicted on caster before the skill is cast. Rune of Silence - Increases Silence duration by 1 sec.

At the beginning of each battle, increases P.DEF and M.DEF by 24%, ATK Spd by 240 for 15 sec, and adds an additional effect to the first skill used. Rune of Frailty - Increases Crit Chance by 500. Rune of Healing - Dispels CC inflicted on caster before the skill is cast. Rune of Silence - Increases Silence duration by 1 sec.

At the beginning of each battle, increases P.DEF and M.DEF by 29%, ATK Spd by 290 for 15 sec, and adds an additional effect to the first skill used. Rune of Frailty - Increases Crit Chance by 500. Rune of Healing - Dispels CC inflicted on caster before the skill is cast. Rune of Silence - Increases Silence duration by 1 sec.

At the beginning of each battle, increases P.DEF and M.DEF by 35%, ATK Spd by 350 for 15 sec, and adds an additional effect to the first skill used. Rune of Frailty - Increases Crit Chance by 500. Rune of Healing - Dispels CC inflicted on caster before the skill is cast. Rune of Silence - Increases Silence duration by 1 sec.

At the beginning of each battle, increases P.DEF and M.DEF by 42%, ATK Spd by 420 for 15 sec, and adds an additional effect to the first skill used. Rune of Frailty - Increases Crit Chance by 500. Rune of Healing - Dispels CC inflicted on caster before the skill is cast. Rune of Silence - Increases Silence duration by 1 sec.

At the beginning of each battle, increases P.DEF and M.DEF by 50%, ATK Spd by 500 for 15 sec, and adds an additional effect to the first skill used. Rune of Frailty - Increases Crit Chance by 500. Rune of Healing - Dispels CC inflicted on caster before the skill is cast. Rune of Silence - Increases Silence duration by 1 sec.
uw.story: The phoenix is a holy beast that symbolizes eternal life. As elusive as the beast itself is, its feather is considered extremely rare as well. It is said that a quill crafted from a phoenix feather is a powerful magical tool in its own right. Runes drawn with this quill can serve as a powerful medium for Rune Magic.

s1.name: Rune of Frailty
s1.description: Engraves a rune on the target, dealing up to {3} P.DMG that ignores DEF based on missing HP and reducing their P.DEF by {1}% for {0} sec.
s1.light: Cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.
s1.dark: Target number increased to 2.

s2.name: Rune of Healing
s2.description: Heals {0} HP of all allies.
s2.dark: Increase ally P.DEF for 25% for 10 sec after healing.

ut.name: Ink of Vitality
description: [Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 100 for 10 sec.
[Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 120 for 10 sec.
[Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 140 for 10 sec.
[Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 170 for 10 sec.
[Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 210 for 10 sec.
[Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 250 for 10 sec.
ut.story: Ink made by extracting young leaves from the World Tree. Only 10 droplets can be produced in a year. The magic spells written with this ink grant great vitality to the body. It's very precious and hard to obtain, so Leo doesn't use it unless it's for a special occasion.

s3.name: Rune of Silence
s3.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to all enemies, and dispels all positive effects. Inflicts Silences on target for {1} sec.

books.0: Silence duration is increased by {0} sec.
books.1: Silence duration is increased by {0} sec.
books.2: Silence duration is increased by {0} sec.
