s3.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s3.dark: DMG is increased by 200% and the enemy target receives 20% more DMG from all sources for 10 sec. Mana cost is increased by 2.

ut.name: Scroll of Memories
description: [Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 120.
[Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 140.
[Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 170.
[Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 210.
[Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 250.
[Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 300.
ut.story: Ancient sorcery codex. A codex written by respected sorcerers that contains the principle behind magic that uses all of life and creation. It's written in an unknown language, so only part of it can be decoded. If the ancient text system is discovered, it might be possible to use spells without any cost whatsoever.

s4.name: Rune of Protection
s4.description: Every {0} sec, engraves a rune upon the ally with the lowest HP and recovers a total of {2} HP for {1} sec.

books.2: CC resistance is increased by {0} for the duration.

s4.light: Heal rate is increased by 40%.
s4.dark: After healing an ally, increase target P.DEF for 40% for a duration of 10 sec.

t5.dark: Upon attacking, there is a 10% chance of dealing 120% of ATK as P.DMG to a random enemy, while also removing 300 mana and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.

28.name: Fluss
28.subtitle: Fluttering Blade
28.description: The vice-captain of the Imperial Guard. His sonic blade cuts through even magic. He is capable of attacking the most dangerous foes first.
28.story: As the son of the commander of the Imperial Knights, he has received rigorous training since early childhood to become a proper swordsman. No one can question his title as the fastest swordsman in the imperial palace. The number of enemy knights he felled in the fields of battle is a testament to his skills. He quickly rose to the rank as the vice-captain of the Imperial Guard and is the subject of everyone's admiration. Although he is aware of his beautiful appearance, he detests those who approach him for his outer beauty. He considers inner beauty more important than what is visible. However, he's slightly hypocritical in that he occasionally falls for his own beauty.
28.dislike: Those who do not understand romance

inn.idle: Not too different from the Inns back at the Empire, I warrant.

recruit.greet: Quite the hard-worker, you are.
talk: Ah, the cool breeze of the Empire - how I miss it so.
Constant training is the way to improve your skills.
There is only one other person with whom I could speak so freely...
recruit.gift: A toast to your spirit.

affinity.greet: I brought some flowers since you invited me.
talk: People are like swords. You have to continue to cultivate yourself to become a true knight.
I really don't like Pavel. To leave Rodina like that...
affinity.gift: Cheers to your kindness.

relationship.greet: A toast to your...no, I'll stop right there.
talk: My house wasn't originally part of the Empire.
This flower is an offering to my ancestor's homeland. It is a symbol, a memoir to remember their fallen homeland.
Our Order is just a front, mostly comprised of inexperienced children from noble families. The truly fearful warriors are elsewhere...

uw.name: Twinswords of Fury, Veralta
description: Increases ATK by 12% and ATK Spd by 120 for 30 sec every 7 sec. This effect can stack up to 3 times and cannot be removed.
Increases ATK by 14% and ATK Spd by 140 for 30 sec every 7 sec. This effect can stack up to 3 times and cannot be removed.
Increases ATK by 17% and ATK Spd by 170 for 30 sec every 7 sec. This effect can stack up to 3 times and cannot be removed.
Increases ATK by 20% and ATK Spd by 200 for 30 sec every 7 sec. This effect can stack up to 3 times and cannot be removed.
Increases ATK by 25% and ATK Spd by 250 for 30 sec every 7 sec. This effect can stack up to 3 times and cannot be removed.
Increases ATK by 30% and ATK Spd by 300 for 30 sec every 7 sec. This effect can stack up to 3 times and cannot be removed.
uw.story: A set of enchanted weapons bestowed upon Fluss's grandfather, a knight hailing from the Republic of Gray, and passed down as family treasures. They are capable of gradually enhancing the physical abilities of their wielder, allowing him to break the boundaries of human limitations and gain supernatural power and speed. Because the effect is gradual, there is no sudden stress to the wielder's body. Each piece is called Blood and Rose, respectively. The names originated from the swirl of blood splatter and flower petals that follow whenever Fluss swings these twin swords. No other warrior has been able to utilize their potential as Fluss does.

s1.name: Tempest Blade
s1.description: Attacks the target and the enemies near it 3 times, dealing a total of {0} P.DMG. If the target is not a Hero, inflicts a total of {1} additional P.DMG over 5 sec.
s1.light: Ignores DEF when there is only 1 enemy.
s1.dark: Upon a Crit Hit, cooldown is reduced by 6%.

s2.name: Flashstep
s2.description: Moves to the enemy with the highest ATK and Inflicts Silence for 2 sec. Own M.DMG reduction is increased by {1} for {0} sec. Engraves the enemy with a Mark for {2} sec, and own attack prioritizes the Marked target. When attacking enemies inflicted with Mark, deals {3} extra P.DMG.
s2.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
s2.dark: Dispels positive effects from enemy.

ut.name: Tempting Perfume
description: [Flashstep] Changes the Mark irremovable and increases ATK by 20% for 10 sec once the enemy with the mark is killed.
[Flashstep] Changes the Mark irremovable and increases ATK by 24% for 10 sec once the enemy with the mark is killed.
[Flashstep] Changes the Mark irremovable and increases ATK by 29% for 10 sec once the enemy with the mark is killed.
[Flashstep] Changes the Mark irremovable and increases ATK by 35% for 10 sec once the enemy with the mark is killed.
[Flashstep] Changes the Mark irremovable and increases ATK by 42% for 10 sec once the enemy with the mark is killed.
[Flashstep] Changes the Mark irremovable and increases ATK by 50% for 10 sec once the enemy with the mark is killed.
ut.story: Perfume containing the first Vivienne roses of the year. Vivienne roses are beautiful but deadly. Those affected by the smell will hallucinate and just stare in awe as their opponent moves.

s3.name: Bloody Petals
s3.description: Deals a total of {0} P.DMG to an enemy over 16 hits, and suppresses the target while casting. This DMG ignores the target's Block effects.
s3.light: Each Critical Hit increases the last hit's DMG by 10%.
s3.dark: While in cooldown, auto attack DMG is boosted by 50%.

ut.name: Immortal Rose
description: [Bloody Petals] DMG is increased by 20% and dodges all M.ATK during the duration of skill.
[Bloody Petals] DMG is increased by 24% and dodges all M.ATK during the duration of skill.
[Bloody Petals] DMG is increased by 29% and dodges all M.ATK during the duration of skill.
[Bloody Petals] DMG is increased by 35% and dodges all M.ATK during the duration of skill.
[Bloody Petals] DMG is increased by 42% and dodges all M.ATK during the duration of skill.
[Bloody Petals] DMG is increased by 50% and dodges all M.ATK during the duration of skill.
ut.story: A rose that will never wither, even if it's been picked. It's a flower that Fluss loves. It reminds Fluss about the duty of a knight, which is the basis for his strong will that allows him to be confident in battle.

s4.name: Spell Cutter
s4.description: Every {0} sec, upon taking M.DMG, deals {1} P.DMG to the attacker, and dodges all M.ATK for {2} sec.
s4.light: Upon dodging, raise own ATK by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times.
s4.dark: Has a 30% chance to stun enemies for 3 sec.

t5.dark: Upon attacking, deal extra P.DMG equal to 20% of ATK to the enemy. There is also a 10% chance of dealing double P.DMG and dispelling positive effects.

29.name: Luna
29.subtitle: Child of Moonlight
29.description: An unidentified child wielding a slingshot as big as her body. Her projectiles gain strength the further they fly.
29.story: Lulus, very rarely sighted and often considered mythical, are a race of animal hybrids. They live in an extremely cold region, and are very fearful of contacting the outside world. One day, a Lulu child was born with the exact opposite personality that is typical her race. That child is Luna. It's not that she was unhappy with the ways of her people. Nor did she have any grand purpose of experiencing the world outside. She was simply picking flowers, one step at a time. Another step to pick up some frozen branches for her slingshot. And another step to follow the scent of some sweet, red fruit. Before she knew it, she was outside, running toward a carrot field away from the mountain.

inn.idle: Hi! Do you have any carrots?!

recruit.greet: Hello! Hello to you too! Hello everyone!
talk: Do you know what this is?! Carrots!
Carrots are carrot-colored! Yay!
Rabbit? Nah, Luna is Luna!
recruit.gift: Yay, carrots!! Wait? These aren't carrots!!

affinity.greet: Hello! Luna is here again!
talk: This place is fun! Luna likes it a lot! Very much!
Luna will give you a blessing! With carrots!
affinity.gift: This is a real carrot, right?

relationship.greet: Luna is doing well!
talk: Luna has lots of friends back home! But Luna doesn't remember where home is!
Everyone thinks Luna's favorite thing is carrots! And yes, that is correct~!
Ah, um...do you have a carrot?

uw.name: Flower of Eternity, Hyacinth
description: Increases DMG of normal attacks by 20% and the Range by 6%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 24% and the Range by 7.2%.
]Increases DMG of normal attacks by 29% and the Range by 8.6%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 35% and the Range by 10.5%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 42% and the Range by 12.5%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 50% and the Range by 15%.
uw.story: A slingshot made from hyacinth, a silver tree that only grows in extremely cold regions. It is said that hyacinths have been blessed by the Queen of Ice, and are able to bear bright red fruits even in the coldest weather. Simply holding onto a hyacinth branch allows one to ignore the coldness around the holder. These blessed trees also have the power to call upon snowstorms and frost. Needless to say, these powers are best harnessed by a weapon carved from one of these trees.

s1.name: Pew!
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG by shooting a bouncing projectile which bounces 3 times starting from the nearest enemy. The further the enemy, the more DMG inflicted.
s1.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s1.dark: Enemies hit are stunned for 1 sec.

s2.name: Look out above!
s2.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies furthest away in a small range, and stuns them for {1} sec. The further the enemy, the more DMG they will take.
s2.light: In exchange for 2 additional Mana Cost, attacks random enemies 3 times.
s2.dark: Ignores enemy Block.

ut.name: Moonlight Carrot
description: [Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 20% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 24% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 29% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 35% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 42% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
ut.story: A carrot that grew from receiving moonlight a thousand times. Those hit by this carrot will have all evil stripped away from them, and they'll be able to tell apart good from bad.

s3.name: Twinkle Twinkle
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to target enemies in range, and reduces target's Crit Chance by {2}% for {1} sec.
s3.light: Reduces ACC of hit enemies by 150 for 7 sec.
s3.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, knock back the enemy over a long distance.

ut.name: Never-Melting Snow Flower
description: [Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 20% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 24% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 29% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 35% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 42% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 50% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
ut.story: A legendary snowfield flower that blossomed from the never melting land of Windland Snow Mountain. It is said that it makes the energy of its master's body flow clearly and beautifully. An item that makes Luna's pure energy shine even brighter.

s4.name: Gotcha!
s4.description: Every {0} sec, deals a total of {2} M.DMG to the furthest enemy for {1} sec. The further the enemy, the more DMG they will take.
s4.light: There is a 20% chance to knock back the enemy far away and inflict knock over for 2 sec.
s4.dark: Number of targets changes to 2.

t5.dark: When auto-attacking, there is a 10% chance to knock back the enemy across a long distance and inflict Stun for 3 sec. Also, increase ATK Spd by 500 for 3 sec.

30.name: Laias
30.subtitle: Holy Priestess of Water
30.description: A priestess that guards the Oasis of the Aegina Desert. A Water Dragon that has lived for eons. Her water holds powerful healing properties.
30.story: This beautiful and gentle priestess of water is actually a morphed blue dragon. In the distant past, she was worshipped by certain desert tribes. However, she has been sleeping for ages for some unknown reason. She can command water to turn lands fertile, and she always used her powers to help her people. In return, the humans built the golden Shrine of Flow in her honor under the lake in the oasis. A flow of evil energy in the desert has awakened her from her sleep, and she has once again begun using her powers to help those around her.
30.dislike: Anything that disrupts the world's order

inn.idle: Do not be afraid. Ye may be much stronger.

recruit.greet: I'm Lorraine, an Elidora Elf. Salutations.
talk: I had a good time.
May the blessing of mother nature light thy way.
Human beings are astounding creatures, but you have a serious weakness. You are ruled by greed and cannot resist temptation.
recruit.gift: I will treasure this.

affinity.greet: I always welcome the chance to spend time with you.
talk: A major crossroad awaits you. Light and shadow... will converge into one path...
You mean my blue hair? Ah, it's a mistake from my past.
affinity.gift: I'll consider it as a gift given out of your generosity.

relationship.greet: You have grown strong, just, and pure.
talk: You seem to have the purest soul I've seen in a while.
It would be nice if these times of peaceful enjoyment could last forever...but that would be a vice.
I will never forget you. Not as the Sage, but as a simple elf.

uw.name: Flowing Circle, Eltoirre
description: Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 80% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 96% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 115% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 138% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 166% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 200% of DMG dealt to target.
uw.story: An ankh crafted in the shape of a phoenix. It symbolizes the natural cycle of life. In the ancient days, the nomads of the desert worshipped the blue dragon of the oasis as their protector. In return, she blessed them with rain and gave life to their crops. To show their gratitude, the nomads offered her various treasures, including Lazulia, the gem of water. Although she had no particular interest in material wealth, she accepted their gratitude, and used the treasures to build a temple within the oasis. This ankh is the sacred symbol of the temple, and contains the mighty power of water.

s1.name: Healing Droplets
s1.description: Heals max {0} HP of all allies, proportional to their lost HP.
s1.light: Heal rate is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Upon healing, M. Crit Resistance rises by 25%.

s2.name: Bubble Shield
s2.description: Shields an ally with the lowest HP for 15 sec to block {0} DMG, and grants CC Immunity. While Shield is in effect, heals {1} HP per sec, and gains Immunity to CC.
s2.dark: Target's M. Crit Resistance is increased by 25%.

ut.name: Oasis Crystal
description: [Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 12% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
[Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 14% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
[Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 17% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
[Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 21% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
[Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 25% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
[Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
ut.story: Water essence that the Blue Dragons protect. The essence of an oasis that the Blue Dragons brought to the desert at the beginning of the world. Protecting and defending this is the sacred mission of the Priestess of Water Laias, and it is her favorite thing to do. The Oasis Crystal leads the Priestess of Water who uses the Bubble Shield to the person who most needs her help.

s3.name: Festival of the Flow
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to nearby enemies and knocks them down. All allies, excluding self, recovers 2 orbs of mana. Afterwards, for {1} sec, creates a whirlpool that deals {2} M.DMG to random enemies and knocks them down for 2 sec.
s3.light: DMG effect occurs every 3 sec.
s3.dark: Heals all allies by 15% of their max HP.

ut.name: Papyrus of the Flow
description: [Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 500 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 600 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 720 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 860 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 1040 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 1250 mana.
ut.story: A sample of the ancient scripture, the Book of Chaos, that was swept away. The Book of Chaos is a historic scripture that is passed down to the Priest of Water, and it has records of culture, magic, and various fields. It was sealed in the golden Shrine of Flow along with Laias, but most of the book disappeared while she was asleep. The remaining Papyrus of the Flow is a boosting spell of the Festival of the Flow.

s4.name: Blessing of the Water Dragon
s4.description: All allies' M.DEF is increased by {0} , and M.Crit Hit Resistance is increased by {1}.
s4.light: M.DEF increase rate increases by 20%, and M. Crit Resistance increases by 100
s4.dark: Increases self CC Resist by 400.

t5.dark: Laias increases M.DEF equal of 5% of her ATK to allies she heals, as well as giving them 75 mana each.

31.name: Arch
31.subtitle: Arrow of Purity
31.description: A high-ranking angel that descended upon this world to punish the chaos-inciting Demons. Soaring through the sky, his arrows rain judgment upon evildoers.
31.story: An Angel warrior who descended from the Heavens to punish the Demons and stop the spread of chaos on earth. His delegated tasks include scouting, reconnaissance, and execution of any Demons found on earth. He has a strong sense of responsibility and is quick and decisive against any injustice. He truly loves Mankind and all the life forms that inhabit the earth. This is why he strives to prevent the Demons from defiling this world.

inn.idle: Hm?! I think I just saw a demon...

recruit.greet: Greetings, earth dwellers.
talk: Are my wings that interesting?
Smiting evil is my call.
May you see that your very lives are blessed by the goddess.
recruit.gift: May the light guide your way.

affinity.greet: It's good to see you, follower of the light.
talk: The fate of the world is in your hands.
You, who received the blessing of the goddess, what will you do with that power?
affinity.gift: I don't know how I'll use it, but thank you.

relationship.greet: May the light be with you, my friend.
talk: Demons... they are scum that must be executed, but the few that help us... I do not know what to do with them.
Your existence is like a bright beacon. Keep your soul pure, my friend.
I once thought that your kind were weak. But now, I have learned that strength comes in many forms.

uw.name: Clear Blue Sky, Sherrkyle
description: Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 168% of ATK as M.DMG.
Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 201.6% of ATK as M.DMG.
Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 241.5% of ATK as M.DMG.
Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 289.8% of ATK as M.DMG.
Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 348.8% of ATK as M.DMG.
Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 420% of ATK as M.DMG.
uw.story: A powerful weapon of light that can take the form of a spear, a dagger, or a bow. One of the divine treasures of the Angels blessed by an archangel. It is said to be capable of incinerating evil. Due to its versatility, it has traditionally been given to the most talented scout. The number of Demons who perished under its light during the war is too high to count.

s1.name: Celestial Arrow
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to 3 enemies and knock them back. Enemies with a Judgement sigil takes 30% extra DMG. Enemies hit by this skill are inflicted with a Judgement Sigil for 15 sec.
s1.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s1.dark: Stuns enemies with a Sigil for 1 sec.

s2.name: Purifying Blaze
s2.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to frontal enemies in a straight line. Enemies with a Judgement Sigil takes {1} extra M.DMG that ignores DEF.
s2.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.

ut.name: Magic Square of Pursuit
description: [Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 20%.
[Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 24%.
[Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 29%.
[Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 35%.
[Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 42%.
[Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 50%.
ut.story: The symbol of Fire Arbiter Army that fought a fierce battle against Ancient Demons. When using the Magic Square of Pursuit blessed by Lua, the Goddess of Light, Arch becomes a merciless arbiter.

s3.name: Arbiter
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range, and enemies with Judgement Sigil takes 50% more M.DMG for 5 sec, while being inflicted with Silence. All allies become immune to M.DMG for 5 sec.
s3.light: Inflicts a sigil upon damaged enemies.
s3.dark: M.DMG increase and Silence effect occur to enemies with no Sigil as well.

ut.name: Eye of Heaven
description: [Arbiter] DMG is increased by 20% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
[Arbiter] DMG is increased by 24% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
[Arbiter] DMG is increased by 29% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
[Arbiter] DMG is increased by 35% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
[Arbiter] DMG is increased by 42% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
[Arbiter] DMG is increased by 50% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shi
ut.story: Angel Arbiter Pilier's soul egg. Pilier was born from Lua's first flame, and is Arch's master. Pilier was the best Angel warrior and was the one to end the war against the Demons. But after using all of his power, he went back to being an Eye of Heaven, which is the soul egg form, and Arch is holding onto his master's soul.

s4.name: The Last Judgment
s4.description: Every 15 sec, deals {0} M.DMG ignoring DEF to enemies inflicted by Judgement Sigil. Once during every battle, upon reaching near death HP, deals {1} M.DMG to enemies inflicted by Judgement Sigils and stuns them for 3 sec, while casting a shield that blocks {2} DMG to all allies for 5 sec. Gains immunity to CC while the shield is in effect. When the shield effect takes place, consumes all mana, and all skill cooldown is increased by 50%.

books.0: DMG and Shield are increased by {0}%.
books.1: DMG and Shield are increased by {0}%.
books.2: DMG and Shield are increased by {0}%.

s4.light: For 20 sec after activation, auto attacks target 2 enemies.
s4.dark: Effect occurs 3 sec faster.

t5.dark: Upon a Critical Hit, heal all ally HP by 4% of DMG dealt.

32.name: Lewisia
32.subtitle: The Royal Vermilion Blood
32.description: A vampire princess who fought alongside the heroes from 100 years ago. A pure-blooded immortal vampire, she is currently recovering from her past battles. She wields dominion over all blood, utilizing her minions to attack the enemy.
32.story: A Vampire princess who joined Kyle in his war against the Demons 100 years ago. She is a pure-blood Vampire who has lived for over 500 years. Often considered the Queen of Vampires, she is nigh immortal. The tremendous expenditure of her power during the war against the Demons has taken its toll, and the immortal princess now assumes a child-like form. After the war, she blended into Human society and watched the world change over the next 100 years while slowly restoring her power. When the Demons reappeared and the Holy Sword awoke, Lewisia sensed the sudden shifts of energy. Soon after, she left on a journey to find and observe the newly chosen warrior.

inn.idle: How energetic. Perfect for recuperation.

recruit.greet: Greetings, we meet again. Are you staying for a while?
talk: Hm? I admit that garlic is rather spicy, but why do you ask?
I love the bright sunshine here. Back at home, it is always so dark....Hmm? Why are you looking at me that way?
Once I recover, I will not be inconvenienced with such a body anymore.
recruit.gift: Presents, hmm. An interesting custom. Well, if you insist, I will accept your gift.

affinity.greet: Hm, it's a great day.
talk: My status as a princess? Hm... I've never really thought about it.
This place is much better than the dark and damp place where I'm from.
affinity.gift: A gift? Thank you. I'll have to prepare something for you next time.

relationship.greet: Hello. Isn't it quite nice out today?
talk: My body is recovering quickly nowadays. It's all thanks to you.
Why do I sometimes revert to my younger forms even when I'm getting better? Well, I get bored...and people give me snacks.
I like this place because it's comfortable... so i plan to stay a bit longer, by your side.

uw.name: Scarlet Ruler, Dominicia
description: If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 20%. If HP is under 50%, takes 10% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 24%. If HP is under 50%, takes 12% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 29%. If HP is under 50%, takes 14% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 35%. If HP is under 50%, takes 17% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 42%. If HP is under 50%, takes 21% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 50%. If HP is under 50%, takes 25% reduced DMG.
uw.story: A staff of blood that has been passed down in the family of the Vampire Lord through the generations. Its crimson color symbolizes the authority, insight, and the absolute power of the Vampire Lord. Deep in the underground of the Galia Plains is the holy land of the Vampires. This legendary staff lies there, ready to appear at the call of the master worthy of it, wherever that may be.

s1.name: Blood Orb
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to target enemy, and target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec. Per every stacked Blood Curse, DMG is increased by 0.5%. Upon use, consumes 10% of current HP.
s1.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.
s1.dark: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.

s2.name: Blood Zone
s2.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to target enemy and creates a Blood Zone that lasts for 10 sec around the target. Enemies within the Blood Zone receives {1} M.DMG every 0.5 sec, and M.DEF is reduced by 30%. Per every stacked Blood Curse, DMG is increased by 0.5%. Upon use, consumes 20% of current HP.
s2.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.

ut.name: Spell of Bloody Mist
description: [Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 20% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 24% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 29% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 35% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 42% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 50% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
ut.story: Magic tool of the successor of blood. The spells of the pure Vampire Lord's family have been passed down through generations.  The successor of Lewisia is Vampire Sir Lusben, and the Spell of Bloody Mist is a gift from him.  Lewisia hates anything that has to do with being a successor, but she likes how the Blood Zone reduces her fatigue, so she enjoys using it.

s3.name: Blood Banquet
s3.description: Attacks enemies in a straight line 3 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec. Per every stacked Blood Curse, DMG is increased by 0.5% Upon use, consumes 10% of current HP.
s3.light: Upon attacking an enemy with over 80 stacks of Blood Curse, all skill cooldown is reduced by 5%.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Blood of the Ancients
description: [Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 20%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 24%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 29%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 35%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 42%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana
ut.story: Ancient vampire queen's blood. The more pure-blooded a vampire is, the stronger their mana blood. The greatest of them all is the ancient vampire queen's blood, and vampires who drink her blood will have unlimited life and mana. It is a highly addictive type of blood, so be careful when using it.

s4.name: Blood Dominator
s4.description: When HP is 50% or above, ATK is increased by {0} and DEF Pen. is increased by 250. Upon attack, inflicts target with Blood Curse, dealing a total of {1} M.DMG over time for 20 sec, and recovering 10% of DMG dealt from Blood Curse as HP. Blood Curse can be stacked max 100 times, and cannot be dispelled.
s4.light: Max stack of Blood Curse is changed to 200 stacks.
s4.dark: All allies' heal rate is increased by 20% and all enemies' heal rate is reduced by 20%.

t5.dark: All skill HP consumption is increased by 50% but cooldowns are reduced by 20%.

33.name: Nyx
33.subtitle: Dimension Cleaver
33.description: A heterochromic mage that controls space itself. His powers rip through space to summon infinite sword barrages.
33.story: A mysterious dimension-crossing wizard with distinctly recognizable heterochromia. The perpetual smile on his face seems to come from the wisdom of someone who sees through the entire universe. He shows great interest in those with special abilities and enjoys testing them. His space teleportation ability seems to surpass the realm of mortals, and he can even travel across dimensions. It is unsure what his true motivation is, but it seems certain enough that he always intends to help others.
33.dislike: People who do not listen to others

inn.idle: Hmm, do you have interest in me?

recruit.greet: I sense a special aura from you.
talk: Do you have somewhere you wish to go?
There is no place in this world I cannot reach.
I like interesting people, like you.
recruit.gift: For me? Hmm, thank you.

affinity.greet: We meet again. Nice to see you.
talk: Traveling is fun. It's a chance to put everything down and enjoy freedom for a while.
My hobby is collecting swords.
affinity.gift: Oh, this is such a nice gift. Thank you.

relationship.greet: Hmm. I knew you were coming.
talk: If you wish to go anywhere, tell me. I shall open a portal for you.
I have an interest in seeing how you save this world.
Do you wish to know about my magic? Haha, it involves some complicated calculations.

uw.name: Dimensional Key, Magnus Fille
description: Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 30%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 4%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 36%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 4.8%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 43%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 5.7%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 52%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 6.9%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 62%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 8.3%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 75%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 10%.
uw.story: There exists a universal string that connects different dimensions. This sword is the key that can sever and reconnect this string. It is bestowed upon the dimensional arbitrator sworn to protect the balance of the universe. It can be duplicated indefinitely, but will only grant its powers to the chosen one.

s1.name: Dimension Blade
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to target enemies and gains 1 stack of Blade per each hit enemy. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks. Blade can be stacked up to max 5 times, and lasts for 20 sec.
s1.light: When there are over 5 enemies, 10 sec cooldown is reset, and DMG is increased by 200%. Has a cooldown of 20 sec.
s1.dark: Max Blade stack is increased by 1.

s2.name: Dimension Cleaver
s2.description: Dispels all positive effects of target enemy and deals {0} P.DMG. Hit enemies take {2} P.DMG for {1} sec, and are knocked down for 3 sec. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.
s2.dark: Target receives 25% increased P.DMG for 10 sec.

ut.name: Sword of Flow Cutting
description: [Dimension Cleaver] DMG is increased by 50% and own Crit DMG is increased by 10% for 8 sec per each hit enemies. This effect can be stacked max 5 times.
[Dimension Cleaver] DMG is increased by 50% and own Crit DMG is increased by 12% for 8 sec per each hit enemies. This effect can be stacked max 5 times.
[Dimension Cleaver] DMG is increased by 50% and own Crit DMG is increased by 14% for 8 sec per each hit enemies. This effect can be stacked max 5 times.
[Dimension Cleaver] DMG is increased by 50% and own Crit DMG is increased by 17% for 8 sec per each hit enemies. This effect can be stacked max 5 times.
[Dimension Cleaver] DMG is increased by 50% and own Crit DMG is increased by 21% for 8 sec per each hit enemies. This effect can be stacked max 5 times.
[Dimension Cleaver] DMG is increased by 50% and own Crit DMG is increased by 25% for 8 sec per each hit enemies. This effect can be stacked max 5 times.
ut.story: A legendary sword that has transcended eras. A legendary sword that was made with the light of the sun and the melted souls of those in pain. It is one of the required items for Dimension Cleaver since it is durable enough to withstand dimension and can be made very sharp.

s3.name: Infinity Blades
s3.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to frontal enemies in range, and the final attack deals {1} P.DMG to one enemy, inflicting knockdown for 3 sec. The number of target for the last attack increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.
s3.light: Cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
s3.dark: When there are 5 blade stacks or more, DMG is increased by 70%.

ut.name: Dimension Stone
description: [Infinity Blades] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 20%.
[Infinity Blades] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 24%.
[Infinity Blades] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 29%.
[Infinity Blades] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 35%.
[Infinity Blades] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 42%.
[Infinity Blades] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 50%
ut.story: A required item for wizards who go through dimensions. The Dimensional Stone is a magic stone that is loved by those who go through dimensions, and it contains unlimited energy. However, the power that one can use from it depends on the individual's ability. Only high ranking wizards can use it effectively.

s4.name: Hidden Blade
s4.description: Each auto attack fires an additional blade that deals {0} P.DMG. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.
s4.light: DMG is increased by 15% per each enemy on the field.
s4.dark: There is a 10% chance of dispelling enemy positive effects.

t5.dark: When auto attacking, there is a 10% chance of stacking 1 stack of Blade. Nyx's ATK is boosted by 10% per each Blade Stack he holds.

34.name: Annette
34.subtitle: Royal Technomagi
34.description: A genius technomagi hoping for the day everyone gains access to magic. Her technomagical golem acts as her weapon, blasting the enemy away.
34.story: A genius technomagi from the Kingdom of Orvelia. She is highly optimistic, and failure never seems to bother her. She dreams of inventing a device that would allow anyone to handle magic one day. She has a magically engineered assistant whom she brought to life after years of research. Following the arrival of the Demons, she incorporated her research into developing weapons that would allow anyone to fight against the invaders.
34.dislike: People who look down on Technomagic

inn.idle: Wow, people everywhere! Very different from my lab at the castle!

recruit.greet: Hello~ Does technomagic interest you?
talk: Everyone has a right to magic! I just want to kickstart that!
The royal palace does give me a lot of research funding...but it's still lacking!
Huh? These eggs look kinda like my cutie here!
recruit.gift: Hehe! Thanks for the donation to the research funds!

affinity.greet: Experiments, experiments, such fun experiments! Huh? Hello!
talk: These cuties are growing well! They'll be able to go out to the field soon!
1 cutie for each person! How's it?
affinity.gift: Heh heh, I'll get lots of funds...!

relationship.greet: Hi! Did you study a lot today?
talk: Yeaaaaah!! Now, let's go and do an experiment based on my latest thesis!
I've gotten a raise on my research fees! Thanks to that, I can do much more in my laboratory!
I want to share my cuties with everyone!

uw.name: Crystallized Technomagic, Rascal
description: Every 1.5 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
Every 1.4 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
Every 1.3 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
Every 1.1 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
Every 0.9 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
Every 0.7 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
uw.story: The essence of technomagic, created based on Annette's theory. Five of the highest-ranking court wizards of Orvel have poured their energy into creating this magical being. It has its own will, making it capable of making independent decisions and acting on them. While it shares its mana with Annette, it can also utilize any other available mana nearby. As such, it is the first great milestone in Annette's effort to make magic available to all.

s1.name: Blasting Ray
s1.description: Attacks enemies in a straight line, dealing {0} M.DMG, and hit enemies take {1}% increased M.DMG. If the skill is used when in Overcharge state, deals {2} extra M.DMG, and hit enemies take {3}% increased M.DMG.

books.2: Upon use, the amount of Charge gained is increased by 30%.

s1.light: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
s1.dark: Charge amount is boosted by 40% upon use.

s2.name: Emergency Treatment
s2.description: Dispels negative effects of all allies and heals a total of {0} HP for 10 sec while increasing CC Resistance by 250. While Overcharged, all allies' Crit Chance is increased by {1} and gains immunity to CC.

books.2: Upon use, the amount of Charge gained is increased by 30%.

s2.dark: Charge amount is boosted by 40% upon use.

ut.name: Script of Healing
description: [Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 20%.
[Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 24%.
[Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 29%.
[Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 35%.
[Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 42%.
[Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 50%.
ut.story: A healing script for emergencies. It's a product of the secret society of magic engineering, Babel's workshop for the month, 'Battles are Self-serve! Winning scripts in Mechanic Script Battles.' Created by Annette, it's a skill that can heal allies just through engineering, without borrowing any healing magic powers.

s3.name: Process of Elimination
s3.description: Fires an exploding energy ball to a random target and nearby enemies in rage, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG. When in Overcharge state, deals a total of {1} M.DMG and inflicts Stun for 5 sec upon explosion.

books.2: Upon use, the amount of Charge gained is increased by 30%.

s3.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG.

ut.name: Code of Annihilation
description: [Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 20% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 24% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 29% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 35% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 42% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 50% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
ut.story: The top secret code of Babel, the secret society of magic engineering. Magic for normal people! The secret society of technomagi, Babel, is an anonymous society that dreams of making magic available to all. They have each provided a technomagical technique as a secret code, and they've only allowed the use of it to those who can decipher it. Annette deciphered a top secret code in 4 minutes and is using it in the annihilation process.

s4.name: Charge
s4.description: Gains 1 stack of Charge every 0.5 sec, and gains 10 stacks of Charge per every orb of mana used. Upon the 100th Charge stacked, enters Overcharge state. When in Overcharge, ATK is increased by {0} for 15 sec and each auto attack reduces skill cooldown by 10%. All effects cannot be dispelled, and Charge will not stack during Overcharge state.

books.2: When Overcharged, ATK Spd is increased by {0}.

s4.light: ATK boost is increased by 40%.
s4.dark: Overcharge duration is increased by 3 sec.

t5.dark: When Overcharge activates, increase all allies Atk Spd by 200, and increase the ATK of all allies by 5% of Annette's ATK.

35.name: Mitra
35.subtitle: The Silver Battle Wolf
35.description: He is also called the Song of Silver Madness. A tactless man to the point of surprise, without any sense of responsibility. However, once the battle begins, he becomes an untouchable Silver Wolf, churning the battlefield into a zone of carnage.
35.story: Known to some as the Song of the Silver Madness, he is incredibly insincere in everything he does. He shows absolutely no sense of responsibility in regard to those around him. Once he engages in a combat, though, he turns into an untouchable silver wolf that storms across the battlefield. Nothing is known about his past. One thing is certain: he does not distinguish between friend and foe once the madness of battle takes over him. Staying near him when he's in this state may be far more dangerous than holding onto a ticking time bomb.
35.like: Battle, exciting fights, the smell of gunpowder

inn.idle: Haah....I just wanna go take a nap.

recruit.greet: Yo~
talk: Hey, did a fight happen somewhere?
Bleh, I don't wanna do anything right now.
Sometimes, I just wanna let loose.
recruit.gift: Whoa?! This is amazing!

affinity.greet: Oh, it's a great day for shooting.
talk: Things were good back then. That old guy may be strict, but he sure takes good care of his men. So when he left the army... I quit, too! Hahaha!
Oh, I wonder what the old man is doing.
affinity.gift: Oh, thank you.

relationship.greet: Oh, you're still alive! Hahaha!
talk: These guns of mine make me feel good. They're also kind of messed up...like me!
Kahaha! You know, these bastards whisper to me sometimes, eh. Pull the trigger, pull it, pull it~!!! Or so they say~
There's apparently a scary bounty hunter and former Imperial Navy on your tail. What does that feel like, eh? Hehehe...

uw.name: Roar of Madness, Velkinoth
description: Each auto attack increases Penetration and ATK Spd by 8. Can be stacked up to 30 times max.
Each auto attack increases Penetration and ATK Spd by 10. Can be stacked up to 30 times max.
Each auto attack increases Penetration and ATK Spd by 12. Can be stacked up to 30 times max.
Each auto attack increases Penetration and ATK Spd by 14. Can be stacked up to 30 times max.
Each auto attack increases Penetration and ATK Spd by 17. Can be stacked up to 30 times max.
Each auto attack increases Penetration and ATK Spd by 20. Can be stacked up to 30 times max.
uw.story: A pair of magical weapons that absorb the bloodlust of their user to enhance their own firepower. Each pull of their triggers pushes the user deeper and deeper into the craze of the battle. It is said that when a master craftsman creates a weapon, it develops a soul. Berkinos seem to have the soul of the war god. According to the story, when their creator pulled their triggers for the first time, he suddenly turned pale with terror and threw them into a river.

s1.name: Bang! Bang!!
s1.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times, dealing {0} P.DMG each. Upon Crit Hit, an explosion occurs, dealing {1} extra P.DMG to enemies in range.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 100% when there is 1 enemy.
s1.dark: Mark stacks 2 times.

s2.name: Time to Die!!
s2.description: For 20 sec, ATK is increased by {0} , and ACC is increased by {1}. Each auto attack has a 15% chance of activating 'Bang! Bang!!'.
s2.light: Takes 20% more DMG from all sources in exchange for an extra 100% in ATK increase.
s2.dark: Bang! Bang! chance is increased by 10%.

ut.name: Wolf's Barrage Box
description: [Time to Die!] Increases Crit DMG by 20% for the skill's duration. HP cannot be reduced below 10% for 3 sec.
[Time to Die!] Increases Crit DMG by 24% for the skill's duration. HP cannot be reduced below 10% for 3 sec.
[Time to Die!] Increases Crit DMG by 29% for the skill's duration. HP cannot be reduced below 10% for 3 sec.
[Time to Die!] Increases Crit DMG by 35% for the skill's duration. HP cannot be reduced below 10% for 3 sec.
[Time to Die!] Increases Crit DMG by 42% for the skill's duration. HP cannot be reduced below 10% for 3 sec.
[Time to Die!] Increases Crit DMG by 50% for the skill's duration. HP cannot be reduced below 10% for 3 sec.
ut.story: Steel Wolf's special barrage box. The Steel Wolves were infamous for being too violent and making it impossible to revitalize their enemies. The most infamous Silver Wolf only uses the maximized Wolf Barrage Box that he got from the owner of the Gold Bar.

s3.name: Dance with me!!
s3.description: Sprays gunshot at a random enemy 12 times, dealing a total of {0} P.DMG. Each damage inflicts 1 stack of Mark of Death that cannot be dispelled. Per every stacked Mark of Death, 'Dance with me!!' DMG is increased by 1%.
s3.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Stacks 2 more mark per hit.

ut.name: Wolfhead Mercenary Insignia
description: [Dance with me!!] DMG is increased by 20% and per every activation, skill cooldown is reduced by 5%. This effect can be stacked max 8 times.
[Dance with me!!] DMG is increased by 24% and per every activation, skill cooldown is reduced by 5%. This effect can be stacked max 8 times.
[Dance with me!!] DMG is increased by 29% and per every activation, skill cooldown is reduced by 5%. This effect can be stacked max 8 times.
[Dance with me!!] DMG is increased by 35% and per every activation, skill cooldown is reduced by 5%. This effect can be stacked max 8 times.
[Dance with me!!] DMG is increased by 42% and per every activation, skill cooldown is reduced by 5%. This effect can be stacked max 8 times.
[Dance with me!!] DMG is increased by 50% and per every activation, skill cooldown is reduced by 5%. This effect can be stacked max 8 times.
ut.story: Rune of the greatest mercenaries, the Steel Wolves. A rune that symbolizes the mercenary Steel Wolves, who were called the demons of the battlefield. Mitra was called the Silver Wolf of the battlefield. Even after he's left the mercenaries, he carries it in remembrance of the battle against the naval officer of the empire.

s4.name: You're Next!!
s4.description: Each auto attack inflicts a Mark of Death to enemies that cannot be dispelled. When auto attack and 'Bang! Bang!!' hits the target, deals {0} extra P.DMG. Per every stack, skill DMG is increased by 2%. Can be stacked up to 100 times max.
s4.light: Mark maximum is changed to 200.
s4.dark: All cooldowns are reduced by 0.3 when hitting a target with 100 stacks.

t5.dark: Upon a Crit Hit, increase Crit DMG by 0.5% and Atk Spd by 5. Max stack number is 100.

36.name: Ricardo
36.subtitle: Lua's Judgment
36.description: A noble hero who has guarded the realm of humans from the threat of the Demons for a long time. Utilizing a pillar blessed by the goddess, he crushes his enemies.
36.story: A hero who saved countless lives from the Demons, and the current commander of the Holy Knights of the Church of Lua. This brave and seasoned knight has been hunting down Demons all across Orvelia since his younger days. He is also the headmaster of the orphanage where Kasel, Frey, and Clause grew up. He trained countless warriors in Orvelia and is considered their spiritual leader. He is preparing to step down from the position due to his age, but his age-defying strength has always led to the denial of his retirement request.
36.dislike: Demons, especially those who attack people for no reason

inn.idle: I see you're all healthy. Good! Hahahaha!!

recruit.greet: Hahaha, it's you, eh? Have you been eating well?
talk: I may be old, but I'm still perfectly fine! Although, I can't tell when I'll be able to retire at this rate. Hahaha!!
Hahaha, my hips ache a bit, but eh, whatever. I can still go on!
Arm wrestling competition!? There's no way I'm missing this. Bring it on!!
recruit.gift: Haha, don't mind me. Just put it in the donation box for the orphanage! The kids will need that more than I do.

affinity.greet: How are you? Health is the most important thing!
talk: It looks like you've been training hard! Kwahahaha!!!
Liquor? I love it! Though, I can't drink as much as I used to!
affinity.gift: I'll have to buy some new clothes for the kids! Hahahaha!

relationship.greet: Haha, you look good today!
talk: When fighting with Demons, there are always a lot of civilian casualties... even more than the cases of normal wars between humans.
My age? Hahaha, it wouldn't be odd if I retired right now! They won't let me, though...
Life is a series of constant training! Don't slack off on exercise, now!

uw.name: Light of Judgment, Theoria
description: When an ally other than the caster takes DMG, there is a 10% chance that a shield is cast upon them to absorb DMG equal to 320% of ATK for 5 sec while granting immunity to CC. This effect does not trigger more than once in 5 sec.

When an ally other than the caster takes DMG, there is a 12% chance that a shield is cast upon them to absorb DMG equal to 384% of ATK for 5 sec while granting immunity to CC. This effect does not trigger more than once in 5 sec.

When an ally other than the caster takes DMG, there is a 14% chance that a shield is cast upon them to absorb DMG equal to 460% of ATK for 5 sec while granting immunity to CC. This effect does not trigger more than once in 5 sec.

When an ally other than the caster takes DMG, there is a 17% chance that a shield is cast upon them to absorb DMG equal to 552% of ATK for 5 sec while granting immunity to CC. This effect does not trigger more than once in 5 sec.

When an ally other than the caster takes DMG, there is a 20% chance that a shield is cast upon them to absorb DMG equal to 660% of ATK for 5 sec while granting immunity to CC. This effect does not trigger more than once in 5 sec.

When an ally other than the caster takes DMG, there is a 25% chance that a shield is cast upon them to absorb DMG equal to 800% of ATK for 5 sec while granting immunity to CC. This effect does not trigger more than once in 5 sec.
uw.story: When the Holy Sword Aea was bestowed upon Kyle, it appeared in the Temple of Lua located north of the King's Plains. When Kyle removed the sword from the altar, it released a powerful wave of light that turned the entire vicinity into a sacred ground. Everything contained within the Temple was turned into holy relics. Teoria, the central pillar of the Temple, absorbed the greatest amount of holy energy of them all.

s1.name: Destruction
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to frontal enemies in range and knocks them down for 3 sec.

books.2: Gains immunity to CC while in use.

s1.light: Target receives 25% increased P.DMG for 10 sec.
s1.dark: Deals extra P.DMG equal to 200% of M.DEF.

s2.name: Divine Protection
s2.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to enemies in range and inflicts Stun for 1 sec. Additionally, own M.DEF is increased by {1} for 10 sec, and takes 80% of M.DMG instead of allies.

books.2: For 10 sec, heals 1% of own HP per sec.

s2.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, Ricardo gains 30% DMG resistance to DMG taken due to covering for allies.
s2.dark: This skill's effect cannot be dispelled.

ut.name: Pride of Holy Warrior
description: [Divine Protection] Gains Immunity to CC and increases M.Resistance by 10% for the skill's duration.
[Divine Protection] Gains Immunity to CC and increases M.Resistance by 12% for the skill's duration.
[Divine Protection] Gains Immunity to CC and increases M.Resistance by 14% for the skill's duration.
[Divine Protection] Gains Immunity to CC and increases M.Resistance by 17% for the skill's duration.
[Divine Protection] Gains Immunity to CC and increases M.Resistance by 21% for the skill's duration.
[Divine Protection] Gains Immunity to CC and increases M.Resistance by 25% for the skill's duration.
ut.story: Shield of the arbiter of Lua's Holy Knights. Artifact given to those who've earned the title of Arbiter from the Lua's Holy Knights. An artifact imbued with Goddess Lua's blessing, it protects those under the benevolence of the god, and punishes enemies without mercy.

s3.name: Divine Judgment
s3.description: Attacks frontal enemies in a straight line 3 times. The first 2 attacks deal {0} P.DMG to enemies and stun them for 4 sec, and the last attack deals {1} P.DMG to enemies in a 20% wider range, while stunning them for 4 sec. Each attack has a 50% chance of dispelling positive effects from the enemy.

books.2: Blocks all DMG while the skill is in use.

s3.light: Stun duration is increased by 2 sec.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Templar Vow
description: [Divine Judgment] dispels enemies' positive effects with 75% chance, and reduces target's ATK Spd by 100 for 10 sec.
[Divine Judgment] dispels enemies' positive effects with 75% chance, and reduces target's ATK Spd by 120 for 10 sec.
[Divine Judgment] dispels enemies' positive effects with 75% chance, and reduces target's ATK Spd by 140 for 10 sec.
[Divine Judgment] dispels enemies' positive effects with 75% chance, and reduces target's ATK Spd by 170 for 10 sec.
[Divine Judgment] dispels enemies' positive effects with 75% chance, and reduces target's ATK Spd by 210 for 10 sec.
[Divine Judgment] dispels enemies' positive effects with 75% chance, and reduces target's ATK Spd by 250 for 10 sec.
ut.story: The seal that Ricardo used for the pledge of the Holy Warrior. When first appointed as a Holy Warrior, knights leave their names on the certificate of oath with their seals. Ricardo made his seal with his affection for the Church of Lua. He still carries it now, after all this time.

s4.name: Divine Blessing
s4.description: When allies excluding self take M.DMG, increases their M.DEF by {0} for 5 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
s4.light: M.DEF increase rate is boosted by 40%.
s4.dark: Max stack count is boosted to 8.

t5.dark: When own HP goes below 40%, HP does not go under 10% for 6 sec, and all allies' ATK is increased by 50% of own M.DEF. This effect is activated once every 60 sec.

37.name: Tanya
37.subtitle: The Silencing Blade
37.description: An elite assassin of the Laughing Masks, and a former colleague of Roi. In the past, she was a 'cleaner' that hunted down traitors. Her sharp katars never miss their mark.
37.story: An assassin of the Laughing Mask, and Roi's colleague. Although she has a physical advantage over Roi as a Half-Elf, she lacks his worldly wisdom and his ability to connect with others, traits that made him crucial in large-scale operations. This has given her something of an inferiority complex. As the 'Cleaner' of the organization, she was tasked with eliminating any traitors. When Roi abandoned the organization, she set out to chase him to figure out his motivation, leaving all her other tasks behind. Her plans after finding him remain to be seen.

recruit.greet: ...Hmph.
talk: ...Don't talk to me.
...Do not attempt to converse with a woman who knows nothing but killing.
....*sigh*
recruit.gift: ...I'll accept...for now.

affinity.greet: ...Hmm.
talk: I refuse to work as a janitor...
...You might get killed anytime.
affinity.gift: ...I don't... need it...

relationship.greet: ... So you came.
talk: Sorry... I am not the talkative type.
No fun would come of talking to a person like me...
Why are you interested in someone like me...? I do not understand...

uw.name: Demon of the Calm, Caethasis
description: Each auto attack has a 10% chance to deal 200% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 12% chance to deal 240% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 14% chance to deal 290% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 17% chance to deal 350% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 20% chance to deal 420% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 25% chance to deal 500% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.
uw.story: The Demon War dates back to 100 years ago. During this war, the greatest threat to mankind was, without a doubt, the high-ranking Demon officers. Kaitasis, the Demon of the Calm, was especially dangerous among them. Countless wizards and priests were slaughtered by this Demon who specifically targeted magic users for their souls. Eventually, Kaitasis was defeated by Kyle, and its core was sealed away. However, years later, the core came into the possession of the Laughing Mask and it once again served as an instrument of death.

s1.name: Target Sighted
s1.description: Moves behind the enemy with the lowest P.DEF and increase their P.DMG taken by {0}%, while knocking them down and inflicting {1} P.DMG. If in a Stealth state, stun said enemy for 6 sec. If not, gain Stealth for 10 sec. While in a Stealth State, Crit Rate and Dodge Rate rises by 50.
s1.light: Reduces the target's Heal Rate by 30%.
s1.dark: For 10 sec, target's P.Crit resistance is reduced by 250.

s2.name: Blade Tornado
s2.description: Attacks nearby enemies 3 times and deals a total of {0} P.DMG, inflicting 1 stack of Bleed per each hit. If used in a Stealth state, target's heal rate is reduced by 70%, and Stealth is dispelled. If not, turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. [Stealth] Crit Rate and Dodge Rate are increased by 50.
s2.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s2.dark: Recovers 200 mana upon a Crit hit.

ut.name: Laughing Mask All-round Belt
description: [Blade Tornado] Increases DMG by 20% and reduces Cooldown by 8% upon a Crit Hit.
[Blade Tornado] Increases DMG by 24% and reduces Cooldown by 8% upon a Crit Hit.
[Blade Tornado] Increases DMG by 29% and reduces Cooldown by 8% upon a Crit Hit.
[Blade Tornado] Increases DMG by 35% and reduces Cooldown by 8% upon a Crit Hit.
[Blade Tornado] Increases DMG by 42% and reduces Cooldown by 8% upon a Crit Hit.
[Blade Tornado] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 8% upon a Crit Hit.
ut.story: A multi-purpose tool of Laughing Masks used for assassination. It is a unique item for Laughing Masks, known for their speed and efficiency in eliminating their targets. Optimized to the wearer's attacking patterns, it improves the handling of throwing weapons and enhances continuous attacks while casting Blade Tornado.

s3.name: Whisper of Death
s3.description: Attacks random enemies 6 times and deals a total of {0} P.DMG, then deals one additional attack of {1} extra P.DMG. If used in Stealth state, dispels all enemies' buffs. If not, turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. [Stealth] Crit Rate and Dodge Rate are increased by 50.
s3.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.
s3.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.

ut.name: Dagger of Silence
description: [Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 20% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.
[Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 24% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.
[Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 29% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.
[Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 35% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.
[Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 42% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.
[Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 50% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.
ut.story: A dagger given to those who complete the first mission of the Laughing Mask. There's a rule that says that assassins should always carry the dagger that has traces of their target. The silent dagger that assassins carry like an amulet consistently whispers to them about death.

s4.name: Silent Ambush
s4.description: Deals {0} additional P.DMG to the enemy and silences them for {1} sec upon a Critical Hit with the skill. If the target is not a Hero, deals {2} additional P.DMG that ignores DEF and reduces the target's ATK Spd by {4} for {3} sec.

books.2: Silence duration is increased by {0} sec.

s4.light: Increases additional DMG against non-Hero enemies by 100%.
s4.dark: Increases Silence duration by 0.5 sec.

t5.dark: Auto attack damage is boosted by 50% while in Stealth mode.

38.name: Ezekiel
38.subtitle: The Cursed Blood
38.description: A mixed-blood between high-rank demon and human, Ezekiel is damned to curse his own existence. Slashes his powerful demonic right arm to tear apart his enemies.
38.story: The son of Lucikiel is a powerful Demon officer who brought down the Republic of Gray. Usually considerate and careful, he is actually half Human. In battle, his Demon blood takes over, turning him arrogant and violent. He inherited this power from his father, whom he never even knew. However, he takes pride in his power and does not try to hide it. Since he is only partly Demon, only a single arm undergoes the transformation. However, even just this single arm contains immense power, and it's certainly not easy for him to fully control it yet. If he loses the control of the arm, the only wise decision is to immediately get as far away from him as possible.
38.dislike: Weaklings who act tough, idiots who think they know everything

inn.idle: What'cha looking at?

recruit.greet: What? Say again?
talk: Hah, how bothersome...
Just go on your way.
Why y'all acting all chummy with me? Hah...
recruit.gift: Wha...what is this...oh well, yeah, I'll accept it...

affinity.greet: I'm tired because I didn't get enough sleep.
talk: I-I wonder what that fool from the Republic of Gray is up to nowadays.
You mean my hair? It looks great, right? This hair sticking up is what makes this style.
affinity.gift: Oh, thank you!

relationship.greet: Oh? So, you've already talked with the lame kid?
talk: I don't care that my father's a Demon. I'm strong, thanks to that!
That kiddo is too much of a softie. Nobody can hurt us!
Yeah, sometimes I can't control my own power. But hey, it's still fun in its own way! Hahaha!!

uw.name: Jailer of Despair Barbatos
description: Fury duration is increased by 2 sec and when in Fury state, Crit DMG is increased by 80%.
Fury duration is increased by 3 sec and when in Fury state, Crit DMG is increased by 90%.
Fury duration is increased by 4 sec and when in Fury state, Crit DMG is increased by 100%.
Fury duration is increased by 5 sec and when in Fury state, Crit DMG is increased by 110%.
Fury duration is increased by 6 sec and when in Fury state, Crit DMG is increased by 120%.
Fury duration is increased by 7 sec and when in Fury state, Crit DMG is increased by 130%.
uw.story: Ezekiel's father was one of the highest-ranking Demons. Although he does not know his father's name or face, he is aware of the tremendous power of the Demon blood he inherited. The Demon blood flowing within his veins also gave him a second personality. When his human blood prevails, Ezekiel is a young man of excellent character. At other times, he is an immensely powerful and arrogant Demon, just like his father. Barbatos, Jailer of Despair, manifests itself when Ezekiel's Demon blood is in full power. Taking the form of one of his arms, this weapon is powerful enough to slash through dimensions and sever the space itself. It is the physical representation of his father's power.

s1.name: Destructive Instinct
s1.description: Swipes nearby enemies in a circular range and deals {0} M.DMG. Then strikes the ground, dealing {1} M.DMG and knocking down enemies for 3 sec. [Fury] - Consumes 15% of current HP to activate. Effect range increases and swipe attack draws in enemies.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: After activation, ATK is increased by 40% for 5 sec.

s2.name: Dawning Despair
s2.description: Dashes to an enemy with the highest ATK and deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in range, reducing their ATK Spd by {1}. [Fury] - Consumes 10% of current HP to activate. Effect range increases, Stuns target for {2} sec, and increases own ATK Spd by {4} for {3} sec.
s2.dark: When activated during Fury state, ignores target DEF.

ut.name: Wild Beast's Choker
description: [Dawning Despair] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases ATK Spd by 100 for 10 sec.
[Dawning Despair] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases ATK Spd by 120 for 10 sec.
[Dawning Despair] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases ATK Spd by 140 for 10 sec.
[Dawning Despair] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases ATK Spd by 170 for 10 sec.
[Dawning Despair] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases ATK Spd by 210 for 10 sec.
[Dawning Despair] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases ATK Spd by 250 for 10 sec.
ut.story: Choker made with the skin of a powerful beast. Loot that celebrates the manticore that Ezekiel hunted after a hard battle against the Demons when he was young. Ezekiel remembers the joy of killing the manticore every time he touches the violent beast's choker, just before he charges at the formidable enemy in front of him.

s3.name: Strike of Doom
s3.description: Charges energy and attacks target enemy, dealing {0} M.DMG and inflicting Stun for {1} sec. [Fury] - Consumes 20% of current HP to activate. Attacks enemies in range of target and DMG is tripled.
s3.light: Becomes immune to CC during activation.
s3.dark: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.

ut.name: Sealing Binds
description: [Strike of Doom] DMG is increased by 20% and gains 1 additional stack of Cursed Blood after using the skill.
[Strike of Doom] DMG is increased by 24% and gains 1 additional stack of Cursed Blood after using the skill.
[Strike of Doom] DMG is increased by 29% and gains 1 additional stack of Cursed Blood after using the skill.
[Strike of Doom] DMG is increased by 35% and gains 1 additional stack of Cursed Blood after using the skill.
[Strike of Doom] DMG is increased by 42% and gains 1 additional stack of Cursed Blood after using the skill.
[Strike of Doom] DMG is increased by 50% and gains 1 additional stack of Cursed Blood after using the skill.
ut.story: A bond containing the mana of an unknown priest. Young Ezekiel used to go berserk frequently. If anyone insulted his mom, he would allow his boiling demon blood to take over. Once he return to his senses, he would stare at his wounded arm and his terrified mom. When he was older, Ezekiel was getting rid of demons when he got into an argument with a bigger priest of Lua. He went berserk, just like any other day. Ezekiel was alone when he came to, and he was taken aback by the bond on his cursed arm. When he tried to take it off, he found that the priest's magic couldn't be shaken off so easily. However, he stopped going berserk and losing his consciousness after that. He's gained greater control over his mana, so it's now one of his most treasured items.

s4.name: Cursed Blood
s4.description: Ezekiel gains 1 stack of 'Cursed Blood' at the end of skill. Upon the 4th stack, consumes Cursed Blood to reset all skill cooldown, dealing {0} M.DMG to nearby enemies and knocking them down for 3 sec, while activating Fury for {1} sec, that cannot be dispelled. While in Fury state, goes into an auto-battle mode that cannot be controlled, and ATK is increased by {2} , auto attack DMG is doubled, and all Skill effect are reinforced. Cannot gain Cursed Blood during Fury state, except for when killing an enemy.
s4.light: When in Fury state, heal rate is increased by 50%.
s4.dark: Per every stacked 'Cursed Blood', takes 12% reduced DMG.

t5.dark: When in Fury state, auto attack deals DMG that ignores DEF.

39.name: Cassandra
39.subtitle: Tempting Winds
39.description: The Femme Fatale Owner of the Gold Bar. True to her notoriety, her first impression is that of a sexy, erotic charmer. She cheers on her allies with tempting dances.
39.story: She's the owner of 'Gold Bar,' the biggest and the most luxurious tavern in Vespia. Beneath its flashy exterior, the tavern actually serves as a secret meeting place for the social elites, where invaluable secret information is constantly exchanged. Her natural charm and conversation skills can easily break down personal barriers and win the trust of others. Her true identity is a dealer of secret information and weapons.
39.dislike: Nasty customers Greasy hair Bad odor

inn.idle: Oh my, welcome~ Well, it's not my shop anyway, but~

recruit.greet: Oh, are you hitting on me? Ufufu...
talk: One more round for me~Oh, this person here will take the check~
Weapon info? Hmm, now I don't think I know what you're talking about...?
Fufu, you look happy today. What's going on, I wonder~?
recruit.gift: Fufu, you didn't have to~ I wonder how I should show my gratitude.

affinity.greet: Oh, hello!
talk: I heard some people dilute liquor with water... *Sigh...* I'm worried.
It's my job, so my body mixes up day and night. I'm so tired.
affinity.gift: Oh! Thank you, I'll use it well.

relationship.greet: Hmm, I was just thinking about you. Apparently you were, too~?
talk: Winning over the minds of people is my job...but I won't do that on you.
Keep this secret - not only the Empire, but Orvelia is also holding many deals as of late...especially those from the Royal Palace...
Even while sharing a glass of wine...sometimes, it feels as if I'm alone. With you, though...

uw.name: Aurelian Whisper, Goldbreeze
description: Every 15 sec, heals an ally with the lowest HP by 200% of ATK and dispels all negative effects.
Every 14 sec, heals an ally with the lowest HP by 240% of ATK and dispels all negative effects.
Every 12.5 sec, heals an ally with the lowest HP by 290% of ATK and dispels all negative effects.
Every 11 sec, heals an ally with the lowest HP by 350% of ATK and dispels all negative effects.
Every 9.5 sec, heals an ally with the lowest HP by 420% of ATK and dispels all negative effects.
Every 8 sec, heals an ally with the lowest HP by 500% of ATK and dispels all negative effects.
uw.story: Cassandra works double as an arms dealer. One day, a stolen item came into her possession which immediately caught her attention. It was a beautiful fan adorned with gold decorations and precious gems. According to the rumors, every single lady who possessed this fan soon fell into great misfortune. It has been circulating the market as a cursed item. As soon as she bought it, Cassandra began investigating its origin. As it turned out, this fan, named Goldbreeze, had been created to serve as a concealed weapon. It shouldn't be too hard to guess as to what kind of misfortune the unaware owners of this fan might have suffered.

s1.name: Softly~
s1.description: Heals all allies by {0} HP and deals {1} M.DMG to all enemies. Hit enemies are inflicted by Silence for 2 sec.

books.0: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.1: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.2: Silence duration is increased by {0} sec.

s1.light: Healed allies gain a 200 ATK Spd boost for 10 sec.
s1.dark: For 5 sec, hit enemies have their Mana reduced by 200 every second.

s2.name: Fiercely!
s2.description: For 15 sec, all allies' ATK is increased by {0} and Crit Chance is increased by {1}.
s2.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Fancy Ornament
description: [Fiercely!] Increases duration by 5 sec and additionally increases Crit DMG by 20%.
[Fiercely!] Increases duration by 5 sec and additionally increases Crit DMG by 24%.
[Fiercely!] Increases duration by 5 sec and additionally increases Crit DMG by 29%.
[Fiercely!] Increases duration by 5 sec and additionally increases Crit DMG by 35%.
[Fiercely!] Increases duration by 5 sec and additionally increases Crit DMG by 42%.
[Fiercely!] Increases duration by 5 sec and additionally increases Crit DMG by 50%.
ut.story: A luxurious accessory made by the greatest jeweler in the continent. A limited edition ornament created by jeweler Larik. Any person in high society on the Orbis Continent would love to have one. His work is said to be the epitome of art, and it is said to heal and grant courage. There are only 3 of the limited edition Fancy Ornaments, and one of them obviously belongs to the master of the Gold Bar.

s3.name: Tempting Wave
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to an enemy with the highest ATK. If this skill is used in Arena, inflicts Charm on the target for 7 sec. If this skill is used outside the Arena, enemy takes {1}% increased M.DMG. Charmed enemies cannot use any skills, and deals auto attack to own allies.

books.2: Charm duration is increased by {0} sec.

s3.light: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
