description: [Tempting Wave] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and Charm duration is increased by 1 sec.
[Tempting Wave] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and Charm duration is increased by 1.5 sec.
[Tempting Wave] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and Charm duration is increased by 2 sec.
[Tempting Wave] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and Charm duration is increased by 2.5 sec.
[Tempting Wave] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and Charm duration is increased by 3 sec.
[Tempting Wave] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and Charm duration is increased by 3.5 sec.
ut.story: A legendary gold flame necklace pendant. The legendary Gold King made this gold flame necklace pendant to get the attention of the Goddess of Love and Beauty. Its gold scent creates a Tempting Wave that makes anyone join their side and be loved by everyone.

s4.name: Gentle Touch
s4.description: At the start of each battle, reduces mana cost by 2 orbs for a single skill, and all allies' DEF is increased by {0} for 5 sec.
s4.light: All DMG upon allies is reduced by 20% for 5 sec.
s4.dark: DEF increase effect has its duration increased by 5 sec.

t5.dark: At the beginning of each battle, a random ally is immune to DMG for 3 sec.

40.name: Theo
40.subtitle: Knight of Loyalty
40.description: The 1st Knight of the long lost Republic of Gray, who wanders the world in search of his long lost liege, Jane. His dual spears hold a dangerous power, lying in wait to pierce enemy demons mercilessly.
40.story: A knight who served the Republic of Gray 100 years ago, and an admirer of Jane Gray. Theo was the First Knight of the Republic and the wielder of the Lightning Legios. During the Duchy's battle against the Demon Army, the Mountain Fortress went on a rampage when its seal was lifted. Under Jane's order, Theo set out to contain it. In his absence, powerful Demon officers attacked the royal palace. Theo returned to fight them despite heavy injury, but was unable to defeat them by himself. When the battle was over, he held the body of the princess in his arms and cried out from the ruins of the palace. Suddenly, a mysterious entity offered him a chance to defend his princess for all eternity. When he accepted, he fell into a deep slumber.

inn.idle: I am Theo Phil Grayum of the Gray Republic.

recruit.greet: Oh, it's you. We've met before, have we not?
talk: I wish to see her once more.
...More than a hundred winters have passed.
Have you, by any chance, seen a beautiful white-haired lady?
recruit.gift: Your heart is filled with warmth.

affinity.greet: Hello.
talk: Not all demons are evil... Like that cat, you know.
I've used a spear ever since I was young. I'm used to wielding a spear.
affinity.gift: Thank you. My heart is warming up.

relationship.greet: How are you? It has been a while.
talk: It was the first time I felt so warm inside...as if the Sun was standing just before my eyes.
A lot of people ask me - why go so far? I say...I have merely been living the way my heart tells me to.
If she doesn't recognize me when we finally meet...I do not know what expression I should make...

uw.name: Lightning Bolt, Legios
description: Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 300, Crit DMG is increased by 100%, and Penetration is increased by 300. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 360, Crit DMG is increased by 120%, and Penetration is increased by 360. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 430, Crit DMG is increased by 144%, and Penetration is increased by 430. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 520, Crit DMG is increased by 173%, and Penetration is increased by 520. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 620, Crit DMG is increased by 208%, and Penetration is increased by 620. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 750, Crit DMG is increased by 250%, and Penetration is increased by 750. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.
uw.story: A spear said to have been forged from a bolt of lightning. Electricity constantly flows around this impressive spear that stands as tall as an average adult male. Forging a spear from lightning was a tremendous task. But then again, Jin was no ordinary blacksmith. He smelted a huge mana stone infused with a red dragon's blood. He used this to contain the lightning before forging it into a spear. Aside from its chosen master, no person can touch this weapon. When its two pieces are combined, it lets out a tremendous flux of energy that resembles a dragon's roar.

s1.name: Final Crash
s1.description: Attacks 16 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG to enemies in range. Upon each Crit Hit, Crit DMG is increased by 3% for 10 sec, and there is a 30% chance to deal {1} extra M.DMG, inflicting stun for 0.3 sec. Crit DMG boost can be stacked up to 30 times max.
s1.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s1.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.

s2.name: God of Lightning
s2.description: Upon casting, activates 'God of Lightning' and throws a spear of lightning at the enemy, dealing {0} M.DMG. Hit enemy takes {1}% increased M.DMG for 10 sec. While in 'God of Lightning' state, cannot recover mana for 10 sec, but activation chance of 'For Jane' is increased by 40% and ATK is increased by {2}.

books.0: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%
books.1: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%
books.2: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%

s2.dark: DMG taken while in Lightning God state is increased by 30% but ATK increase rate is increased by 100%.

ut.name: God of Lightning's Necklace
description: [God of Lightning] ATK Spd is increased by 250 for the duration of skill, and the activation chance of 'For Jane' is increased by an additional 8%.
[God of Lightning] ATK Spd is increased by 250 for the duration of skill, and the activation chance of 'For Jane' is increased by an additional 9.6%.
[God of Lightning] ATK Spd is increased by 250 for the duration of skill, and the activation chance of 'For Jane' is increased by an additional 11.5%.
[God of Lightning] ATK Spd is increased by 250 for the duration of skill, and the activation chance of 'For Jane' is increased by an additional 13.8%.
[God of Lightning] ATK Spd is increased by 250 for the duration of skill, and the activation chance of 'For Jane' is increased by an additional 16.5%.
[God of Lightning] ATK Spd is increased by 250 for the duration of skill, and the activation chance of 'For Jane' is increased by an additional 20%.
ut.story: Called a thunderbolt from the sky. Legios is also called a holy beast. The power of Legios was so strong that when they made it into a weapon, the Republic of Gray couldn't contain all of its power. So the greatest piece was put in the Spear of Lightning, and the remaining pieces were put into different places. One of those pieces was put into God of Lightning's Necklace. It is said that anyone with this necklace can commune with the Spear of Lightning and get closer to the power of Legios.

s3.name: Lightning Explosion
s3.description: Jumps and strikes, thrusting the spear to the ground and hitting target enemy and enemies in range 5 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec.

s3.dark: Stun duration is increased by 1 sec.

[Lightning Explosion] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and upon attack, deals 48% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
[Lightning Explosion] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and upon attack, deals 58% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
[Lightning Explosion] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and upon attack, deals 70% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
[Lightning Explosion] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and upon attack, deals 84% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
[Lightning Explosion] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and upon attack, deals 100% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
ut.story: Legacy of the fallen Republic of Gray. A treasure that a respected palace wizard of the Republic of Gray gave to the 1st Knight Theo, who received the Lightning Bolt Legios. The Lightning Essence that has the energy of the Lightning Bolt maximizes the effect of Lightning Explosion.

s4.name: For Jane
s4.description: Each auto attack has a 20% chance of dealing {0} M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 0.7 sec.
s4.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s4.dark: Stun duration is increased by 0.2 sec.

t5.dark: When 'God of Lightning' is activated, recovers half mana instead. When mana is full, ATK is increased by 50% for 10 sec. This effect only activates once every 20 sec.

41.name: Mediana
41.subtitle: The Dangerous Doctor
41.description: A doctor whose technique originates from eras with scarce numbers of Priests and Healing Magic. She fires medicine from her large needle to empower allies, or weaken the enemy.
41.story: A practitioner of the medical arts developed when priests were short in supply. She inherited her natural medical talent from her father, but her thirst for knowledge crossed the line when she began researching poison. As a result, she was excommunicated from medical society, but her enthusiasm for research was seemingly unaffected. However, her basic respect for life kept her from achieving any experimental results for her poison research. When the Demons appeared, she became overjoyed at finding rare and precious test subjects.

inn.idle: Fufufu, finally, a worthy test subject has appeared.

recruit.greet: Welcome. Have we met before?
talk: Would you like to test out my new medicine? Fufu, do not be afraid.
I sometimes long for my disowned father.
Just a second, I just thought of an extremely effective compound of medicine.
recruit.gift: Oh, thank you. May I use this as research material?

affinity.greet: Hello. I came to rest, so this is good.
talk: The new drug? Ha ha, I'm testing it out.
Gotta take notes... I have to jot down all my ideas.
affinity.gift: Oh, thank you. I'll be able to create a new poison, hahaha...

relationship.greet: How are you doing? Please tell me if you feel sick.
talk: I know I'm a bit strange. But well, that's just how I am.
One day, I believe that medicine and treatment will do better than healing magic.
You are not my test subject, you are more like...the final recipient. Ah, not for poisons. I meant that as a doctor.

uw.name: Merciful Threat, Phistonia
description: Special Poison DMG is increased by 40% and targets inflicted by Poison take 30% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 48% and targets inflicted by Poison take 36% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 57% and targets inflicted by Poison take 43% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 69% and targets inflicted by Poison take 52% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 83% and targets inflicted by Poison take 62% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 100% and targets inflicted by Poison take 75% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.
uw.story: The story goes back to when Mediana's poison experiments were still being kept secret from her peers. One day, a fellow doctor noticed the giant syringe she had made. Impressed by its sheer size, he asked her: 'Look at the size of that thing. Shouldn't you at least give it a name?' To this, Mediana replied, nonchalantly: 'Oh... Just call it... Piston.'

s1.name: Healing Salve
s1.description: Heals all allies by {0} and makes them immune to the next single hit of DMG.
s1.light: Boosts healed ally ATK by 10% for 10 sec.
s1.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

s2.name: Special Water Cannon
s2.description: Fires a water cannon in a frontal direction, healing allies in range of {0} HP every 0.5 sec, and dealing {1} P.DMG to the enemy.

books.0: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.1: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.2: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.

s2.light: DMG and Heal rate are increased by 40%.
s2.dark: Gain CC immunity while using said skill.

ut.name: Special Potion of Double Reaction
description: [Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by 12%.
[Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by 14%.
[Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by 17%.
[Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by 21%.
[Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by 25%.
[Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by 30%.
ut.story: A special potion that has two type of effects. Mediana wondered if there was a way to handle attack and recovery at once. She went to the library and read a dusty book called 'Slimes Can Also Make Cannons.' Mediana was reading just for fun, but found a way to apply the principle of cannons into her piston. She was then able to invent the Special Potion of Double Reaction and maximize recovery and attack when using Special Water Cannon. Mediana is still thankful to the author of the book who gave her the inspiration.

s3.name: Strengthening Potion
s3.description: Injects the ally with the highest ATK with a strengthening potion, increasing their ATK by 20%+ {0} of Mediana's ATK and keeping their HP from falling below 5%.
s3.light: ATK boost is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Crit Chance is boosted by 400.

ut.name: Mysterious Potion
description: [Strengthening Potion] dispels target's negative effects and target gains immunity to CC for 2 sec.
[Strengthening Potion] dispels target's negative effects and target gains immunity to CC for 3 sec.
[Strengthening Potion] dispels target's negative effects and target gains immunity to CC for 4 sec.
[Strengthening Potion] dispels target's negative effects and target gains immunity to CC for 5 sec.
[Strengthening Potion] dispels target's negative effects and target gains immunity to CC for 6 sec.
[Strengthening Potion] dispels target's negative effects and target gains immunity to CC for 7 sec.
ut.story: A special potion that has the teachings of a master. The genius surgeon and expert on anatomy, Doctor Aldini, is Mediana's master. Doctor Aldini recognized her talent early on, and he taught her extraordinary medical knowledge that couldn't have been imagined in the Church of Lua. The unidentifiable potion that was made with her master's special recipe increases the effect of the Strengthening Potion.

s4.name: Mediana's Special Poison
s4.description: Increases all allies' ATK by {0} and P.Crit Resistance by {1}. Upon attack, injects the enemy with a special poison that deals {2} P.DMG over time for 5 sec and reduces P.Crit Resistance by {3}.

books.2: All allies' P.Block is increased by {0}.

s4.light: P.Crit Resistance amount is changed to 300.
s4.dark: Target takes 20% increased P.DMG.

t5.dark: When Mediana takes DMG, all allies gain 2% ATK. This effect stacks 20 times.

42.name: Oddy
42.subtitle: Clocksmith of Eternal Life
42.description: A clocksmith that was cursed by the divine animals called the Redpur. His magical clock attacks and petrifies enemies and also allows his allies to use abilites faster.
42.story: He was a mechanic of the royal palace of Orvelia in the distant past. However, he was cursed by the mythical creature Redpur and turned into a Redpur himself. Ever since the transformation, he has been living for so long that he forgot his own age. When he was Human, he invented the first portable watch, but no one in Orvelia saw its true value. To give his invention the recognition it deserved, he set out to the empire. On his way, he was cursed by a group of Redpurs who mistook him for a poacher. The curse also affected his watch, giving it a magical power to control the time flow within a living body. Oddy's own time stopped as well.

inn.idle: Haha~!! Orvelia sure has changed.

recruit.greet: Greetings, greetings.
talk: Hmm, there's enough time. Shall we talk for a bit?
I used to be a human once...but now I'm a Redpur.
My watch is enchanted with magic. The magic of the Redpur...
recruit.gift: Oho~it's been a while since I received such human-like presents!

affinity.greet: Hmm? Oh, you're here.
talk: You don't have time? Ha ha, then just make time.
You've never seen a Redpur before? Not surprised. They're always hiding!
affinity.gift: A gift? Hm, I'll have to prepare something next time.

relationship.greet: Welcome, welcome!
talk: Ah, I miss my Redpur friends...
I don't really remember my days as a human. It has been so long.
I thought I was the first to invent the pocket watch, but apparently ancient civilizations were far more advanced than I expected.

uw.name: Moonshade Countdown, Tempodiana
description: Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 2 sec, and ATK is increased by 14% for 10 sec.
Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 3 sec, and ATK is increased by 17% for 10 sec.
Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 4 sec, and ATK is increased by 21% for 10 sec.
Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 5 sec, and ATK is increased by 25% for 10 sec.
Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 6 sec, and ATK is increased by 30% for 10 sec.
Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 7 sec, and ATK is increased by 35% for 10 sec.
uw.story: After Oddy's watch was zapped with the Redpur curse and gained the power to control time over a living being, he used the infinite time he gained to research its possible applications. When he finally created a watch containing the essence of time magic after so many trials, Oddy found out that the secret of Redpur magic originated from moonlight and the shadow it creates. He named his masterpiece 'Tempodiana,' and gave it the nickname 'Moonshade Countdown.'

s1.name: Time Fracture
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in a straight line, and inflicts Petrify for 3 sec.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec.

s2.name: Time Fragments
s2.description: Attacks random enemies 6 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG. With 50% chance, 'Time Fragments' cooldown resets and consumes no mana for the next single activation.
s2.dark: While in cooldown, auto-attacks will reduce the cooldown of 'Time Fragments' by 1 sec.

ut.name: Fragment Collection
description: [Time Fragments] Has a 25% chance to reset Cooldown and increases DMG by 20%.
[Time Fragments] Has a 25% chance to reset Cooldown and increases DMG by 24%.
[Time Fragments] Has a 25% chance to reset Cooldown and increases DMG by 29%.
[Time Fragments] Has a 25% chance to reset Cooldown and increases DMG by 35%.
[Time Fragments] Has a 25% chance to reset Cooldown and increases DMG by 42%.
[Time Fragments] Has a 25% chance to reset Cooldown and increases DMG by 50%.
ut.story: Time Fragments that fell from the shadows of the moon. Sometimes, Time Fragments fall from another dimension from the effect of the shadow of the moon that appears when using time magic. The Time Fragments are small, but when gathered, they become a giant Fragment Collection of records, which give ceaseless inspiration to the caster.

s3.name: Time Distortion
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to all enemies and increases all allies' ATK Spd by {1} for 15 sec. All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by 50%. 'Time Distortion' is not affected by skill cooldown reduction.
s3.light: Increases Mana Cost by 2 and fully recovers Mana for all allies.
s3.dark: When there are 5 or more enemies, increases DMG by 100%. Hit Enemies take extra 50% DMG for 10 sec.

ut.name: Threads of Time
description: [Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 20% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.
[Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 24% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.
[Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 29% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.
[Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 35% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.
[Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 42% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.
[Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 50% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.
ut.story: Fur of the Red Fur chief hung in the shadow of the moon. It is said that the mythical creature, the Red Fur Chief, uses the shadow of the moon during full moon to go through dimensions and dance. The Red Fur Chief dances until the shadow of the moon disappears, and it is said that his tail sometimes gets stuck in the pathway. The fur of the colorful mythical creature gets stuck in the rift of time and space and stops time temporarily. Oddy uses the fur from the traces of the shadows of the moon to make a skein and uses it effectively for Time Distortion.

s4.name: Clock Magic
s4.description: Upon using the skill, next 2 attacks deal {0} additional M.DMG with a 30% chance to petrify the target for 3 sec. This effect activates every 1 sec.
s4.light: Changes the instances of gaining extra DMG from using the skill to 3 times.
s4.dark: Changes the chance to Petrify to 40%.

t5.dark: Every 10 sec, any skills on cooldown for 4 random allies have their cooldowns reduced by 1 sec.

43.name: Viska
43.subtitle: Demon Eater
43.description: A rogue demon, aiming to devour other demons to raise her own power. She traveled across the rift between dimensions to hunt down the powerful demons currently residing in the Material World. Her spikes exist to rip and tear through enemies.
43.story: A maverick among Demons who seeks to grow her own power by devouring other powerful Demons. She embodies the worst possible meaning of the word Demon. She crossed the dimensional rift to seek out and devour the Demons who traveled to the earthly realm. She placed a limit on her own power and assumed the form of a sickly young girl to further humiliate her victims. She detests weaklings who pretend to be strong. On the other hand, she respects those who recognize their own weaknesses and risk their lives in the pursuit of strength.
43.like: Fighting powerful demons and devouring them afterward

inn.idle: Eh...no Demons? I feel hungry...

recruit.greet: Hello~Any snacks? Any Demons?
talk: If I don't find something to eat soon, she'll start a tantrum...eh? Ah, it's nothing. Hahaha....Phew.
Feeling a bit peckish...Hey, do you know of any Demons in the nearby area that seem strong?
This? It's the Mark of a Demon Contract. Well, I don't know the specifics.
recruit.gift: What's this? Can I eat it?

affinity.greet: Oh, I think I smell something delicious?
talk: I'm hungry... Do you have anything good to eat? Nothing? Really?
Demon souls are the best, but regular food is pretty good, too!
affinity.gift: Something good! Something good!

relationship.greet: Hey there. I'm still hungry, you know...
talk: Me? Well, I'm just a normal village girl...who is posessed by a Demon. Nothing more, nothing less.
My form during battles? Ah, that's Viska, the Demon inside me. Normally, she lets me control my body, but when we fight...
I don't feel anything about eating Demons. In fact, they rather deserve it... and well, the two of us are now one...

uw.name: Nightmare Fang, Kitrax
description: Enemies that had their Souls stolen take 25% increased M.DMG. Lasts for 10 sec.
Enemies that had their Souls stolen take 30% increased M.DMG. Lasts for 10 sec.
Enemies that had their Souls stolen take 36% increased M.DMG. Lasts for 10 sec.
Enemies that had their Souls stolen take 43% increased M.DMG. Lasts for 10 sec.
Enemies that had their Souls stolen take 51% increased M.DMG. Lasts for 10 sec.
Enemies that had their Souls stolen take 60% increased M.DMG. Lasts for 10 sec.
uw.story: Nightmare Kitrax was known as the best, and the most terrifying, of the succubi. After devouring Kitrax whole, soul and all, Viska came up with her most powerful weapon yet. This spike is the physical manifestation of fear and despair. Death is the only fate of its unfortunate victims. It constantly injects fear into its victim's soul, reducing even the most formidable enemy to mere prey.

s1.name: Meal Time!!
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to frontal enemies in range. For 10 sec, Hit enemies' ATK is reduced by {1}% for and own ATK is increased by {2}. If used while holding 3 or more stacks of Soul, shackles the enemy for 3 sec.
s1.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, cooldown is reduced by 4 sec.
s1.dark: Soul condition for Shackle effect is erased.

s2.name: I'll slice you up!!
s2.description: Moves behind the target, dispelling positive effects and dealing {0} M.DMG while inflicting knock down. If used while holding 3 or more stacks of Soul, reduces enemy M.DEF by {1}% for 15 sec.
s2.dark: Soul condition for M.DEF reduction is erased.

ut.name: Rampaging Beast's Claw
description: [I'll Slice You Up!] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and adds 8% M.DEF reduction.
[I'll Slice You Up!] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and adds 10% M.DEF reduction.
[I'll Slice You Up!] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and adds 12% M.DEF reduction.
[I'll Slice You Up!] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and adds 14% M.DEF reduction.
[I'll Slice You Up!] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and adds 17% M.DEF reduction.
[I'll Slice You Up!] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and adds 20% M.DEF reduction.
ut.story: Claw of the violent magic beast Urgol, who is said to bite off souls. The day Viska decided to hunt in the Material World, she devoured Urgol from the Demon World. Combined with the ability that Viska has to absorb the power of others, it displayed great power, and it is essential to eat Demons who trespassed to the Material World.

s3.name: I'll rip you to pieces!!
s3.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in a wide surrounding area, and inflicts Stun for 3 sec. If used while holding 5 stacks of Soul, consumes all stacks to reset the cooldown of this skill.

books.2: Enemies nearby are drawn in right before the attack occurs.

s3.light: The 5 Soul consuming effect no longer consumes Souls.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Soul of a Giant Demon
description: [I'll rip you to pieces!!] Gain immunity to CC during skill activation and upon every use, DMG is increased by 4%. This effect is stacked max 10 times.
[I'll rip you to pieces!!] Gain immunity to CC during skill activation and upon every use, DMG is increased by 4.8%. This effect is stacked max 10 times.
[I'll rip you to pieces!!] Gain immunity to CC during skill activation and upon every use, DMG is increased by 5.8%. This effect is stacked max 10 times.
[I'll rip you to pieces!!] Gain immunity to CC during skill activation and upon every use, DMG is increased by 7%. This effect is stacked max 10 times.
[I'll rip you to pieces!!] Gain immunity to CC during skill activation and upon every use, DMG is increased by 8.4%. This effect is stacked max 10 times.
[I'll rip you to pieces!!] Gain immunity to CC during skill activation and upon every use, DMG is increased by 10%. This effect is stacked max 10 times.
ut.story: Crystallized form of great demon Curapis's soul, who has the power to get big. He was one of the first demons that Viska hunted in the Demon World, and it is said that it used its big body to dominate his enemies. But battle isn't all about strength, but using one's brain as well. The giant demon was defeated and eaten by a predator who used her brain. The power to get big became Viska's, and she can use it freely now.

s4.name: Yummy Souls!
s4.description: Enemies attacked with Viska's skills lose Souls. Upon losing their Soul, targets take {0} extra M.DMG, and per each soul stacked, Viska's HP is healed by {1} and Mana is healed by 300. Souls last until they are used, can't be dispelled and can be stacked up to 5 times max.

books.0: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.1: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.2: Enemies that had their Souls stolen lose {0} mana.

s4.light: Enemies that had their Souls stolen have their CC resistance reduced by 250 for 10 sec.
s4.dark: Per each stacked Soul, ATK is increased by 10%

t5.dark: Per each stacked Soul, Crit Chance is increased by 50 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.

44.name: Priscilla
44.subtitle: Maid of Steel
44.description: Formally one of the highest order of the Orvelian Army, she became the maid of the genius mage, Aisha; the single daughter of the noble Daphnel Pon family. Her powerful halberd cuts down all enemies swiftly.
44.story: A former officer of Orvelia's armed forces. After a failed attempt to reveal the corruption of military leaders, she was driven out from her position. Wanting to conceal their corruption, the military leaders constantly sent out assassins to eliminate her. The long and lonely fight was beginning to take its toll on her, physically and mentally. One day, the aristocratic von Daphnel family offered her protection in exchange for her service. She accepted, and has been working as Aisha's maid in the Tower of Sage ever since. To this day, she faithfully carries out her duties as a maid bodyguard. However, she sends all her payments to an undisclosed recipient.
44.like: Comrades in arms, her lady, cute outfits for her lady

inn.idle: Milady is napping at the moment.

recruit.greet: Milady isn't currently at her room.
talk: We'll talk at the next opportunity.
I am no longer a soldier.
recruit.gift: I am not used to such presents, but thank you.

affinity.greet: It's you. Good to see you.
talk: I hope my lady likes the new tea set I bought.
I'll have to stop by the forge to sharpen my axe.
affinity.gift: Thank you. I hope you prepare some fresh tea next time.

relationship.greet: So it's you... it's been a while.
talk: Perhaps my past subordinates have suffered too much from my youthful outbursts...
She was such a small child, trying so hard to be an adult... So, I felt that I had to protect her.
I am satisfied with my current life. My wages are decent enough to let me help with my past subordinates' lives, too.

uw.name: Tumultuous Dance, Excilius
description: When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1.2 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1.4 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1.7 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 2 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 2.5 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.
uw.story: During her military career, Priscilla felled countless enemies with her halberd. Although the halberd fell into a state of disrepair following her retirement, it was later resurrected as Exilius. This upgrade was a part of the order sent to Annette to create Mahitra for Aisha. This razor-sharp and incredibly durable new weapon even has the magical power to draw its enemies in. Those who have seen Priscilla slaughtering her Demon foes using this halberd claim that it was like watching an unstoppable storm.

s1.name: Vital Strike
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to frontal enemies in range and stuns them for 1 sec. This attack always inflicts a Crit Hit.
s1.light: Stun duration is increased by 2 sec.
s1.dark: No longer Crits unconditionally, and Crit DMG is increased by 150%.

s2.name: Coordination
s2.description: For 20 sec, places Priscilla and an ally with the highest ATK in 'Coordination' state, and dispels Negative Effects. Priscilla and the ally in Coordination State get an ATK boost equal to 15% of Priscilla's ATK + {0}.
s2.dark: While in Co-Op state, auto attacks increase the target's received DMG from all sources by 15%.

ut.name: Fancy Tea Set
description: [Coordination] Increases ATK Boost by 20% and reduces Cooldown of the Hero with the highest ATK by 30%.
[Coordination] Increases ATK Boost by 24% and reduces Cooldown of the Hero with the highest ATK by 30%.
[Coordination] Increases ATK Boost by 29% and reduces Cooldown of the Hero with the highest ATK by 30%.
[Coordination] Increases ATK Boost by 35% and reduces Cooldown of the Hero with the highest ATK by 30%.
[Coordination] Increases ATK Boost by 42% and reduces Cooldown of the Hero with the highest ATK by 30%.
[Coordination] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and reduces Cooldown of the Hero with the highest ATK by 30%.
ut.story: Aisha's favorite ceramic tea cups that Priscilla has ready at all times. Luxurious tea cups made from the best clay of the eastern continent across the sea. It's mostly used for tea time with Aisha, but it is also used when using Coordination with Priscilla.

s3.name: Turbulent Dance
s3.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to nearby enemies in a circular range and draws them towards herself. If activated while in the 'Coordination' state, hit enemies take {1}% extra P.DMG and M. DMG for 10 sec.
s3.light: Upon a Crit hit, cooldown is reduced by 10%.
s3.dark: When there is only 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.

ut.name: Magical Stone of Gravity
description: [Turbulent Dance] DMG is increased by 20% and target is inflicted by Stun for 3 sec.
[Turbulent Dance] DMG is increased by 24% and target is inflicted by Stun for 3 sec.
[Turbulent Dance] DMG is increased by 29% and target is inflicted by Stun for 3 sec.
[Turbulent Dance] DMG is increased by 35% and target is inflicted by Stun for 3 sec.
[Turbulent Dance] DMG is increased by 42% and target is inflicted by Stun for 3 sec.
[Turbulent Dance] DMG is increased by 50% and target is inflicted by Stun for 3 sec.
ut.story: The first magic tool made by a wizard of Purple. The first gift that Aisha gave. Aisha created this magic tool because she felt bad that Priscilla used up so much power when using Turbulent Dance. The Mana Stone of Gravity relieves the pressure from the body when using Turbulent Dance, and it increases its effect.

s4.name: Weapon Mastery
s4.description: Own ATK is increased by {0} , and Penetration is increased by {1}.
s4.light: ATK boost is increased by 40%.
s4.dark: Crit Chance is increased by 250.

t5.dark: Increase all allies' ATK and P.DEF by 3% of own ATK and P.DEF.

45.name: Yanne
45.subtitle: Dragon Slayer
45.description: A Barbarian warrior that travels the lands, hunting down monsters that trouble the people. The Lone Slayer of the Mad Dragon Svelta. Her massive, powerful arrows are capable of piercing through even castle walls.
45.story: A Barbarian warrior who specializes in dealing with monsters that threaten people. Thanks to a unique physical trait, her muscular strength is several times stronger than that of a normal Barbarian warrior. She wields a greatbow larger than her own body with such ease that people call her a walking siege weapon. While she is a kindhearted woman who enjoys helping others, once engaged in a combat, her Barbarian aggressiveness begins to surface. She once slayed a mad dragon named Svelta, a feat that earned her the nickname Dragon Slayer.
45.dislike: Monsters that cannot be defeated physically

inn.idle: Ahaha, everyone seems to be having fun?

recruit.greet: It's been a while~ have you been well?
talk: Monster hunting? It's quite fun, but its even better because I can help people in the process.
Monster meat is pretty good when cooked right, you know?
Barbarian Warriors all learn how to cook. Well, I think I'm the best cook though, eh?
recruit.gift: A present? Ahaha, thanks! I'll treat you to a meal next time!

affinity.greet: Long time? How have you been?
talk: The food here is pretty good.
Hm. Maybe next time I'll ask Juno to make me some lunch?
affinity.gift: Oh, thank you! I'll use it well.

relationship.greet: Heya, you look healthy! Are you eating properly?
talk: Ever tried Dragon meat? It's pretty good. I'll bring some Dragon steak next time!
Work as a monster hunter isn't easy, but it's worth it.
Barbarian warriors are all pretty strong...but my body is pretty special.

uw.name: Dragonbane, Svelta
description: Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 10% chance of dealing 200% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.
Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 12% chance of dealing 240% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.
Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 14% chance of dealing 290% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.
Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 17% chance of dealing 350% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.
Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 21% chance of dealing 420% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.
Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 25% chance of dealing 500% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.
uw.story: An enchanted weapon made from the bones, tendons, and pieces of hide the Mad Dragon Svelta. Too heavy for a normal human to even lift, let alone draw, this monstrous greatbow is a combination of the siege weapon technologies from the Dark Elves and Dwarves. Only those with incredible muscular strength such as Yanne can hope to handle this ridiculous bow. The Mad Dragon's soul still remains in this bow. Her ferocious energy rides on every arrow it fires, granting it the power to shatter through even the mightiest of walls.

s1.name: Focus Shot!
s1.description: Taking up a stance, focuses for a while and deals {0} P.DMG to enemies in a straight line. If the target is a dragon, inflicts Stun for 3 sec. The longer she focuses, DMG and Stun duration are increased by {1}%.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Target takes 25% additional P.DMG for 10 sec.

s2.name: Wipeout!
s2.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to target enemy and other enemies in range. If the target is a Dragon, deals {1} extra DMG that ignores DEF.
s2.light: When there is 1 enemy, DMG is boosted by 100%.
s2.dark: Enemies hit are stunned for 2 sec.

ut.name: Giant Arrow of Sudden Death
description: [Wipeout!] Increases DMG by 20% and reduces Cooldown by 12% upon a Crit Hit.
[Wipeout!] Increases DMG by 24% and reduces Cooldown by 12% upon a Crit Hit
[Wipeout!] Increases DMG by 29% and reduces Cooldown by 12% upon a Crit Hit
[Wipeout!] Increases DMG by 35% and reduces Cooldown by 12% upon a Crit Hit
[Wipeout!] Increases DMG by 42% and reduces Cooldown by 12% upon a Crit Hit
[Wipeout!] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 12% upon a Crit Hit
ut.story: An arrow made from Mad Dragon Svelta's spine, who spews out powerful magic cannons. It's Yanne's loot. The arrowhead has the Mad Dragon's burning red eye. It's still imbued with its madness, always ready to burn the enemy.

s3.name: No Holding Back!
s3.description: Removes all negative effects on self. For 30 sec, ATK is increased by {0} and Penetration is increased by {1}. For the duration of skill, auto attacks are changed to consuming 3% mana to deal DMG to all enemies in a straight line and deals {2} extra P.DMG to Dragons ignoring DEF.
s3.light: ATK Spd is boosted by 250 for the duration.
s3.dark: For the duration, all DMG taken is reduced by 25%.

ut.name: Dragon Steak
description: [No Holding Back!] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG to Dragons by 10% for the skill's duration.
[No Holding Back!] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG to Dragons by 12% for the skill's duration.
[No Holding Back!] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG to Dragons by 14% for the skill's duration.
[No Holding Back!] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG to Dragons by 17% for the skill's duration.
[No Holding Back!] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG to Dragons by 21% for the skill's duration.
[No Holding Back!] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG to Dragons by 25% for the skill's duration.
ut.story: T-bone steak from which you can taste a dragon's sirloin and tenderloin at the same time. The taste is truly wonderful. The dragon's holy energy enters the body, and increases Yanne's battle stamina to the max.

s4.name: Dragon Slayer
s4.description: ATK is increased by {0} , and Max HP is increased by {1}%. Also, DMG dealt to Dragons is increased by {2}%.
s4.light: All allies take 7% reduced DMG from Dragons.
s4.dark: Deals 15% more DMG to Dragons.

t5.dark: Auto-attacks ignore enemy Block effects.

46.name: Zafir
46.subtitle: Prince of Sandstorms
46.description: A descendant of the ancient God King. A refined young man who stood up to defend the desert. The sandstorm he summons with his arrow engulfs his enemies, ridding the world of their existence.
46.story: A Prince and successor to the God King of the ancient desert kingdom who possesses the power to control desert sand. As the young leader of the Mauhata tribe of Desert Warriors, he has been trained and educated to be the worthy successor to the great king. When the Trovatia tribe, their sworn brothers, were praying at the Shrine of Flow to awake the God Dragon, he led his warriors to defeat all demons approaching the oasis. Assisted by the God Dragon and Laudia, her priestess, he is fulfilling his role as a Desert Warrior defending his home. He hopes that his efforts make the late God King proud.
46.like: Cats, sand art, people in the desert
46.dislike: Those who try to harm the people that he cares for

inn.idle: Wow, I've never seen drinks like these.

recruit.greet: May the blessings of the God King be with you.
talk: Umm, this place is very different from the bars in the desert. We don't sit on the floor, do we?
A Desert Warrior puts their people before anything else.
...I don't particularly fancy crowded places, but this carefree atmosphere... I can't say I hate it.
recruit.gift: Such tremendous kindness. Thank you.

affinity.greet: How have you been?
talk: The prophecy says the resurrection of the God King is near.
...If time allows, visit Aegina sometimes. I will be your guide.
affinity.gift: The Desert Warriors will be happy that you are there as well.

relationship.greet: Greetings, my desert friend.
talk: I like cats... No creature comes even close when it comes to elegance.
Even the fierce sand storms in the desert could not leave a scuff on Desert Warriors.
I might have his blood flowing in my veins, but I think I have a long way to go to call myself a worthy successor.

uw.name: Glory of the God King, Zaries
description: Upon using a skill, gains 1 stack of 'Will of Desert'. 'Will of Desert' increases ATK by 4% and Penetration by 20 for 10 sec, and can be stacked up to max 5 times. This effect cannot be dispelled.
Upon using a skill, gains 1 stack of 'Will of Desert'. 'Will of Desert' increased ATK by 4.8% and Penetration by 24 for 10 sec, and can be stacked up to max 5 times. This effect cannot be dispelled.
Upon using a skill, gains 1 stack of 'Will of Desert'. 'Will of Desert' increased ATK by 5.6% and Penetration by 29 for 10 sec, and can be stacked up to max 5 times. This effect cannot be dispelled.
Upon using a skill, gains 1 stack of 'Will of Desert'. 'Will of Desert' increased ATK by 6.8% and Penetration by 35 for 10 sec, and can be stacked up to max 5 times. This effect cannot be dispelled.
Upon using a skill, gains 1 stack of 'Will of Desert'. 'Will of Desert' increased ATK by 8% and Penetration by 42 for 10 sec, and can be stacked up to max 5 times. This effect cannot be dispelled.
Upon using a skill, gains 1 stack of 'Will of Desert'. 'Will of Desert' increases ATK by 10% and Penetration by 50 for 10 sec, and can be stacked up to max 5 times. This effect cannot be dispelled.
uw.story: An ancient Weapon forged for the most glorious being on earth. Only permitted to the successor to the God King, one should undergo tremendous ordeals to prove his worth as its owner. This bow, allowed only for the chosen successor to the God King, has absolute power in the desert.

s1.name: Judgment of the Desert
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG enemies in a wide range, and per each hit enemy, skill cooldown is decreased by 1 sec. Deals {1} P.DMG to enemies inflicted by [Mark of Desert] and removes 1 stack of [Mark of Desert]. Upon each skill use, Crit DMG is increased by 5%. This effect can be stacked up to max 12 times and cannot be dispelled.
s1.light: Crit DMG boost per use changes to 10%.
s1.dark: Hit enemy is inflicted by Blind for 1 sec.

s2.name: Blessing of the Sand Spirit
s2.description: Creates a shield around the ally with the lowest HP that absorbs {1} DMG for {0} sec. Gains immunity to CC while the shield lasts. When the shield duration is over, 'Sand Storm' is activated and deals {2} P.DMG to enemies in a wide range, inflicting 2 stacks of [Mark of Desert]. If the shield is dispelled or destroyed, 'Sand Storm' does not activate.

books.0: DMG and Shield are increased by {0}%.
books.1: DMG and Shield are increased by {0}%.
books.2: DMG and Shield are increased by {0}%.

s2.light: Skill cooldown is decreased by 5 sec.
s2.dark: Enemies hit by 'Sand Storm' are knocked back far away and are knocked down for 3 sec.

ut.name: Sand of Mirage
description: [Blessing of the Sand Spirit] Shield absorbs 20% more DMG and dispels CC inflicted on self.
[Blessing of the Sand Spirit] Shield absorbs 24% more DMG and dispels CC inflicted on self.
[Blessing of the Sand Spirit] Shield absorbs 29% more DMG and dispels CC inflicted on self.
[Blessing of the Sand Spirit] Shield absorbs 35% more DMG and dispels CC inflicted on self.
[Blessing of the Sand Spirit] Shield absorbs 42% more DMG and dispels CC inflicted on self.
[Blessing of the Sand Spirit] Shield absorbs 50% more DMG and dispels CC inflicted on self.
ut.story: An hourglass that was buried underground for a long time by an enormous sandstorm that struck Aegina Desert. When the sand in the hourglass moves, it calls for the mirage of an ancient city coming back to life. The high priest of the ancient kingdom used this to show the glory of the kingdom to its people in the past. Seeing their city shining in gold, people grew proud of their kingdom.

s3.name: Doom of the Desert
s3.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to frontal enemies in a wide range and inflicts 1 stack of [Mark of Desert]. Then summons 'Pit of Sand' for 5 sec, dealing {1} P.DMG every 0.5 sec, and decreasing their P.DEF by 30% for 10 sec. 'Pit of Sand' has a 25% chance of inflicting 1 stack of [Mark of Desert] and draws in all enemies in range to the center.
s3.light: Mana cost is decreased by 1.
s3.dark: Duration of 'Pit of Sand' is increased by 2 sec.

ut.name: Soul of Oasis
description: [Doom of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and effect activation chance is increased by 8%.
[Doom of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and effect activation chance is increased by 9.6%.
[Doom of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and effect activation chance is increased by 11.5%.
[Doom of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and effect activation chance is increased by 13.8%.
[Doom of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and effect activation chance is increased by 16.5%.
[Doom of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and effect activation chance is increased by 20%.
ut.story: A magical sword passed down through the God King's descendants. The name 'Oasis' comes from how it was used to serve the people in dire times. After the kingdom fell, its whereabouts was unknown to the world until Zafir saw it among Kumuro's art collections and bought it at an incredibly high price. With the sword finally returning to the worthy descendant, Zafir was able to inherit his forefather's spirits, maximizing his potentials.

s4.name: Calling of the Guardian
s4.description: Each auto attack has a 15% chance of dealing {0} P.DMG that ignores DEF to all enemies, inflicting 1 stack of [Mark of Desert]. [Mark of Desert] can be stacked up to max 5 times.
s4.light: When there are over 5 enemies, all enemies are inflicted with 5 stacks of 'Mark of Desert'. This effect is activated once every 20 sec.
s4.dark: Activation chance changes to 30%.

t5.dark: Recovers 500 mana upon using a skill. If there are over 5 enemies, mana recovery rate is doubled and ATK Spd is increased by 500 for 5 sec. This effect cannot be stacked.

49.name: Ophelia
49.subtitle: Pathfinder of Fate
49.description: An astrologist of Stardust, a troupe that wanders through the continent. Instead of going on a pilgrimage as a member of the witch's association, searches for the destined soulmate she once encountered in her dreams. Controls the tarot cards floating around her to attack enemies in distance.
49.story: An astrologer traveling with a wandering troupe called 'Stardust.' As a member of the Witch Association, she is supposed to reside in a designated location and read the flow of fate as part of her practice. However, she is currently traveling in search of a man with a particular destiny she met in a dream. She believes that the man from her clairvoyant dream is destined to become the savior of the world. Her current priority is to find the man, and then stay at his side. If asked about her second goal... She blushes and loses all traces of her usual calmness telling about her future with the man of destiny.

inn.idle: I want to show you the whispers of the stars.

recruit.greet: I am the Witch named Ophelia.
talk: I can see it within your eyes too...the path of the stars.
I look into your eyes, and see...
Have you ever heard the whispers of the stars?
recruit.gift: Thank you! As thanks, I will tell you a bit about your destiny...

affinity.greet: Nice to meet you!
talk: I learned to shuffle cards from a good friend.
I love having a good laugh with people every day.
affinity.gift: I'll tell you your fortune in return.

relationship.greet: Do you want your fortune told? If you do, sit with me!
talk: This child is very special to me. Ah, be careful! You might get burned!
I don't feel bad for straying off the path of my pilgrimage. I am still a witch, and I have pride in my profession.
Ah! This card tells me that my fateful partner is near! Very close too...ah, perhaps...?

uw.name: Cards of Destiny Del Arcana
description: Upon attack, there is a 77.7% chance that for 7 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 20, and mana recovery per sec is increased by 10%. This effect can be stacked max 15 times.
Upon attack, there is a 77.7% chance that for 7 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 24, and mana recovery per sec is increased by 12%. This effect can be stacked max 15 times.
Upon attack, there is a 77.7% chance that for 7 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 29, and mana recovery per sec is increased by 14%. This effect can be stacked max 15 times.
Upon attack, there is a 77.7% chance that for 7 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 35, and mana recovery per sec is increased by 17%. This effect can be stacked max 15 times.
Upon attack, there is a 77.7% chance that for 7 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 42, and mana recovery per sec is increased by 21%. This effect can be stacked max 15 times.
Upon attack, there is a 77.7% chance that for 7 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 50, and mana recovery per sec is increased by 25%. This effect can be stacked max 15 times.
uw.story: Tarot card reading is a common fortune telling method for witches. Some witches use customized cards to suit their personal styles. Ophelia's cards also function as the proof of the pacts between her and the creatures she summons. Quite popular as a guide of destiny among the entities of the mysterious dimensions, she has made pacts with countless creatures. Del Arcana, a powerful tarot deck carefully assembled by Ophelia, is the physical proof of these relationships.

s1.name: Card of Death - Carta
s1.description: Attacks enemy target, dealing {0} M.DMG and inflicting Stun for {1} sec. Consumes the card in possession to inflict additional effects. Upon using the skill, gains the card of [Death]. [Death] - DMG ignores target's DEF and Stun duration increases by 5 sec. [Love] - Deals a total of {2} M.DMG over time for 10 sec and reduces heal rate by 100%. [Fortune] - Skill Cooldown does not take effect.
s1.light: For 10 sec, target takes 25% increased M.DMG.
s1.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

s2.name: Card of Love - Elliciad
s2.description: Increases ATK by {1} for {0} sec and Mana Recovery/Sec by {2}%. Consumes a card in possession to gain an additional effect according to the card type. Gains [Love] card upon use. [Death] - DEF Penetration increases by 600 for the duration of skill and gains immunity to CC for 6 sec. [Love] - The effect applies to all allies. [Luck] - Cooldown does not apply.
s2.dark: ATK boost is increased by 40%.

ut.name: Elliciad's Heart
description: [Card of Love - Elliciad] Dispels Negative Effects of the target and all skill cooldown are decreased by 6%.
[Card of Love - Elliciad] Dispels Negative Effects of the target and all skill cooldown are decreased by 7.2%.
[Card of Love - Elliciad] Dispels Negative Effects of the target and all skill cooldown are decreased by 8.6%.
[Card of Love - Elliciad] Dispels Negative Effects of the target and all skill cooldown are decreased by 10.4%.
[Card of Love - Elliciad] Dispels Negative Effects of the target and all skill cooldown are decreased by 12.5%.
[Card of Love - Elliciad] Dispels Negative Effects of the target and all skill cooldown are decreased by 15%.
ut.story: Spirit of love, Elliciad's heart. It eats both fulfilled and unfulfilled loves, so it can sometimes be as hot as lava, or as cold as ice. The power it displays depends on how contaminated a soul is, and it can display an extensive light of blessing to those with pure souls.

s3.name: Card of Fortune - Vellekia
s3.description: Attacks the target and the enemies near it to deal {0} M.DMG. This attack cannot miss and deals 100% increased Crit DMG. Gains [Luck] card upon use. [Death] - Crit DMG increases by 120%. [Love] - Removes all positive effects from enemies in range and silences them for 2 sec. [Luck] - Cooldown does not apply. Recovers 1 orb of Mana.
s3.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.
s3.dark: Always inflicts a Crit Hit.

ut.name: Coin of Fortune
description: [Card of Fortune - Vellekia] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 20%.
[Card of Fortune - Vellekia] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 24%.
[Card of Fortune - Vellekia] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 29%.
[Card of Fortune - Vellekia] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 35%.
[Card of Fortune - Vellekia] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 42%.
[Card of Fortune - Vellekia] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 50%.
ut.story: The legendary coin that is said to have changed the course of the wheel of fortune, which was headed toward destruction. Ophelia believes that it was thrown by the spirit of luck, Vellekia.

s4.name: Pathfinder of Fate
s4.description: All allies' ATK is increased by {0} , and Crit Chance is increased by 100. Ophelia gains additional effect according to the card in possession. [Death] - ATK is increased by {2}%. [Love] - Per each sec, heals {3}% of max HP. [Fortune] - M.Dodge Chance is increased by 200.

books.0: All allies' ATK boost is increased by {0}%.
books.1: All allies' ATK boost is increased by {0}%.
books.2: All allies' Crit Chance boost is increased by {0}.

s4.light: At the start of each battle, gains the card of [Death]. This card does not have DMG boost effect.
s4.dark: At the start of each battle, gains the card of [Love]. This card does not have heal effect.

t5.dark: Upon using a skill, there is a 7% chance that mana cost of all skill is reduced by 1 for 7 sec. This effect cannot be dispelled.

50.name: Requina
50.subtitle: Merchant of Poison
50.description: A merchant who wanders the continent, selling poison to those in need. Utilizes a blowpipe to poison and disable her enemies.
50.story: A curious merchant who deals every kind of poison known to mankind. She is a daughter of two wandering alchemists who traveled over from a distant nation. Other merchants call her 'the Merchant of Death,' but she has a different opinion. She claims that no poison is inherently evil, and that how one is used determines its nature. Like a true merchant, she believes that any tool is as good or evil as the one who uses it. Since the reappearance of the Demons, she has been traveling around, searching for the right poison to battle against the invaders.
50.like: Developing new poisons, those who understand the joy of developing new drugs
50.dislike: People who are prejudiced against poisons

inn.idle: Hmm, is there nobody that might buy my wares?

recruit.greet: Hello! Is there a poison you might need?
talk: Poisons can be used as medicine! They aren't as bad as people make them out to be.
Ah, well, it is true that most poisons are used for bad things.
Hmm, where is that lady that bought my poisons last time?
recruit.gift: Wow, thanks! I'll use this to increase my ware selection!!

affinity.greet: Nice to meet you! I brought some poison for you! Pick what you want!
talk: Poison is amazing! Once you fall for it, you can't go back!
This weed hasn't been growing. Should I sell some rare poison instead? What do you think?
affinity.gift: Oh, thank you! I'll let you buy some special Requina-style poison! Heh heh.

relationship.greet: Welcome back~ hahaha, today was a haul!
talk: Doctors, assassins, chemists and alchemists...all of them are my important clients!
Why I use poison darts? Well, they're quiet and easy to use! Well, they wouldn't be quite nice in the wrong hands...but~
Poisons that work on Demons? I'm researching that. I have a few close to perfection...wanna see?

uw.name: The Flute of Silent Winds Rakshathar
description: Max stack of Tickle Tickle Potion is increased to 55. Each auto attack has a 10% chance of attacking a random enemy, dealing 20% of ATK as DMG and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.
Max stack of Tickle Tickle Potion is increased to 60. Each auto attack has a 10% chance of attacking a random enemy, dealing 24% of ATK as DMG and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.
Max stack of Tickle Tickle Potion is increased to 65. Each auto attack has a 10% chance of attacking a random enemy, dealing 29% of ATK as DMG and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.
Max stack of Tickle Tickle Potion is increased to 70. Each auto attack has a 10% chance of attacking a random enemy, dealing 35% of ATK as DMG and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.
Max stack of Tickle Tickle Potion is increased to 75. Each auto attack has a 10% chance of attacking a random enemy, dealing 42% of ATK as DMG and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.
Max stack of Tickle Tickle Potion is increased to 80. Each auto attack has a 10% chance of attacking a random enemy, dealing 50% of ATK as DMG and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.
uw.story: A hyper-accurate blowgun made by Requina herself. A special muting piece added at the end makes this already-quiet weapon almost completely silent. As the appearance of Demons began to hurt her business, she decided to utilize anything she could, not just poisons. She sought help from her elementalist friend, who imbued the blowgun with the wind's blessing. This gave the weapon firepower equal to that of a magic cannon. After adding Requina's ultra-deadly, Demon-slaying poison to it, it became a powerful and deadly weapon capable of killing any living being.

s1.name: Tears of Mr. Python!
s1.description: Attacks 2 enemies and deals {0} P.DMG, while poisoning them with Tears of Mr. Python that cannot be dispelled for {1} sec. Enemies inflicted with Tears of Mr. Python cannot recover mana, takes 30% increased DMG, and their Block chance is reduced by 500.
s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Reduces target's mana by 1200.

s2.name: Screechy Grass Extract!
s2.description: Attacks a random enemy 3 times and deals a total of {0} DMG, while poisoning them with Screechy Grass Extract for {1} sec. Enemies inflicted with Screechy Grass Extract have their ATK reduced by {2}%, and Crit Chance by {3}.
s2.light: If there is 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.
s2.dark: Stuns the target for 1 sec.

ut.name: Basilisk's Poisonous Fang
description: [Screechy Grass Extract!] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and deals 3% of ATK as additional P.DMG per each stacked Tickle Tickle Potion! of target.
[Screechy Grass Extract!] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and deals 3.6% of ATK as additional P.DMG per each stacked Tickle Tickle Potion! of target.
[Screechy Grass Extract!] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and deals 4.3% of ATK as additional P.DMG per each stacked Tickle Tickle Potion! of target.
[Screechy Grass Extract!] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and deals 5.2% of ATK as additional P.DMG per each stacked Tickle Tickle Potion! of target.
[Screechy Grass Extract!] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and deals 6.2% of ATK as additional P.DMG per each stacked Tickle Tickle Potion! of target.
[Screechy Grass Extract!] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and deals 7.5% of ATK as additional P.DMG per each stacked Tickle Tickle Potion! of target.
ut.story: A nasty fang of a Basilisk that only absorbs evil energy. Its poison is actually strong enough to melt souls. If the poison from the fang is mixed up with screechy grass, it could become a tremendous drug that no organism could survive. Requina's heart is beating hard with anticipation.

s3.name: More! Stronger!
s3.description: Own ATK is increased by {1} for {0} sec and the effect of [Tears of Mr. Python], [Screechy Grass Extract], [Tickle Tickle Potion] is doubled. Also, target of [Tears of Mr. Python], [Screechy Grass Extract!], [Tickle Tickle Potion] is increased by 1.
s3.light: For the duration, auto attack DMG is increased by 100%.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Sparkling Potion
description: [More! Stronger!] Attacks additional 1 target and ATK Spd is increased by 100 for the duration.
[More! Stronger!] Attacks additional 1 target and ATK Spd is increased by 120 for the duration.
[More! Stronger!] Attacks additional 1 target and ATK Spd is increased by 140 for the duration.
[More! Stronger!] Attacks additional 1 target and ATK Spd is increased by 170 for the duration.
[More! Stronger!] Attacks additional 1 target and ATK Spd is increased by 210 for the duration.
[More! Stronger!] Attacks additional 1 target and ATK Spd is increased by 250 for the duration.
ut.story: Medicine made from boiling the powder of the seventieth rainbow and the tongue of the giant beast Kiselaton who can cross hell. It is full of brilliant colors. The moment one drinks it, it burns the insides, but it is said that whoever drinks it slowly dies in happiness.

s4.name: Tickle Tickle Potion!
s4.description: Upon attack, poisons target enemy with Tickle Tickle Potion for {0} sec which deals a total of {1} P.DMG over time, and cannot be dispelled. Tickle Tickle Potion can be stacked max 50 times.
s4.light: Tickle Tickle Potion! is stacked 3 at a time.
s4.dark: Target takes 20% increased P.DMG.

t5.dark: Upon auto attacking an enemy with 50 or more stacks of Tickle Tickle Potion, deals 200% of ATK as extra P.DMG that ignores DEF.

51.name: Aselica
51.subtitle: Guardian of the Sun
51.description: As a knight of the righteous heavens, she punishes evil with her sword and protects the weak with her shield. She has descended in order to defeat the Demons who are ruining the earthly realm. Her beautiful sword and shield are wielded to smite enemies and protect her comrades with their light.
51.story: A powerful angel who defends the haven of angels. Even among the Angels who wield the power of light, she has a special connection to the sun, whose divine light she uses to fight against darkness. She is tasked with the protection of the souls of other angels awaiting resurrection. When the Holy Sword reappeared in the world, she heeded the divine call to join the new protector of the world. She will see to it that no chosen warrior would ever succumb to the darkness again.

inn.idle: So this is where the Hero resides...

recruit.greet: May the Sun's blessing be with you.
talk: I will not lose to mere Demons.
The Sun does not discriminate, and shares its light with all.
Do you know a man named Arch?
recruit.gift: This is of no use to me...but still, thank you.

affinity.greet: Warrior. So, this is your resting place.
talk: The Demons are evil. They must be annihilated, no matter what.
Don't forget that the sun is always shining behind you.
affinity.gift: Humans can be very thoughtful. Anyway, thank you.

relationship.greet: I feel the warmth of the sun from you. Did anything good happen?
talk: So there are Demons attempting to save the world. How odd.
The Sanctuary of the Angels is where we all return to at some point.
I am your Guardian - and thus, I offer up my arms to you.

uw.name: Solar Halo, Ignisius
description: When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 20% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 24% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 29% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 35% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 42% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 50% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
uw.story: Legends speak of a mysterious metal, gold as the glorious rays of the sun, blue as the pure sky, and white as the blinding light. This holy sword and shield set has been forged from that special metal that only Angels can handle. These are divine relics of protection, created to banish the darkness and fill the world with light. Bestowed only to the most righteous Guardian Knight of the Angels, these relics can instantly incinerate any Demon that faces their light.

s1.name: Sword of the Sun
s1.description: Deals {0} M.DMG to enemy and surrounding enemies within range, and inflicts Stun for {1} sec.

books.2: Stun duration is increased by {0} sec.

s1.light: After activation, increases ATK Spd by 350 for 5 sec.
s1.dark: Reduces cooldown by 2 sec.

s2.name: Blessing of the Sun
s2.description: Imbues the Blessing of the Sun to the ally with the highest ATK, reducing cooldown of all skills by 20% and increasing ATK by {0} for 15 sec.
s2.light: Increases Mana Cost by 1, and grants the effect to the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
s2.dark: Used while ignoring negative effects on self and removes negative effects on the target ally.

ut.name: Bracelet of the Sun
description: [Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and target takes 10% decreased P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and target takes 12% decreased P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and target takes 14% decreased P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and target takes 17% decreased P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and target takes 21% decreased P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and target takes 25% decreased P.DMG for 10 sec.
ut.story: Bracelet made by the Archangels to protect the Angels when they descend down to earth. It contains the sun, so it shines brilliantly. When the angels feel fear, it is said that the sunlight from the bracelet protects their souls. And the fates of the angels are intertwined in the bracelet, so when they feel like their lives are threatened, they can feel each other's pain instinctively.

s3.name: Judgment of the Sun
s3.description: Takes position, focuses to heal HP of nearby allies, excluding self, 8 times for a total of {0} , and increases their P.DEF by {1} for 5 sec. Deals a total of {2} M.DMG on enemies within range over 8 times, and decreases their M.DEF by {3} for 5 sec. After the end of the casting, heals HP of allies within range, excluding self, by {4} , and deals {5} M.DMG on enemies, and knocks them down for 3 sec.

books.0: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.1: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.
books.2: DMG and Heal rate are increased by {0}%.

s3.light: Reduces Mana Cost by 1.
s3.dark: Increases the duration of M.DEF reduction effect by 5 sec.

ut.name: Guardian's Trumpet
description: [Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 20%.
[Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 24%.
[Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 29%.
[Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 35%.
[Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 42%.
[Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 50%.
ut.story: The trumpet that is said to be blown by the leader of the Archangels when the catastrophe that will end the Material World arrives. It is said that once the guardians hear the sound of the trumpet, they wake up and come down to protect this land.

s4.name: Curse of the Sun
s4.description: Upon attack, inflicts Curse of the Sun on the target for 10 sec. Enemies with 10 stacks of Curses of the Sun will consume the stack to receive {0} M.DMG, and become inflicted with Blind for {1} sec, having their ATK reduced by {2}% for 10 sec.
s4.light: Changes ATK Reduction to 30%.
s4.dark: Activates the effect upon reaching the 7th stack of Curse of the Sun.

t5.dark: At the beginning of the first battle, increases P.DEF of the ally with the highest ATK by 20% of P.DEF. This effect cannot be dispelled.

52.name: Crow
52.subtitle: The Punishing Bullet
52.description: He was a former naval officer, but is now a bounty hunter and a troubleshooter. He is cynical and doesn't trust people easily. His guns are categorized into three types.
52.story: Code name: Hound. A bounty hunter known as the hound of hell. It is said that no one can escape from this former Imperial Navy officer once he targets them. The only consolation for criminals is that this man isn’t motivated by their bounties alone. While there are many theories, the most convincing one is that he’s after revenge. There are moments when this cold-hearted man seems to warm up, they say. It's when he pulls out an old pendant, which nobody has actually seen.
52.like: Candy canes, a pendant safeguarding a memory, the forgotten nagging of a loved one
52.dislike: Pirates, Gods who have taken everything away from him. And now, tobacco

inn.idle: Don't get in my way.

recruit.greet: What business do you have with me?
talk: I will take only 1 job. Think carefully before you speak.
It's hard to find ammunition around here...
This isn't a cigarette, it's merely candy.
recruit.gift: Hmm, with this money, I can buy new cig...no, I'll just get some more candy.

affinity.greet: Why did you call me? Just tell me what you need.
talk: He was a real headache, even when he was under my command. But I don't think he'd do something like that. That's why I accepted that offer.
Obviously, the others couldn't bear his madness. That's why I took charge.
affinity.gift: Give me candy.

relationship.greet: What business...ah, it's you.
talk: Orvel is a good place. Even the air is different from the Empire.
I thought, as part of the Navy, I would be out at sea for my entire life. In retrospect, going out to sea was the worst decision ever.
I had two people I cared about dearly. I cannot meet them anymore... but yes, haha... they both hated cigarette smoke.

uw.name: Hellhound, Akistra
description: The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 50% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 30% and Crit DMG by 30% for 20 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 60% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 36% and Crit DMG by 36% for 20 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 70% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 43% and Crit DMG by 43% for 20 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 85% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 52% and Crit DMG by 52% for 20 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 100% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 62% and Crit DMG by 62% for 20 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 125% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 75% and Crit DMG by 75% for 20 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.
uw.story: It is unarguably the culmination of the latest imperial technomagi technology. It can transform into three modes, the last of which uses magic that is so devastating that its use has to be restricted. According to Valance, the head of the imperial weapons development organization Magos Le’Flamme, the new weapon Archistra was stolen, immediately after its development, by Crow, a former naval officer who was dishonorably discharged. It remains to be confirmed whether Crow really did manage to infiltrate one of the Empire's most important organizations to steal Archistra... It's also possible that Valance simply handed it over to him, given their long friendship.

s1.name: Target will be Eliminated.
s1.description: Deals a total of {0} P.DMG to enemies in front over 15 times and leaves 2 'Hunting Dog's Fang Marks' for 40 sec. Hunting Dog's Fang Mark stacks up to max 100 times.
s1.light: Upon each DMG dealt, recovers 30 Mana.
s1.dark: Gains immunity to CC while in use.

s2.name: Struggle is Meaningless.
s2.description: Attacks a random enemy 10 times and deals a total of {0} P.DMG. Shoots a Frost Bullet that deals {1} P.DMG to target and surrounding enemies, freezing them for 4 sec. The special Frost Bullet creates a freezing area for 6 seconds that deals {2} P.DMG every 2 sec, with a 50% chance to freeze for 2 sec.
s2.dark: Freezing chance of the Freezing Area increases by 30%.

ut.name: Cold Barrage
description: [Struggle is Meaningless] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and has a 10% chance to freeze target for 3 sec upon every strike.
[Struggle is Meaningless] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and has a 12% chance to freeze target for 3 sec upon every strike.
[Struggle is Meaningless] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and has a 14% chance to freeze target for 3 sec upon every strike.
[Struggle is Meaningless] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and has a 17% chance to freeze target for 3 sec upon every strike.
[Struggle is Meaningless] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and has a 21% chance to freeze target for 3 sec upon every strike.
[Struggle is Meaningless] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and has a 25% chance to freeze target for 3 sec upon every strike.
ut.story: Magos Le'Flamme, the imperial weapons development organization, succeeded in enhancing the Ground Chill Missile. They tried to equip it on the new weapon Akistra to test it out. However, Crow stole Akistra, so the missile that was equipped on it was stolen as well. This missile contains a powerful chill, and it's enough to freeze the surrounding land.

s3.name: Even Gods shall Die.
s3.description: Takes position and focuses to shoot a laser, dealing {0} P.DMG to frontal enemies within range, and consumes target's stack of Hunting Dog's Fang Mark to deal {1} additional P.DMG per each stack. Depending on the focusing time, the effect's range increases, and DMG is increased up to max {2}%. Once the focus is completed, knocks back the enemy far away.
s3.light: Increases cooltime by 10 sec and DMG by 100%.
s3.dark: Reduces Mana Cost by 1.

ut.name: Pendant of Memories
description: [Even Gods shall Die] Gains immunity to CC during skill activation and DMG is increased by 20%.
[Even Gods shall Die] Gains immunity to CC during skill activation and DMG is increased by 24%.
[Even Gods shall Die] Gains immunity to CC during skill activation and DMG is increased by 29%.
[Even Gods shall Die] Gains immunity to CC during skill activation and DMG is increased by 35%.
[Even Gods shall Die] Gains immunity to CC during skill activation and DMG is increased by 42%.
[Even Gods shall Die] Gains immunity to CC during skill activation and DMG is increased by 50%.
ut.story: A precious pendant containing the picture of Crow's deceased wife and daughter. He's frequently stares at the picture while sucking on candy, looking extremely sad and yet calm. It's a pendant even more precious than his life, so you better not lay a finger on it. Even if you are a god, you will have to pay with your life.

s4.name: Hunting Preparation
