s4.description: Crow is not affected by changes in ATK Spd. ATK increases by {0} and Crit DMG by {1}%. Recovers {2} Mana every second. It also leaves a 'Hunting Dog's Fang Mark' to target for 40 sec when dealing a normal attack.
s4.light: Boss monster takes 15% increased DMG.
s4.dark: Mana recovery increases by 40%.

t5.dark: Increases Mana Cost of all skills by 1 and DMG by 75%.

53.name: Shamilla
53.subtitle: The Vessel of Curses
53.description: A high-ranking Demon that carries 30 million types of curses inside her. Intrigued by the will of humans who don't submit to pain and anguish. Uses the Bow and Arrows of Corruption to torment enemies with many different curses.
53.story: A powerful Demon who used to be one of the officers serving Dark Lord Angmund. She is capable of holding all of the curses in the world. But her real goal isn't the resurrection of the Dark Lord, nor world domination. Everything that happens in the world is a part of a drama, and she thinks of herself as the audience. Her actions are like that of a scriptwriter who revises the scenario, pulling the strings from the shadows and looking forward to how the scenes she's written play out.
53.like: Unexpected situations, people who fight against the flow of things

inn.idle: Oh, so many people with powerful souls... Hahahaha...

recruit.greet: Haha, can I help you?
talk: Your soul is very special... Haha, this is interesting.
A Demon? Well, I have no idea what you're saying.
Isn't a human's life the greatest form of art?
recruit.gift: Oh... A present for me. Haha, so what's your goal...?

affinity.greet: Oh, hello. You're back again?
talk: Why did I hide the fact that I'm a Demon? Haha, wouldn't it be better to not ask such obvious questions?
Even if it is a well planned scenario, some dramatization is good, too. Hahaha...
affinity.gift: I wanted a different type of present... Haha, but this is good, too.

relationship.greet: Haha, you'll show me a nice scene today too, right?
talk: My goal... Haha. Let's say it's to taste something fresh that I've never experienced before.
You're funny. That's why I want to watch you a bit more up close. Hm hm hm!
Ah, that's good. The way you look in peril, trying to fight your fate...!

uw.name: Wings of Corruption, Apoliox
description: Every 20 seconds, obtains The Vessel of Curses and increases ATK by 20% for 10 seconds.
Every 19 seconds, obtains The Vessel of Curses and increases ATK by 24% for 10 seconds.
Every 18 seconds, obtains The Vessel of Curses and increases ATK by 29% for 10 seconds.
Every 16 seconds, obtains The Vessel of Curses and increases ATK by 35% for 10 seconds.
Every 14 seconds, obtains The Vessel of Curses and increases ATK by 42% for 10 seconds.
Every 12 seconds, obtains The Vessel of Curses and increases ATK by 50% for 10 seconds.
uw.story: Curses are born from negative feelings such as hatred, jealousy, and resentment. These are the best food for Shamilla. The wings that grew powerful during the Demon War by absorbing the curses of countless people are terrifying to normal people. Those who are touched by the feathers are said to be bound by many curses, and they fall into a vortex of emotions. In that abyss, a captivating and seductive laughter echoes. The laughter of a demon that enjoys the different kinds of human feelings.

s1.name: Curse of Petrification
s1.description: Attacks an enemy dealing {0} M.DMG and inflicting Curse of Petrification for {1} seconds that can't be dispelled. The enemy under the Curse of Petrification will have ATK Spd reduced by {2} , and this effect gets stronger up to max {3}% as time passes. When the curse ends, petrifies the target for {4} seconds.
s1.light: Cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
s1.dark: Reduces 500 MP of the enemy that took the DMG.

s2.name: Curse of Time
s2.description: Attacks an enemy inflicting {0} M.DMG and also inflicts Curse of Time for {1} seconds, increasing all skill cooldown by {2} seconds. All skill cooldowns of the enemy under the Curse of Time increases by {4} seconds every {3} seconds.
s2.dark: Dispels positive effects from the target.

ut.name: Ancient Demon's Heart
description: [Curse of Time] Additionally increases Cooldown by 0.7 sec and reduces M.DEF of the target by 10% for 10 sec.
[Curse of Time] Additionally increases Cooldown by 0.7 sec and reduces M.DEF of the target by 12% for 10 sec.
[Curse of Time] Additionally increases Cooldown by 0.7 sec and reduces M.DEF of the target by 14% for 10 sec.
[Curse of Time] Additionally increases Cooldown by 0.7 sec and reduces M.DEF of the target by 17% for 10 sec.
[Curse of Time] Additionally increases Cooldown by 0.7 sec and reduces M.DEF of the target by 21% for 10 sec.
[Curse of Time] Additionally increases Cooldown by 0.7 sec and reduces M.DEF of the target by 25% for 10 sec.
ut.story: A strange jewel from which the resentful whispers of ancient demons can be heard. A cursed item filled with the souls of long forgotten ancient demons. They wish to escape every day, but she won't let them out that easily. Her soul has accepted all the curses of the world, so it is as deep and dark as the abyss.

s3.name: Curse of Pain
s3.description: Attacks en enemy dealing {0} M.DMG and inflicting knockback. Also inflicts Curse of Pain for {1} seconds, dealing a total of {2} M.DMG over time.
s3.light: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.
s3.dark: DMG is increased by 40%.

ut.name: The Jar of Curses
description: [Curse of Pain] DMG is increased by 20%, and gains a stack of 'The Vessel of Curses' upon killing an enemy.
[Curse of Pain] DMG is increased by 24%, and gains a stack of 'The Vessel of Curses' upon killing an enemy.
[Curse of Pain] DMG is increased by 29%, and gains a stack of 'The Vessel of Curses' upon killing an enemy.
[Curse of Pain] DMG is increased by 35%, and gains a stack of 'The Vessel of Curses' upon killing an enemy.
[Curse of Pain] DMG is increased by 42%, and gains a stack of 'The Vessel of Curses' upon killing an enemy.
[Curse of Pain] DMG is increased by 50%, and gains a stack of 'The Vessel of Curses' upon killing an enemy.
ut.story: Shamilla has been cursed to hold all the curses in the world inside her, but could also be seen as a savior who binds all those curses. Her death would mean that all the evil she holds within would go back out into the world. This Jar of Curses that Shamilla made is used to retrieve the curses that Shamilla spat out.

s4.name: The Vessel of Curses
s4.description: At the beginning of every battle, for {0} seconds, obtains The Vessel of Curses, creates a shield that cannot be canceled, and absorbs {1} damage. For the duration of the shield, gains Immunity to CC. Upon the activation of the skill, consumes The Vessel of Curses to have 4 enemies as the target.
s4.light: Shield is increased by 80%.
s4.dark: The Vessel of Curses duration is increased by 20 sec, and becomes dispellable.

t5.dark: All effects of curse are enhanced. [Curse of Petrification] Petrification duration is increased by 2 sec. [Curse of Time] Curse of Time duration is increased by 3 sec. [Curse of Pain] Curse of Pain DOT is increased by 50%.

56.name: Erze
56.subtitle: Endless thirst
56.description: She was a vampire hunter, just as her sister Seria was. However, corrupted by her own power, she slaughtered her comrades and chose to become a vampire herself. After killing and absorbing the powers of the high vampire who turned her, she slipped away from Seria, her older sister and the only survivor, and moved to Orvelia.
56.story: Born the second daughter of the Shadow Hilt family, Erze also chose to become a vampire hunter after her beloved sister Seria. Erze's feeble frame kept her from learning how to fight with swords, but she managed to become known as a hunter with her talents in magic. One day she fell into a trap during an operation and was bitten by a mysterious vampire on the shoulder. Her weak constitution grew worse, and she suffered from frequent headaches and thirst every night. Erze knew what this meant and what would end up happening to her. She hid the bite and tried to find a cure on her own, distancing herself from her comrades in her efforts. Meanwhile, Seria was dispatched to Windland Snow Mountain to investigate the Vampire Princess that went missing 100 years ago. On the day her sister left... - Ahh, Seria... I cannot control it anymore... Erze quietly and secretly started slitting the throats of her comrades.
56.like: Seria as a sister, chocolate parfait, blood of the corrupted
56.dislike: Seria as a vampire hunter, spiders

inn.idle: They all look so appetizing... *Moan*

recruit.greet: I know a thrilling game we can play together. How about it?
talk: Why do you look so scared?
Why, are you afraid I'll bite you?
You've never felt thrill like this before, I guarantee you that.
recruit.gift: Ha ha, there's no need for this... Why don't you just show me your neck?

affinity.greet: I've seen you before... Ah, ha ha. We meet again.
talk: Vampires are nothing like demons. I'll admit those higher demons are decent, but the rest are pretty much worthless.
The blood of the corrupted tastes... It makes me feel ecstatic. Yes, ecstatic!
affinity.gift: You've got some good taste. And you look cuter every time I see you!

relationship.greet: I want you to have this to remember me by. It's the tooth of the one who bit me...
talk: Hmm, that woman is still chasing after me... That woman... She... My sister... I miss her... But I also want to kill her... hee hee!

The one that came up last time. He was giving out his blood to other humans. Our blood is useless without our will in it. That means he was giving his blood by choice... I wonder what he received in return? I should have asked him about it before I killed him.

No, I'd never go back to how I was like back then. Tee hee, what, do you expect me to give up this thrill I'm feeling and return to those days of despair!? No, never! I won't go back... But... if I did go back... there would only be one reason why I'd do it... Yes... If I ever go back... It would be for her.

uw.name: Essence of Greed, Perion
description: Each skill hit increases ATK and ATK Spd by 0.5% for 15 sec. This effect stacks up to 80 times.
Each skill hit increases ATK and ATK Spd by 0.5% for 15 sec. This effect stacks up to 90 times.
Each skill hit increases ATK and ATK Spd by 0.5% for 15 sec. This effect stacks up to 110 times.
Each skill hit increases ATK and ATK Spd by 0.5% for 15 sec. This effect stacks up to 130 times.
Each skill hit increases ATK and ATK Spd by 0.5% for 15 sec. This effect stacks up to 160 times.
Each skill hit increases ATK and ATK Spd by 0.5% for 15 sec. This effect stacks up to 200 times.
uw.story: When did this all begin...? This torment that comes with unending thirst... But after quenching that thirst... My heart throbs with burning hatred against you, Seria......Ah, Seria. I have no other choice. I need this power to satisfy this endless thirst. This ever-flowing essence of power is the only cure to my eternal torment. Ah... This ecstasy... More... Someone, thrill me more.

s1.name: Sweet Blood
s1.description: Deals {0} P.DMG to all enemies and steals HP equal to {1}% of DMG dealt. Reduces Cooldown of [Sweet Blood] by {2} sec on each hit, and gains 1 stack of [Sweet Blood]. [Sweet Blood] can be stacked up to {3} times, and using the skill with {3} stacks of [Sweet Blood] grants {4} additional hits and removes [Sweet Blood] stacks.
s1.light: Recovers 150 Mana every hit.
s1.dark: Each use increases DMG by 10%. Stacks 30 times max.

s2.name: Soaking Blood
s2.description: Dispels all negative effects and gains immunity to all CCs, P.DMG, and M.DMG for {0} sec. Inflicts 1 stack of [Soaking Blood] on all enemies, and additional 1 stack upon attacking a target with [Soaking Blood]. [Soaking Blood] can be stacked up to {1} times. Deals {2} P.DMG to enemies with [Soaking Blood] stacks after {0} sec, and steals HP equal to {3}% of the DMG dealt. For every {4} stack(s) of [Soaking Blood], hit count increases by 1 and removes [Soaking Blood] stacks upon attacking.
s2.light: Stuns the target for 3 sec upon hit.
s2.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Wine of Shivers
description: [Soaking Blood] Increases DMG of [Soaking Blood] by 50% and reduces Cooldown of [Soaking Blood] by 5 sec.
[Soaking Blood] Increases DMG of [Soaking Blood] by 50% and reduces Cooldown of [Soaking Blood] by 6 sec.
[Soaking Blood] Increases DMG of [Soaking Blood] by 50% and reduces Cooldown of [Soaking Blood] by 7 sec.
[Soaking Blood] Increases DMG of [Soaking Blood] by 50% and reduces Cooldown of [Soaking Blood] by 8 sec.
[Soaking Blood] Increases DMG of [Soaking Blood] by 50% and reduces Cooldown of [Soaking Blood] by 9 sec.
[Soaking Blood] Increases DMG of [Soaking Blood] by 50% and reduces Cooldown of [Soaking Blood] by 10 sec.
ut.story: A wine made by Erze herself with the blood of fallen priests. One of her greatest pleasures is forcing those once considered holy to kneel before her. Inside the bottle is a bloody cross, and those who hear Erze drinking the wine off it shiver and tremble as the sound of the cross clanging inside.

s3.name: Blood Liberation
s3.description: Deals {2} P.DMG to all enemies every {1} sec for {0} sec. Each hit of [Blood Liberation] causes an additional hit on 1 random enemy.
s3.light: Recovers 75 Mana every hit.
s3.dark: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.

ut.name: Lipstick of Shame
description: [Blood Liberation] Increases DMG of [Blood Liberation] by 20% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of [Blood Liberation].
[Blood Liberation] Increases DMG of [Blood Liberation] by 24% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of [Blood Liberation].
[Blood Liberation] Increases DMG of [Blood Liberation] by 29% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of [Blood Liberation].
[Blood Liberation] Increases DMG of [Blood Liberation] by 35% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of [Blood Liberation].
[Blood Liberation] Increases DMG of [Blood Liberation] by 42% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of [Blood Liberation].
[Blood Liberation] Increases DMG of [Blood Liberation] by 50% and gains immunity to CC for the duration of [Blood Liberation].
ut.story: A dark red lipstick made from the blood of those who died disgraceful deaths. The ones who abandoned their dignity as humans and caved in to their insatiable desires failed to escape Erze's grasp. They died while in a complete trance state, but perhaps they might still feel happy about being used by Erze. Erze uses it to leave a mark on the neck of her prey after she has fed on them.

s4.name: Life Drinker
s4.description: Increases ATK by {0} and Max HP by {1} upon killing an enemy. Stacks up to max 50. Upon taking fatal DMG, casts [Soaking Blood], and decreases Max HP by {2}%. This effect is not applied when [Soaking Blood] is in cooldown. This skill consumes all Mana upon activation.

books.0: Increases ATK and Max HP Boost by {0}%.
books.1: Increases ATK and Max HP Boost by {0}%.
books.2: Increases ATK and Max HP Boost by {0}%.

s4.light: Increases Max HP by 100% upon killing an enemy and changes the Max HP reduction after auto-casting [Soaking Blood] to 33%.
s4.dark: Increases ATK by 200% upon killing an enemy, but Max HP boost does not apply.

t5.dark: Steals HP equal to 25% of DMG dealt by the final normal attack and gains 1 stack of [Sweet Blood].

57.name: Lilia
57.subtitle: The Daughter of Storm and Sea
57.description: A Blue Dragon girl who has just passed her Hatchling period and a sister of Laias, the Priestess of Water. Although she is still inexperienced and young, those who look down on her tend to pay dearly. She uses the relentless energy of water to decimate her enemies.
57.story: A God Dragon of the Oasis and a sister of the Priestess of Water. Laias. She is still a young Blue Dragon who loves her sister who is much older than her. When Laias fell into a deep sleep after exhausting her powers in the battle 100 years ago, Lilia defended the Shrine of Flow on her own. It was when she heard the children of the desert making desperate prayers that she finally woke up the Priestess of Water to protect them. Unlike her mild and thoughtful sister, she is somewhat strict, and the way she controls the power of flow and water is more aggressive, too. She feels the need to protect her beautiful sister against flirting, unworthy men.
57.like: Laias, sweet drinks, people in the desert
57.dislike: Those flirting with her sister (Neraxis, Cain)

inn.idle: ...T-too many humans...

recruit.greet: May the Flow be with you!
talk: I am not as kind as my sister.
Blue Dragons are weak? You couldn't be more wrong.
I am a grown-up Dragon. I am old enough!
recruit.gift: Thanks, human child.

affinity.greet: Hello, you look great!
talk: My sister's mission is mine, too. I will always be with her.
The mystery of endless water? Umm...I heard that it is the power of the First Blue Dragon.
affinity.gift: Thank you so much. I will use this for the Shrine of Flow.

relationship.greet: Good to see you, again!
talk: Neraxis? What a jerk. He always begs for my sister's attention!
Cain...? Errrgh... I thought he was gone for good. I can't believe he's making a pass at my sister again...
I love my sister the most... but I like you as well.

uw.name: Infinite Spring, Cielamaha
description: Mana is recovered by 50 per each sec, and upon each ATK there is an 80% chance of dealing 20% of ATK as P.DMG.
Mana is recovered by 60 per each sec, and upon each ATK there is an 80% chance of dealing 24% of ATK as P.DMG.
Mana is recovered by 70 per each sec, and upon each ATK there is an 80% chance of dealing 28% of ATK as P.DMG.
Mana is recovered by 85 per each sec, and upon each ATK there is an 80% chance of dealing 34% of ATK as P.DMG.
Mana is recovered by 105 per each sec, and upon each ATK there is an 80% chance of dealing 42% of ATK as P.DMG.
Mana is recovered by 125 per each sec, and upon each ATK there is an 80% chance of dealing 50% of ATK as P.DMG.
uw.story: An infinite spring that endlessly spouts water. It is a jar made by the first Blue Dragon, who ruled all waters on earth. It reacts to the imagination of the user. To a young, sensitive and creative girl like Lilia, it is the greatest treasure and weapon.

s1.name: Aqua Tempest
s1.description: For 8 sec, summons Aqua Tempest to a random target and enemies in target's range and deals {0} P.DMG every 0.5 sec. If the target is killed, Aqua Tempest is summoned to attack another random target for the remaining time.
s1.light: Hit target's ATK Spd is decreased by 250 for 10 sec.
s1.dark: Each use increases DMG by 20%. Stacks 15 times max.

s2.name: Everlasting Oasis
s2.description: When activated, turns into the Everlasting Oasis state for 15 sec. During the Everlasting Oasis state, mana recovery rate per sec is increased by 150% and ATK is increased by {0}. Additionally, all DEF is increased by {1}.

books.0: Mana recovery and ATK boost are increased by {0}%.
books.1: Mana recovery and ATK boost are increased by {0}%.
books.2: Mana recovery and ATK boost are increased by {0}%.

s2.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 and is additionally activated on the ally with the highest ATK excluding self.
s2.dark: Skill duration is decreased by 5 sec and all effects are increased by 100%.

ut.name: Heart of Flow
description: [Everlasting Oasis] The effect cannot be dispelled, and Crit DMG is increased by 20% during skill duration.
[Everlasting Oasis] The effect cannot be dispelled, and Crit DMG is increased by 24% during skill duration.
[Everlasting Oasis] The effect cannot be dispelled, and Crit DMG is increased by 29% during skill duration.
[Everlasting Oasis] The effect cannot be dispelled, and Crit DMG is increased by 35% during skill duration.
[Everlasting Oasis] The effect cannot be dispelled, and Crit DMG is increased by 42% during skill duration.
[Everlasting Oasis] The effect cannot be dispelled, and Crit DMG is increased by 50% during skill duration.
ut.story: A gold necklace for girls that Laias crafted for Lilia with a Gem of Protection. It gleams with the energy of water elementals in it. It is a symbol of Laias's care for her little sister.

s3.name: Celestial Cataract
s3.description: Throws water drops 15 times to random enemies, dealing a total of {0} P.DMG. Additionally, throws big water drops 5 times to target and other enemies in target's range, dealing {1} P.DMG. Enemies hit by the big water drop are inflicted by Stun for {2} sec. Per each water drop thrown, {3} mana is consumed, and mana consumption rate is increased by {4}. Stops use when mana becomes 0.
s3.light: While in use, gain immunity to CC.
s3.dark: Per each water drop thrown, mana cost and mana consumption rate are increased by 100%, and per each water drop thrown, there is a 50% chance of throwing an extra water drop.

ut.name: Bottomless Kettle of Elementals
description: [Celestial Cataract] Upon each ATK there is a 7% chance of throwing a big water drop, dealing 100% of ATK as P.DMG and increasing own Crit DMG by 2% for 7 sec.
[Celestial Cataract] Upon each ATK there is a 7% chance of throwing a big water drop, dealing 100% of ATK as P.DMG and increasing own Crit DMG by 2.4% for 7 sec.
[Celestial Cataract] Upon each ATK there is a 7% chance of throwing a big water drop, dealing 100% of ATK as P.DMG and increasing own Crit DMG by 2.9% for 7 sec.
[Celestial Cataract] Upon each ATK there is a 7% chance of throwing a big water drop, dealing 100% of ATK as P.DMG and increasing own Crit DMG by 3.5% for 7 sec.
[Celestial Cataract] Upon each ATK there is a 7% chance of throwing a big water drop, dealing 100% of ATK as P.DMG and increasing own Crit DMG by 4.2% for 7 sec.
[Celestial Cataract] Upon each ATK there is a 7% chance of throwing a big water drop, dealing 100% of ATK as P.DMG and increasing own Crit DMG by 5% for 7 sec.
ut.story: A kettle that Lilia's old cacti friends made for her on her birthday. The kettle infinitely produces the cleanest and purest water there is. However, if too much water is used at once, it shuts its spout, which is a featured added by the Cacti to help Lilia stay in control of the water until she becomes more skilled at it.

s4.name: Aqua Purification
s4.description: Mana recovery upon ATK is fixed, but own ATK is increased by {0} and mana recovery per sec is increased to 120. Per 6 mana recovery per sec, ATK is increased by 1%.
s4.light: At the start of each battle, recovers 1000 mana.
s4.dark: Deals 15% increased DMG to Boss monsters.

t5.dark: ATK is increased by 15% per 1 orb of mana.

58.name: Laudia
58.subtitle: Dancer of the Oasis
58.description: A dancer from a nomadic tribe in Aegina Desert. Her dance melts people's hearts, and her sharp blades silently take the lives of her enemies.
58.story: Trovatias are a nomadic tribe of Aegina Desert who inherited the tradition and religion of the ancient desert kingdom. Laudia is the daughter of the tribe leader and serves the Priestess of Water, Laias. She also looks after the tribe on behalf of her old father. When she prayed for help, God Dragon Laias and her sister Lilia woke up from their long sleep and led her and her tribe into the shrine, protecting them. Ever since, Laudia has been defeating demons in the desert with Zafir, the leader of the Mauhata tribe of Desert Warriors.
58.like: Laias, Lilia, people in the desert

inn.idle: Oh, what an interesting place. Is there any place for me to dance?

recruit.greet: Hi. May the Flowing power be with you.
talk: Have you not seen the priestess? She is very noticeable...
Well, If you watch me dance, you won't be able to think about anything else.
I do not want to see this beautiful world being destroyed any further.
recruit.gift: Thank you for the present. Care to dance?

affinity.greet: Hi! Now that we've gotten kind of close, is it okay if I call you by your first name?
talk: I like this place. It's so calm and peaceful.
Being a deputy leader is not an easy job. I need to take care of all the people in my tribe.
affinity.gift: Thank you. I should buy some snacks for the kids...

relationship.greet: Nice to see you. Well, are you here to see me?
talk: Have you met Lilia and her sister, Laias? They are so great. I am sure you'll like them very much.
I can sense the strong vibration of the Flow and fate, which is only found in true warriors and heroes.
I made a new dance, would you like to see it some time soon? We could even dance together.

uw.name: Whispering Sands, Arlaq
description: [Blessing of Oasis] can be stacked up to max 14 times, and upon auto attack, all skill cooldown is decreased by 4% with 10% chance.
[Blessing of Oasis] can be stacked up to max 15 times, and upon auto attack, all skill cooldown is decreased by 4.8% with 10% chance.
[Blessing of Oasis] can be stacked up to max 16 times, and upon auto attack, all skill cooldown is decreased by 5.8% with 10% chance.
[Blessing of Oasis] can be stacked up to max 17 times, and upon auto attack, all skill cooldown is decreased by 7% with 10% chance.
[Blessing of Oasis] can be stacked up to max 18 times, and upon auto attack, all skill cooldown is decreased by 8.4% with 10% chance.
[Blessing of Oasis] can be stacked up to max 20 times, and upon auto attack, all skill cooldown is decreased by 10% with 10% chance.
uw.story: A rare treasure that is the manifestation of passion burning like a flame in the desert. A pair of these beautiful weapons is known to have been stored in the ancient God King's repositorium. When swung, they beautifully sound like the wind with the scent of a breeze. It is a sweet but lethal temptation, just like a mirage in the desert...

s1.name: Whisper of Sand
s1.description: Attacks target enemy and deals {0} M.DMG to enemies in close range, decreasing enemy block chance by {2} and Crit resistance by {3} for {1} sec. Additionally, attacks and deals {4} M.DMG and stuns them for {5} sec.
s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.

s2.name: Enchanting Flow
s2.description: Increases own ATK by {1} and Crit DMG by {2}% for {0} sec. Then moves a short distance forward, dealing {3} M.DMG to enemies in movement range and Charms them for {4} sec if the skill was used in the Arena. Can activate [Alluring Ambush] once within 5 sec after use.

books.0: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%
books.1: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%
books.2: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%

s2.light: Gains 2 orbs of mana after movement. Gained Mana is consumed over 10 sec.
s2.dark: After using [Enchanting Flow], [Alluring Ambush] can be used twice within 10 sec.

ut.name: Halidom of Trovatia
description: [Enchanting Flow] After movement, absorbs DMG equal to 160% of ATK for 3 sec, then creates a shield that is immune to CC, and mana cost of [Alluring Ambush] is decreased by 1.
[Enchanting Flow] After movement, absorbs DMG equal to 190% of ATK for 3 sec, then creates a shield that is immune to CC, and mana cost of [Alluring Ambush] is decreased by 1.
[Enchanting Flow] After movement, absorbs DMG equal to 230% of ATK for 3 sec, then creates a shield that is immune to CC, and mana cost of [Alluring Ambush] is decreased by 1.
[Enchanting Flow] After movement, absorbs DMG equal to 270% of ATK for 3 sec, then creates a shield that is immune to CC, and mana cost of [Alluring Ambush] is decreased by 1.
[Enchanting Flow] After movement, absorbs DMG equal to 330% of ATK for 3 sec, then creates a shield that is immune to CC, and mana cost of [Alluring Ambush] is decreased by 1.
[Enchanting Flow] After movement, absorbs DMG equal to 400% of ATK for 3 sec, then creates a shield that is immune to CC, and mana cost of [Alluring Ambush] is decreased by 1.
ut.story: A chest containing the artifacts needed for worship rituals for the Dragon of Water. Some ornaments on it are crafted with 'Azure Lapis Lazuli,' a gem that represents complete fullness. It is the dearest thing that Laudia's father treasures, and is only given to those who have the ability to lead the entire Trovatia tribe.

linked.name: Alluring Ambush
linked.description: Attacks target enemy 3 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG. Deals extra {1} M.DMG to Boss enemies and enemies inflicted by Charm.

s3.name: Dance of the Desert
s3.description: Attacks enemies in range 30 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG. Additionally throws the 'Blades of Arlaq' at random enemies 30 times, dealing a total of {1} M.DMG. Extra {2} DMG is stacked every time the blade hits the same enemy. [Blinding Acceleration] can be used once during skill activation, and the 'Blades of Arlaq' prioritize targets inflicted by Charm.
s3.light: Recovers 30 Mana every hit.
s3.dark: Mana cost is increased by 1 and DMG is increased by 100%.

ut.name: Veil of Charm
description: [Dance of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and Penetration is increased by 100 during skill activation.
[Dance of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and Penetration is increased by 120 during skill activation.
[Dance of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and Penetration is increased by 140 during skill activation.
[Dance of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and Penetration is increased by 170 during skill activation.
[Dance of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and Penetration is increased by 210 during skill activation.
[Dance of the Desert] Skill cooldown is decreased by 30% and Penetration is increased by 250 during skill activation.
ut.story: A legendary Veil only given to the best dancer in the continent. Performing a dance with it on can mesmerize those who are watching. Laudia used the veil to mesmerize enemies with her seductive dance and achieved everything she wanted.

linked.name: Blinding Acceleration
linked.description: Gains immunity to CC for {0} sec and ATK Spd is increased by {1}.

s4.name: Blessing of Oasis
s4.description: Decreases CC duration inflicted on self by {0}%. Upon using a skill, gains [Blessing of Oasis] for {1} sec, increasing own Penetration by {2} and DEF by {3}. [Blessing of Oasis] can be stacked up to max {4} times and cannot be dispelled.

books.0: DEF Penetration and DEF boost are increased by {0}%.
books.1: DEF Penetration and DEF boost are increased by {0}%.
books.2: DEF Penetration and DEF boost are increased by {0}%.

s4.light: Gains 2 stack of [Blessing of Oasis].
s4.dark: Per each stack, takes 2% less DMG from enemies other than heroes

t5.dark: At the start of each battle, gains immunity to CC for 7 sec, and ACC, CC ACC are increased by 300 for 10 sec.

61.name: Neraxis
61.subtitle: Obsidian Arrogance
61.description: The descendant of a black dragon that controlled dark lightning. He fights to rid the world of the demons, especially the Draconics. The energy of dark lightning imbued in his Pile Bunker penetrates the enemy's defense.
61.story: Black dragons are notorious for being the most arrogant and ill-tempered out of all dragons. They suffered greatly from the Demon War 100 years ago. Armarta went mad, Ashen Nox robbed them, and Draconics started hunting down dragons. Neraxis was one of the few black dragon that survived that day, and he has been working and plotting to realize his revenge.
61.dislike: Demons, Cain, Lilia, and everything that gets in his way.

inn.idle: Hmpf. What am I even doing here...?

recruit.greet: Hmph, what does a human want with me?
talk: You're not worth talking to.
What do you want?
Ha, ridiculous.
recruit.gift: I don't know what you want, but it's no use.

affinity.greet: Hmph, it's you again, human.
talk: Huh? You want help? Hmpf. Bothersome.
Ha, that's right. Black dragons are the strongest!
affinity.gift: I don't need that. Why do you keep...?

relationship.greet: ...Fine, I'm glad to see you! Hmpf...
talk: Lilia? Ah, that annoying kid? Tsk, she always gets in the way.
Why won't that mummy get lost? Sometimes I really want to kill him.
Why do I like Laias? Hmph, y-you don't need a reason to like someone... No, wait! How did you know!?

uw.name: Roaring Dragonmaw, Acravita
description: After landing 20 normal attacks, deals M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK to 2 random enemies, stuns them for 0.5 sec, and becomes Storm of Neraxis for 10 sec. For the duration of Storm of Neraxis, increases P.DEF of all allies by 4% of caster's P.DEF and M.DEF by 4% of the caster's M.DEF.

After landing 19 normal attacks, deals M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK to 2 random enemies, stuns them for 0.5 sec, and becomes Storm of Neraxis for 10 sec. For the duration of Storm of Neraxis, increases P.DEF of all allies by 4.8% of caster's P.DEF and M.DEF by 4.8% of the caster's M.DEF.

After landing 18 normal attacks, deals M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK to 2 random enemies, stuns them for 0.5 sec, and becomes Storm of Neraxis for 10 sec. For the duration of Storm of Neraxis, increases P.DEF of all allies by 5.7% of caster's P.DEF and M.DEF by 5.7% of the caster's M.DEF.

After landing 17 normal attacks, deals M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK to 2 random enemies, stuns them for 0.5 sec, and becomes Storm of Neraxis for 10 sec. For the duration of Storm of Neraxis, increases P.DEF of all allies by 6.9% of caster's P.DEF and M.DEF by 6.9% of the caster's M.DEF.

After landing 16 normal attacks, deals M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK to 2 random enemies, stuns them for 0.5 sec, and becomes Storm of Neraxis for 10 sec. For the duration of Storm of Neraxis, increases P.DEF of all allies by 8.3% of caster's P.DEF and M.DEF by 8.3% of the caster's M.DEF.

After landing 15 normal attacks, deals M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK to 2 random enemies, stuns them for 0.5 sec, and becomes Storm of Neraxis for 10 sec. For the duration of Storm of Neraxis, increases P.DEF of all allies by 10% of caster's P.DEF and M.DEF by 10% of the caster's M.DEF.
uw.story: A magic gear crafted with pitch-black metal called Adamantite, tempered with the dark flame and the lightning of a black dragon. It holds the grudge and rage of black dragons that were killed during the Demon War. Neraxis threatened the dwarves to forge this special weapon for him. Then, he cursed and enchanted it with the grudge-filled souls of black dragons. Anyone who touches this weapon beside Neraxis will hear the raging roars of vengeful dragons.

s1.name: Black Lightning Claw
s1.description: Draws enemies towards the target and deals {0} M.DMG. Deals {1} M.DMG around the target after 1 sec and stuns them for {2} sec. Reduces ATK Spd of hit enemies by {4} for {3} sec.
s1.light: Increases Stun duration by {0} sec.
s1.dark: Increases the M.DMG that the hit enemy takes by 25% for 10 sec.

s2.name: Obsidian Roar
s2.description: Increases ATK, P.DEF, and M.DEF of all allies by {1} for {0} sec. Deals {2} M.DMG to all enemies and reduces their ATK by {4}% for {3} sec.

books.0: Increases ATK Boost and DEF Boost by {0}%.
books.1: Increases ATK Boost and DEF Boost by {0}%.
books.2: Increases ATK Boost and DEF Boost by {0}%.

s2.light: Increases Mana Cost by 1 and ATK and DEF Boost by {0}%.
s2.dark: Reduces ATK Spd of the hit enemy by {1} for {0} sec.

ut.name: Memories of the Blue God Dragon
description: [Obsidian Roar] Increases DEF Boost of allies by 20% and dispels positive effects from all enemies upon using Obsidian Roar.
[Obsidian Roar] Increases DEF Boost of allies by 24% and dispels positive effects from all enemies upon using Obsidian Roar.
[Obsidian Roar] Increases DEF Boost of allies by 29% and dispels positive effects from all enemies upon using Obsidian Roar.
[Obsidian Roar] Increases DEF Boost of allies by 35% and dispels positive effects from all enemies upon using Obsidian Roar.
[Obsidian Roar] Increases DEF Boost of allies by 42% and dispels positive effects from all enemies upon using Obsidian Roar.
[Obsidian Roar] Increases DEF Boost of allies by 50% and dispels positive effects from all enemies upon using Obsidian Roar.
ut.story: A hair accessory that Laias dropped while cleansing the waters corrupted by demons. Neraxis found it and kept it, but he still hasn't decided whether he'll give it back. It's not likely that Laias will get her lost hair accessory any time soon.

s3.name: Breath of Destruction
s3.description: Deals a total of {0} M.DMG to enemies within a large area around the target over 6 times and reduces their M.DEF by {2}% for {1} sec. Each hit stuns the enemy for {3} sec.
s3.light: Reduce Mana Cost by 1.
s3.dark: Changes M.DEF Reduction to 30%.

ut.name: Rage Vortex
description: [Breath of Destruction] Increases Stun duration by 1 sec and reduces Cooldown of Breath of Destruction by 3 sec.
[Breath of Destruction] Increases Stun duration by 1 sec and reduces Cooldown of Breath of Destruction by 4 sec.
[Breath of Destruction] Increases Stun duration by 1 sec and reduces Cooldown of Breath of Destruction by 5 sec.
[Breath of Destruction] Increases Stun duration by 1 sec and reduces Cooldown of Breath of Destruction by 6 sec.
[Breath of Destruction] Increases Stun duration by 1 sec and reduces Cooldown of Breath of Destruction by 7 sec.
[Breath of Destruction] Increases Stun duration by 1 sec and reduces Cooldown of Breath of Destruction by 8 sec.
ut.story: Crafted with his own fang, this stake holds Neraxis's burning rage. When Neraxis attacks with the stake, the great energy, entangled with Neraxis's powers, swirls at the enemy at a terrifying speed. It is powerful enough to penetrate all things, and rip off the limbs of those who come near it.

s4.name: Black Dragon Hide
s4.description: Increases P.DEF and M.DEF by {0} and takes reduced P.DMG and M.DMG by {1}%.
s4.light: ATK Spd is increased by 300
s4.dark: When HP falls below {0}%, skill effects are increased by {1}%.

t5.dark: At the beginning of every battle, reduces DMG that non-Hero enemies deal to all allies except Neraxis by {1}% for {0} sec.

62.name: Scarlet
62.subtitle: Faith of Silver
62.description: A princess of Orvelia that truly loves her people. She wields her sword to protect the weak and support justice, as a true knight. Using a magical greatsword that disrupts mana, she cuts through her enemies.
62.story: King Veroglance the Second of Orvelia grew weaker by the day. He was once a stout monarch whom no one dared to cross. However, he, too, began to show weakness with age. When he finally fell ill, those with aspirations of power began gathering around him like flies. Scarlet tried her hardest to protect her father in this chaos. But the man being swayed by the flatterers around him was no longer the respected king she once knew. The king turned his back on his daughter's pleas. The nobles were unhappy to accept her, the king's only child, as the next queen, to say the least. The atmosphere of the royal palace darkened quickly. She knows. The nobles would pressure her incessantly. But she would never yield. She is prepared to fight to protect her kingdom, to protect her people. She would never let those who are greedy for power to take control of the kingdom. No matter what...

inn.idle: Hmm. Cleaner than expected.

recruit.greet: I assume you have business with me?
talk: Do not be so distant. Come closer.
Tell me more of your story.
This country is still standing due to your efforts. I thank you with all my heart.
recruit.gift: ...Tha... thank you...

affinity.greet: Good to see you.
talk: We must not forget that the people are the backbone of this country.
I'm worried about my father's illness.
affinity.gift: Thank you as always. I'll use it well.

relationship.greet: We meet again. Take a seat... let us talk.
talk: Do you also think not only the capital of Orvel, but the entirety of Orvelia, has changed...?
It would be a lie to say I am not tired... but even so, I try not to be.
I have trustworthy retainers at my side. Thanks to them, I can still go on... Haha, so obstinate and straightforward, that one.

uw.name: Blade of Conviction, White Belona
description: Per every skill in cooldown, DMG is increased by 8%.
Per every skill in cooldown, DMG is increased by 10%.
Per every skill in cooldown, DMG is increased by 12%.
Per every skill in cooldown, DMG is increased by 14%.
Per every skill in cooldown, DMG is increased by 17%.
Per every skill in cooldown, DMG is increased by 20%.
uw.story: The most legendary sword in Orvelia. This sacred blade has been passed down the royal lineage of Orvelia since the kingdom's birth, symbolizing the true authority of the monarch. King Kyle used this sword as well, until he was chosen by the Holy Sword Aea. Blessed with the power of light, its blade can disable any magic by cutting through its flow. Only a knight of noble bloodline and righteous pride can wield this sword. Those who wish to lift it must pass the trial of the royal family, a feat only accomplished by Scarlet, aside from Kyle.

s1.name: Halt!
s1.description: Attacks all frontal enemies, dealing {0} P.DMG and knocking them down for 3 sec. If the target is not a Hero, deals {1} additional P.DMG. Heals HP equal to 30% of DMG dealt.

books.2: Target takes {0}% increased P.DMG for 10 sec.

s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Dispels all harmful effects on oneself upon use.

s2.name: Justice Served!
s2.description: Dispels negative effects of all allies and dispels positive effects of all enemies, while dealing {0} P.DMG.
s2.light: If the target is not a Hero, stuns them for 4 sec.
s2.dark: All allies' P.Crit Resistance is increased by 200 for 10 sec.

ut.name: Wings of Justice
description: [Justice Served!] Increases DMG by 20% and reduces Cooldown of all allies by 10%.
[Justice Served!] Increases DMG by 24% and reduces Cooldown of all allies by 10%.
[Justice Served!] Increases DMG by 29% and reduces Cooldown of all allies by 10%.
[Justice Served!] Increases DMG by 35% and reduces Cooldown of all allies by 10%.
[Justice Served!] Increases DMG by 42% and reduces Cooldown of all allies by 10%.
[Justice Served!] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown of all allies by 10%.
ut.story: Pendant made by Scarlet, whose principles won't let her ignore injustice or kneel in the face of cowardice. She gifted one each to the people she relies on: Clause and Demia. The shining wings of the royal emerald, which symbolize justice, are embedded inside the pendant. One can straighten oneself out by staring at the pendant that reflects one's eyes. She looks at it each time she feels despair by looking at the people who lay blame on her father Veroglance II.

s3.name: Sword of Honor!!
s3.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times, dealing a total of {0} P.DMG. Fires an energy blast from the sword, dealing {1} P.DMG to enemies in a straight line, blinding them for 5 sec.
s3.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s3.dark: Damaged enemies receive 40% reduced heals for 10 sec.

ut.name: Pride of Orvelia
description: [Sword of Honor!!] DMG is increased by 20% and each ATK inflicts Stun on enemy for 3 sec.
[Sword of Honor!!] DMG is increased by 24% and each ATK inflicts Stun on enemy for 3 sec.
[Sword of Honor!!] DMG is increased by 29% and each ATK inflicts Stun on enemy for 3 sec.
[Sword of Honor!!] DMG is increased by 35% and each ATK inflicts Stun on enemy for 3 sec.
[Sword of Honor!!] DMG is increased by 42% and each ATK inflicts Stun on enemy for 3 sec.
[Sword of Honor!!] DMG is increased by 50% and each ATK inflicts Stun on enemy for 3 sec.
ut.story: A celebratory flag that was made to praise the king when Orvelia was first founded. Whenever she sees the flag in the office, it angers her to think of the treacherous subjects who reduced her father to a scarecrow and the flatterers who ruined the country. This made Scarlet even more determined to restore Orvelia's days of glory and to establish a stronger throne.

s4.name: Goddess of War
s4.description: All Crit Resistance increases by {0}. With 10% chance, deals additional {1} P.DMG during auto attack and stuns target enemy for 1 sec.
s4.light: Crit Resistance increases to 300.
s4.dark: Stun duration lasts for 2 more sec when there is only one enemy.

t5.dark: When receiving Critical DMG, there is a 5% chance the attacker is dispelled of all positive effects and is stunned for 1 sec. Skill cooldown is 8 sec.

63.name: Sonia
63.subtitle: The Blue Hurricane
63.description: A genius who was acknowledged by the Tower of Sages, while not being part of it. She was given the title of 'Blue', but her true identity is that of a homunculus. Her orbs of lightning do not even leave ash in their wake.
63.story: A combat homunculus created by a wizard in Orvel, who used the heart of Vikal the Lightning Beast as her core. After gaining self-awareness in the creation process, she fled the laboratory and spent the next few years at Ricardo's orphanage. She is capable of casting powerful lightning magic at will. As a combat homunculus, she boasts excellent physical abilities as well. Beneath her appearance as a young girl, she is a confused war machine searching for the meaning of her existence. The wizards of the Tower of Sage bestowed her the title of 'Blue' to indicate her mastery over chant-less spell casting. However, she distrusts wizards and has no desire to associate herself with the Tower.
63.like: Mirianne, and everyone at the orphanage

inn.idle: There are a lot of people, huh...Mirianne, where are you?

recruit.greet: Eh, me? Um...
talk: I'm only good at fighting, really. Don't expect too much from me.
Even if I'm not human, don't take me lightly.
Stop staring, before I shock you real good.
recruit.gift: Eh, for me? Ah, um...t...thanks?

affinity.greet: Hello? I just stopped by.
talk: If you want to spar, let me know. Of course, it'll hurt a lot! You might get electrocuted!
Huh? Mirianne is here, too?
affinity.gift: Huh? For me? Really?

relationship.greet: Eh, you want to talk to me? You're weird...
talk: You're curious about me? Well...I did tell you I'm a homunculus.
Fighting style? Ah, I use the Core of Electricity inside my body to...
Friends and family? Oh...um, Ricardo, Mirianne...and maybe...you?

uw.name: Eye of the Storm, Yanadis
description: Shock duration is increased by 2 sec. When auto attacking an enemy inflicted by Shock, all cooldowns are reduced by 1.6%.
Shock duration is increased by 3 sec. When auto attacking an enemy inflicted by Shock, all cooldowns are reduced by 1.9%.
Shock duration is increased by 4 sec. When auto attacking an enemy inflicted by Shock, all cooldowns are reduced by 2.3%
Shock duration is increased by 5 sec. When auto attacking an enemy inflicted by Shock, all cooldowns are reduced by 2.7%.
Shock duration is increased by 6 sec. When auto attacking an enemy inflicted by Shock, all cooldowns are reduced by 3.3%.
Shock duration is increased by 7 sec. When auto attacking an enemy inflicted by Shock, all cooldowns are reduced by 4%.
uw.story: A sphere of electricity created by Sonia based on the beast core that is now her own heart. She has shown great talent in making magic gear, and this is the first weapon she ever created. It's a bit lacking in stability, mostly due to the overwhelming electricity it contains. The powerful electrical storm created by this weapon is truly dangerous for any enemy. In fact, anyone besides Sonia who touches it would be instantly fried by the immense current that flows through it.

s1.name: Lightning Strike!
s1.description: Causes an electric explosion ahead, dealing {0} M.DMG to enemies in range and placing an electric field for 3 sec. The electric field deals a total of {1} M.DMG over 10 attacks and with 25% chance, stuns the enemy for 0.5 sec.
s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Stun chance is increased by 10%.

s2.name: Power of Lightning!
s2.description: For 15 sec, ATK is increased by {0} and all DEF is increased by {1}. While the skill is in use, each auto attack has a 30% chance of dealing extra {2} M.DMG to 2 random enemies and stunning them for 0.5 sec.

books.1: ATK and DEF boosts are increased by {0}%.
books.2: ATK and DEF boosts are increased by {0}%.

s2.light: ATK and DEF boosts are increased by 40%.
s2.dark: Additional DMG effect applies to all enemies.

ut.name: Lightning Tent
description: [Power of Lightning!] Changes the effect irremovable and increases the chance to trigger an additional damage by 10% additionally.
[Power of Lightning!] Changes the effect irremovable and increases the chance to trigger an additional damage by 12% additionally.
[Power of Lightning!] Changes the effect irremovable and increases the chance to trigger an additional damage by 14% additionally.
[Power of Lightning!] Changes the effect irremovable and increases the chance to trigger an additional damage by 17% additionally.

[Power of Lightning!] Changes the effect irremovable and increases the chance to trigger an additional damage by 25% additionally.
ut.story: A cloak that Mirianne made for Sonia by braving a danger. There was a time when Sonia's clothes would burn from the explosion of the electricity that ran through her body. Mirianne saw that and plucked out the ereth plant that is said to grow by being struck by lightning. She pulled out its thread and completed a cloak with it. Sonia saw Mirianne's blistered hands from the electricity, and she cried in silence for a long time. A piece of clothing just for Sonia that can't be found anywhere else.

s3.name: Electric Explosion!
s3.description: Deals a total of {0} M.DMG over 3 attacks to nearby enemies in a circular range. Then causes an Electric Explosion, dealing a total of {1} M.DMG over 3 attacks and stunning them for 5 sec.
s3.light: While in use, gain immunity to CC.
s3.dark: Stun duration is increased by 1 sec.

ut.name: Heart of Baikal
description: [Electric Explosion!] When attacking enemy inflicted by Shock, enemy takes 100% of ATK as extra M.DMG and target's M.DEF and P.DEF is reduced by 10% for 5 sec.
[Electric Explosion!] When attacking enemy inflicted by Shock, enemy takes 100% of ATK as extra M.DMG and target's M.DEF and P.DEF is reduced by 12% for 5 sec.
[Electric Explosion!] When attacking enemy inflicted by Shock, enemy takes 100% of ATK as extra M.DMG and target's M.DEF and P.DEF is reduced by 14% for 5 sec.
[Electric Explosion!] When attacking enemy inflicted by Shock, enemy takes 100% of ATK as extra M.DMG and target's M.DEF and P.DEF is reduced by 17% for 5 sec.
[Electric Explosion!] When attacking enemy inflicted by Shock, enemy takes 100% of ATK as extra M.DMG and target's M.DEF and P.DEF is reduced by 21% for 5 sec.
[Electric Explosion!] When attacking enemy inflicted by Shock, enemy takes 100% of ATK as extra M.DMG and target's M.DEF and P.DEF is reduced by 25% for 5 sec.
ut.story: Heart of Vikal, who is called a holy beast. He eats the elements of light and dark from the world, so his heart is full of thunder from the collision between the two elements. If someone unskilled were to touch it, he would be absorbed by its power. But Sonia, who is made up of the core of lightning, absorbed that power and obtained mana that is beyond imaginable.

s4.name: Shock
s4.description: With every attack, injects Electricity to targets not inflicted by Shock and increases M.DMG taken by {0}% for 10 sec. Electricity can be stacked up to 30 times, and the 30th stack will consume all Electricity to deal {1} M.DMG and Shock the target for 7 sec. Enemies inflicted by Shock take {3}% increased M.DMG, and when they are inflicted by Stun, the duration is increased by {2} sec.
s4.light: Shock duration is increased by 2 sec.
s4.dark: Increased M.DMG taken' effect changes to 'Increased P. and M. DMG taken'.

t5.dark: Upon attack, with 15% chance deals extra M.DMG by 10% of Max HP and injects 1 extra stack of Electricity.

64.name: Artemia
64.subtitle: Empress of Light
64.description: The Queen of Pentheonia, the Ironclad Kingdom which did not budge an inch against the Demons 100 years ago. Her staff holds a brilliant light, burning with justice and she uses it to burn her enemies to ashes.
64.story: Penteonia is an impenetrable kingdom. Even the Demon Army could not breach its defense 100 years ago. Ruling over this iron kingdom is Artemia, the Empress of Light. Ever since childhood, she has lived under the weight of responsibility of the throne she would eventually inherit. When she finally realized that the victory of her kingdom was only made possible by the sacrifices of her people, she swore to never hide from her duties. She would face the pressure of royal responsibility with courage. Penteonia has historically been a selfish kingdom, only interested in its own safety. Now, with Artemia as its ruler, everything is about to change.
64.like: Sweet cakes, the eyes of righteous knights

inn.idle: I have come to seek you.

recruit.greet: You shall not forget I am here for you.
talk: Is this your token of sincerity?
I shall remember your face.
Do not cower before me. Raise your head in pride.
recruit.gift: Is this what you prize? I shall cherish it too.

affinity.greet: No need to kneel.
talk: It looks like I'm not the only one who was chosen by the light.
I wonder if the Royal Guard kids are doing well.
affinity.gift: Thank you for your generosity.

relationship.greet: You seem to be doing well.
talk: Father and Mother no longer bear the heavy burden of the crown. They now enjoy their lives together, without worry.
Few of the Knights here at Orvelia are gems that any ruler would want at their court.
I shall not avoid the responsibility that falls into my hands. However, it is nice that I have you to share my burdens with.

uw.name: Brilliant Praise, Brauxio
description: Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 200% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 20%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 240% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 24%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 290% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 29%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 350% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 35%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 420% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 42%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 500% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 50%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
uw.story: This sacred treasure of Penteonia is said to have been sent from the Heavens to eradicate the Demons. This Light Staff, known to respond only to those worthy of sainthood, radiated with splendid light in the hands of the young Artemia, as if to honor the future empress. It calls upon the power of absolute light, unleashing heaven's vengeance upon its enemies while protecting its wielder with divine light.

s1.name: Pillar of Light
s1.description: Places a Pillar of Light on target enemy, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG for 3 sec and reducing enemy ATK by {1}% for 10 sec.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Each hit has a 25% chance to stun the enemy for 1 sec.

[Critical Intensity] Gains Immunity to CC and increases DMG by 50%.
ut.story: Earrings made from light kveril, a rare mineral that is said to only come out in Penteonia. When Artemia was crowned Empress, she received it along with the crown. It doesn't lose its light even at night, and it actually shines even more brightly in the dark. It's known as the jewel of principles and brilliance amongst the people. An item that raises the dignity of the queen as they shine from her ears.

s3.name: Light's Judgment
s3.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG and stunning them for 5 sec. Per each killed enemy with this skill, cooldown is reduced by 30%.
s3.light: Cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.

ut.name: Crown of Brilliance
description: [Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 20% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 24% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 29% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 35% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 42% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 50% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
ut.story: A crown that is passed down to the king of Penteonia. A part of it had been broken by a previous tyrant, but it's been repaired. A new red gem called the Soul of the Sun has been embedded at the center of the crown. Its dignified form compels one to kneel before it in a show of respect.

s4.name: Blessing of Light
s4.description: Each attack has a 50% chance of dealing {0} M.DMG to target and nearby enemies, while Artemia gains 1 stack of Blessing of Light. Blessing of Light can be stacked up to 10 times max. Per every stack, ATK is increased by {1} , DMG dealt to enemies other than heroes is increased by {2}% and DMG received by enemies other than heroes is reduced by {3}%.
s4.light: Activation chance is changed to 60%.
s4.dark: Maximum stack count is increased to 12.

t5.dark: When HP falls below 50%, gain 2 sec of immunity to all DMG. This effect activates only once every 30 sec.

65.name: Mirianne
65.subtitle: Servant of Blue
65.description: The assistant and maid of the archmage of Blue, Sonia. She acts only for the sake of Sonia, who is her employer, sister and friend. Using her keen eyes and mind, she exploits the enemy's weakness with her daggers.
65.story: She is Sonia's maid and sister-like friend from the orphanage. When her village of Humans and Elves was attacked by the Demons, she was the only survivor. Ricardo found her and took her into his orphanage. For some unknown reason, she experienced explosive growth phase at the age of 6. Her body now resembles that of an 18-year-old, but she still has the mind of a child. She is pure and devotional to a fault. Perhaps these traits are related to the loss of her childhood memories.
65.like: Sonia, and everyone at the orphanage

inn.idle: Sonia~ Umm, she seems to have gone poof again.

recruit.greet: Ah, hello! It's good that you seem healthy!
talk: Hehe, are Kasel and Frey doing well?
I want to visit Gramps. It's been a while.
Ah, I'm not a real maid. I just like the clothes, hehehe.
recruit.gift: Ah, thank you! You really didn't need to...

affinity.greet: I'm here again! Nice to meet you!
talk: I brought some pretty clothes! Please pick something that will fit me!
Heh heh. Can I come play with Sonia?
affinity.gift: Thank you! Let's go see Grandpa together next time!

relationship.greet: Ah, you came! Hehe, will you rest for a bit?
talk: This bustling atmosphere feels like back home at the orphanage~
Are you hungry? Would you like a snack?
I love these clothes, they're so pretty and fluttery~

uw.name: Endless Acceleration, Riventina
description: Increases ATK Spd by 200, and attacks on Locked On enemies, dealing 200% of ATK as extra M.DMG. Extra damage effect occurs once in 2 sec.
Increases ATK Spd by 240, and attacks on Locked On enemies, dealing 240% of ATK as extra M.DMG. Extra damage effect occurs once in 2 sec.
Increases ATK Spd by 290, and attacks on Locked On enemies, dealing 290% of ATK as extra M.DMG. Extra damage effect occurs once in 2 sec.

Increases ATK Spd by 500, and attacks on Locked On enemies, dealing 500% of ATK as extra M.DMG. Extra damage effect occurs once in 2 sec.
uw.story: A magic gear created by Sonia, the Archmage of Blue. It is enchanted with magic that allows it to reach incredible speeds. It is also enchanted with a special spell that always guides it back to its owner after it's thrown. It is the best gift Sonia could give to Mirianne, who is both a family and a friend to her. In other words, it's a unique expression of love reserved only for Mirianne.

The last attack inflicts 'Target Lock On' on the enemy for 10 sec. Lock On cannot be dispelled, and the target's M.Block rate has decreased by 300.

s1.dark: Stun duration is increased by 1 sec.

Then moves to an ally with the lowest P.DEF, excluding self, and creates Shield for two that can block {1} DMG for 10 sec. Shield will be ineffective when there is no ally. Gains immunity to CC while the Shield lasts.

ut.story: Ring that Mirianne purchased at the 'Amazing Magic Toy Shop' in Orvel. She engraved Sonia's and her name in the ring. The two make a set, and it allows each other to teleport to the location of the other once a day. Though, Sonia doesn't use it since it's troublesome... It may be a toy, but Mirianne is happy that there's one more way for her to protect Sonia.

s3.name: Assassination

ut.story: A collection of beautiful matter that is sprayed in Sonia's crystal ball like stars. Mirianne collected it to pull a prank, but it's so powerful that it's being used as a tool for assassination.

s4.name: Target Eliminated
s4.description: If an enemy is inflicted by 'Target Lock On', ATK increases by {0} and all attacks skills prioritize Locked On enemies. When the Locked On enemies dies, 'Target Lock On' is inflicted on another enemy for 10 sec.

s4.dark: Receives 30% reduced DMG when enemy is inflicted by 'Target Lock On'.

t5.dark: Upon killing an enemy, all skill cooldown is reduced by 50%, and recovers 1 orb of mana.

66.name: Shea
66.subtitle: Aria of Fantasy
66.description: This mysterious girl heals people with her captivating tunes. She heals people with her beautiful voice and the lovely sounds of her magic harp.
66.story: 'Listening to the beautiful melody on the battlefield makes me wonder if I am truly in the middle of a battlefield.' 'I dropped the sword from my hand. All the other soldiers present also dropped their swords.' 'It felt as though the girl was in an entirely different plane of existence, removed from the rest of us.' The sensational tale of the pink-haired girl, whose sudden appearance and performance stopped the battle, quickly spread. Her beautiful, captivating melody and her demure, lovely presence has captured everyone's imagination. However, no one really knew where she came from or where she was headed. 'She seemed kind of strange to me, the way she was talking to thin air, as if there was somebody there...' Of course, some have suggested more convincing theories on the girl’s whereabouts, but her mysterious beauty has drowned out all speculation.

inn.idle: Lalala~lalala~la...ah?

recruit.greet: Radiant Sun, let today be another happy day.
talk: Can you hear it? The melody floating on top of the wind...
Hmmm~ Have you seen my harp around here?
Shuwanheit and I first met in the forest, you know.
recruit.gift: Thank you~ for that, I'll play a song for you.

affinity.greet: I'm here to bless you again!
talk: You look happy. I can feel a blinding melody from you.
This is the music of the spirits from the forest. Doesn't it make you feel so warm?
affinity.gift: Thank you. Schwanheit will be very happy.

relationship.greet: Your harmony is full of warmth and comfort.
talk: You might not know, but Shuwanheit is quite the chatty one.
Shuwanheit sometimes changes the tone of the music, depending on his mood.
Someday, I hope to play your very own song.

uw.name: Charming Melody , Schwanheite
description: When Trance is stacked, all skill cooldown is reduced by 10%, and recovers own Mana by 200.
When Trance is stacked, all skill cooldown is reduced by 12%, and recovers own Mana by 240.
When Trance is stacked, all skill cooldown is reduced by 14%, and recovers own Mana by 290.
When Trance is stacked, all skill cooldown is reduced by 17%, and recovers own Mana by 350.
When Trance is stacked, all skill cooldown is reduced by 20%, and recovers own Mana by 420.
When Trance is stacked, all skill cooldown is reduced by 25%, and recovers own Mana by 500.
uw.story: This powerful and awe-inspiring equipment that can converse with their wielders, sometimes even dominating the owners themselves. Schwanheit is counted among these awesome weapons. This harp, which insists that it be called 'Mr. Schute,' can significantly amplify the wielder’s mana and spray it all around the wielder. Since the amplified mana is scattered about, it cannot be effectively used as offensive magic. However, depending on how it's used it can prove to be extremely effective in other ways. Mr. Schute is quite a chatterbox, but only to those he considers as his friends. These days he only talks to Shea.

s1.dark: Increases Crit Resistance of all allies by 250 for 8 seconds.

ut.story: A flower that was by Shea's head the day after she performed Happiness from the Wind. According to Schwanheit, it was also a gift from the fairies of the forest for her beautiful music. It contains Shea's wish that the wind will carry happiness all over the world.

s3.name: Dance of Red Passion
s3.description: Deals a total of {0} M.DMG. to all enemies over 8 times, and increases ATK of all allies by {1} for 8 seconds. If used when Trance is stacked up to 3, this skill's DMG and ATK Boost increase by 100%, and all enemies' buffs are continuously canceled.
