[Dance of Red Passion] Upon activation, enemies are inflicted with Silence for 2 sec, and all allies' Crit DMG is increased by 50% for the duration of skill.
ut.story: A chaplet that was by Shea's head the day after she performed Lullaby to the Dreams in the forest. According to Schwanheit, it was a gift from the fairies of the forest for her beautiful music. It is said that items that went through the hands of fairies have the power to return a soul back to its purest form.

s4.name: Trance
s4.description: At the end of the skill, 1 more Trance is stacked. Trance can be stacked up to max 3 times, and if the skill is used when Trance is stacked up to 3, consumes the stack to heal {0} HP of all allies. Trance cannot be dispelled.
s4.light: Increases Heal rate of Trance by 100%.
s4.dark: If a skill is used when there are 3 Trance stacks, inflicts M.DMG to enemies instead of healing allies, and reduces all DEF by 10% for 10 sec.

t5.dark: At the start of every battle, adds 1 Trance stack recovers 500 MP.

67.name: Kara
67.subtitle: Epitome of Ancient Technomagic
67.description: A human-type machine Golem made by a technomagi of a long forgotten ancient civilization. Her body is an agglomeration of ancient technology and the epitome of technomagic. She's a strong weapon that can annihilate the enemy with powerful focused fire.
67.story: A human-type Golem that was made with ancient technomagic, but her appearance is just like that of a human girl. But she's an ancient weapon that has no feelings and was just made to be a tool. She was asleep in the ruins of an ancient civilization, deep underground in Galluah Plains. She was excavated by Annette, a technomagi in the Kingdom of Orvel, during her research and awakened in a new era with a new civilization...
67.dislike: Orders that cannot be carried out, inefficient way of doing things

inn.idle: So many humans. More than I've ever seen.

recruit.greet: Hello.
talk: Today's weather is... It's pretty clear. There will be some clouds at night.
The food here is high quality. It doesn't have poison, so no need to worry.
The palace is quiet, but this place is noisy.
recruit.gift: So, this is the currency used today. My Master would like it.

affinity.greet: Hello. Another Master.
talk: I'm a weapon. I have no emotions. But...
I wonder what it means to be alive...
affinity.gift: Thank you. It will be used to fund the master's research.

relationship.greet: Hello. Did you sleep well?
talk: I don't understand emotions very well... But I wonder what this feeling is.
I feel something familiar. Familiar... Is this it?
I'm curious what love feels like. I want to know.

uw.name: 0-Form Perpetual Motion Cannon, Heaven Shatterer
description: Increases ATK by 1% every second. Can be stacked up to 30 times.
Increases ATK by 1% every second. Can be stacked up to 40 times.
Increases ATK by 1% every second. Can be stacked up to 50 times.
Increases ATK by 1% every second. Can be stacked up to 60 times.
Increases ATK by 1% every second. Can be stacked up to 70 times.
Increases ATK by 1% every second. Can be stacked up to 80 times.
uw.story: An artifact from an ancient civilization that has an engine that provides unlimited power. It's a mighty weapon with the power of a siege weapon, and its power comes close to that of the highest-rank magic. This weapon was found in the ruins of the old Republic of Gray, but it remained in storage since no one knew how to use it. Long after that, Kara was excavated and once she awakened, it teleported to her side. The highest-ranking technomagic weapon that was made in a similar way as the Mountain Fortress.

s1.name: Anti-personnel Laser
s1.description: Attacks the target 4 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG and inflicting knockback. Attacks all enemies with the last blow, dealing {1} M.DMG and blowing them away for {2} seconds.
s1.light: [Anti-personnel Laser] - Recovers 200 MP upon a Crit Hit. [Siege Laser] - Increases Mana Cost by 1 and DMG by 100%.
s1.dark: [Anti-personnel Laser] - Reduces 300 MP of the enemy that took the DMG. [Siege Laser] - Reduces Mana Cost by 1.

linked.name: Siege Laser
linked.description: Attacks the target inflicting {0} M.DMG. Crit DMG is applied {1}% higher.

s2.name: Wide-area Cannon
s2.description: Attacks a random target and nearby enemies in range 4 times, inflicting a total of {0} M.DMG and stunning them for {1} seconds.
s2.light: [Wide-area Cannon] - Increases the Stun duration by 1 second. [Focused Fire] - Stacks 1 additional Focused Fire.
s2.dark: [Wide-area Cannon] - Reduces Mana Cost by 1. [Focused Fire] - Increases the Max Stack of Focused Fire to 60.

ut.name: Recording Device KARA-00XX
description: [Wide-area Cannon] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces ATK Spd of the target by 100 for 10 sec. [Focused Fire] Reduces Cooldown by 2% upon a Crit Hit and recovers 150 Mana.
[Wide-area Cannon] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces ATK Spd of the target by 120 for 10 sec. [Focused Fire] Reduces Cooldown by 2.4% upon a Crit Hit and recovers 150 Mana.
[Wide-area Cannon] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces ATK Spd of the target by 140 for 10 sec. [Focused Fire] Reduces Cooldown by 2.9% upon a Crit Hit and recovers 150 Mana.
[Wide-area Cannon] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces ATK Spd of the target by 170 for 10 sec. [Focused Fire] Reduces Cooldown by 3.5% upon a Crit Hit and recovers 150 Mana.
[Wide-area Cannon] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces ATK Spd of the target by 210 for 10 sec. [Focused Fire] Reduces Cooldown by 4.2% upon a Crit Hit and recovers 150 Mana.
[Wide-area Cannon] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces ATK Spd of the target by 250 for 10 sec. [Focused Fire] Reduces Cooldown by 5% upon a Crit Hit and recovers 150 Mana.
ut.story: A recording device and processor that works as Kara's brain. It's a treasure that is filled with ancient wisdom, and its capacity far surpasses that of humans. Despite being such an incredible device, it has a hard time recording and replicating emotions.

linked.name: Focused Fire
linked.description: Attacks a random target 15 times, inflicting a total of {0} M.DMG, and inflicts Focused Fire for {1} seconds. Inflicts {2} extra M.DMG with each stack of Focused Fire on the enemy. Focused Fire can be stacked up to 30 times.

s3.name: Release Siege Weapon
s3.description: Kara turns into Siege Weapon mode and attacks the enemy, inflicting {0} M.DMG with each hit. When in Siege Weapon mode, changes Anti-personnel Laser and Wide-area Cannon skills to Siege Laser and Focused Fire skills. When the skill is used again, returns to Anti-personnel Weapon mode.
s3.light: Increases DMG by 100% when there is only 1 enemy.
s3.dark: Reduces all skill cooldown by 3% upon a Crit Hit.

ut.name: Ancient Power Source
description: [Release Siege Weapon] Increases DMG by 50% and decreases the target's M.DEF by 1% upon a Crit Hit. M.DEF Reduction Effect can be stacked up to 20 times.
[Release Siege Weapon] Increases DMG by 50% and decreases the target's M.DEF by 1% upon a Crit Hit. M.DEF Reduction Effect can be stacked up to 24 times.
[Release Siege Weapon] Increases DMG by 50% and decreases the target's M.DEF by 1% upon a Crit Hit. M.DEF Reduction Effect can be stacked up to 29 times.
[Release Siege Weapon] Increases DMG by 50% and decreases the target's M.DEF by 1% upon a Crit Hit. M.DEF Reduction Effect can be stacked up to 35 times.
[Release Siege Weapon] Increases DMG by 50% and decreases the target's M.DEF by 1% upon a Crit Hit. M.DEF Reduction Effect can be stacked up to 42 times.
[Release Siege Weapon] Increases DMG by 50% and decreases the target's M.DEF by 1% upon a Crit Hit. M.DEF Reduction Effect can be stacked up to 50 times.
ut.story: Kara's source of power and one of the greatest masterpieces of an ancient civilization that has been long forgotten. It's the basic technology that Annette used to make the Rascal, but not even she has been able to figure out everything about this special technology. A permanent engine that continuously creates unlimited magic power.

s4.name: Essence of Technomagic
s4.description: When in Anti-personnel Weapon mode, increases all DEF by {0} , and when in Siege Weapon mode, increases ATK by {1} , takes {2}% more DMG, and gains Immunity to CC. Recovers {3} MP each time DMG is dealt to an enemy.

books.0: ATK and DEF boosts are increased by {0}%.
books.1: ATK and DEF boosts are increased by {0}%.
books.2: ATK and DEF boosts are increased by {0}%.

s4.light: MP Recovery triples when there is only one enemy.
s4.dark: [Anti-personnel Weapon] - Decreases ATK by 20%, but increases MP Recovery/Sec by 100%. [Siege Weapon] - Decreases all DEF by 60%, but increases Crit DMG by 140%.

t5.dark: [Anti-personnel Weapon] - Increases CC ACC by 400. [Siege Weapon] - Increases ACC by 400.

73.name: Chase
73.subtitle: Type. 0
73.description: A test subject that has lost his past and a berserk warrior who fights wildly with his overflowing power in battle. A powerful weapon that destroys anything that gets in his way.
73.story: A man who has lost his memory. Test subject Type. 0 that was born as a part of the human enhancement experiment of the empire. As the first type of the Project Evil Knights that were only made to kill, Chase was brought through a secretive contract with the empire to assassinate the sole successor to its throne, Scarlet. However, he went berserk for unknown reasons during a fight against Clause and Demia who were guarding Scarlet, and he abandoned his mission and left. He failed to kill Scarlet and disappeared, so the nobles who had commissioned the assassination found themselves in trouble. In the end, they hired another assassination group, the Laughing Mask, to have him killed. However, Scarlet already gave him a name, Chase, and let him stay by her side.
73.like: Scarlet, Demia, Clause, and friends call him by this name
73.dislike: Memory from the past, test subject number.

inn.idle: An unfamiliar atmosphere. Unfamiliar landscapes...

recruit.greet: I don't remember you.
talk: Is there anyone here who knows me?
I definitely know that I've killed a lot of people. But why...? How come?
There was someone who was staring at me today. Could it be... Someone might know me?
recruit.gift: Thank you. That's what I should probably say.

affinity.greet: Hmm...
talk: My name... My own name that they call me by... That's why I'll fight for them.
My name is Chase... Chase... My name is Chase now...
affinity.gift: Can I... Take this...? Really...?

relationship.greet: I don't see her. If I don't find her soon, Demia will be mad.
talk: I felt it with my body. Their power... They probably tried to overpower me without killing me.
She accepted me with such kindness, even though I tried to kill her... She gave me a name... And she stood in front of me...
Demia is scary... Clause is nice, but she's scary sometimes. No matter what, though, she is always kind.

uw.name: Blood Lancer Monolith
description: Increases own Crit DMG by 20%. Upon auto attack, deals P.DMG equal to 30% of ATK with [Flame of Monolith] and recovers HP equal to 20% of DMG dealt. When [Remove Limit] is active, the effect of [Flame of Monolith] is doubled.

Increases own Crit DMG by 24%. Upon auto attack, deals P.DMG equal to 36% of ATK with [Flame of Monolith] and recovers HP equal to 20% of DMG dealt. When [Remove Limit] is active, the effect of [Flame of Monolith] is doubled.

Increases own Crit DMG by 28%. Upon auto attack, deals P.DMG equal to 43% of ATK with [Flame of Monolith] and recovers HP equal to 20% of DMG dealt. When [Remove Limit] is active, the effect of [Flame of Monolith] is doubled.

Increases own Crit DMG by 34%. Upon auto attack, deals P.DMG equal to 52% of ATK with [Flame of Monolith] and recovers HP equal to 20% of DMG dealt. When [Remove Limit] is active, the effect of [Flame of Monolith] is doubled.

Increases own Crit DMG by 42%. Upon auto attack, deals P.DMG equal to 62% of ATK with [Flame of Monolith] and recovers HP equal to 20% of DMG dealt. When [Remove Limit] is active, the effect of [Flame of Monolith] is doubled.

Increases own Crit DMG by 50%. Upon auto attack, deals P.DMG equal to 75% of ATK with [Flame of Monolith] and recovers HP equal to 20% of DMG dealt. When [Remove Limit] is active, the effect of [Flame of Monolith] is doubled.
uw.story: A weapon for Enhanced Human Type. 0 that was made after thousands of attempts in one of the laboratories of the empire. Enhanced Human Type. 0 destroyed everything as soon as he woke up from the laboratory in order to find a weapon that could withstand his power. In the end, he tore out the horn of the monster Cannibal, which was known to have swallowed Arrogance out of the 7 sins. This horn went through the hands of the greatest blacksmiths of the empire and became the Blood Lancer Monolith. The flame of sin is burning inside the weapon, and whatever it pierces cannot be healed. The feeling of striking with this weapon is pleasurable enough to make him forget about the lingering attachment to his lost memory.

s1.name: I'll Break You!
s1.description: Prevents the target from receiving positive effects for 4 seconds, and attacks to inflict {0} P.DMG and knocks the target back. Inflicts {1} P.DMG after 1 second to enemies around the target and stuns them for {2} seconds.
s1.light: Reduces Mana Cost by 1.
s1.dark: The inflicted target takes 25% more P.DMG for 10 seconds.

s2.name: Remove Limit
s2.description: Upon activation, [Remove Limit] takes effects. When activated, consumes {0}% of current HP to remove all negative effects on self and deals {1} P.DMG to nearby enemies in range. While [Remove Limit] is activated, consumes {2}% of current HP every 1 second, gains Immunity to CC, and increases Crit DMG by {3}% and ATK Spd by {4}. HP consumption and the increase in Crit DMG and ATK Spd grow larger as time passes. This effect cannot be dispelled, and is automatically deactivated when HP is under 25%.
s2.light: Enemies hit are stunned for 2 sec.
s2.dark: HP consumption per sec is increased by 100% and ATK Spd, Crit DMG boost is doubled.

ut.name: Handkerchief of Loyalty
description: [Remove Limit] For the skill's duration, deals P.DMG by 40% ATK every second to nearby enemies and increases Recovery by 30%.
[Remove Limit] For the skill's duration, deals P.DMG by 48% ATK every second to nearby enemies and increases Recovery by 30%.
[Remove Limit] For the skill's duration, deals P.DMG by 58% ATK every second to nearby enemies and increases Recovery by 30%.
[Remove Limit] For the skill's duration, deals P.DMG by 70% ATK every second to nearby enemies and increases Recovery by 30%.
[Remove Limit] For the skill's duration, deals P.DMG by 84% ATK every second to nearby enemies and increases Recovery by 30%.
[Remove Limit] For the skill's duration, deals P.DMG by 100% ATK every second to nearby enemies and increases Recovery by 30%.
ut.story: An item given to Chase by Scarlet. She gave it to him because she felt sorry for him for not having a name. Chase's name is embroidered in one corner of the handkerchief. It doesn't really match his look, but he carries it all the time. Chase lost his memory and could only figure out who he was by the test subject code marked on his waist. The moment when someone called him by a name was when he finally found a goal in life. He decided to use his overflowing power to protect those who made him feel alive.

s3.name: Burn, Spear of Fury
s3.description: Charges at an enemy, inflicting {0} P.DMG and knocking it down, and explodes the ground around self to attack 4 times, dealing a total of {1} P.DMG and inflicting Stun for {2} seconds. Recovers HP equal to {3}% of DMG.
s3.light: Gains Immunity to CC while in use.
s3.dark: Increases the Stun duration by 1 second.

ut.name: Unrelenting Pauldron
description: [Burn, Spear of Fury] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 20%.
[Burn, Spear of Fury] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 24%.
[Burn, Spear of Fury] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 29%.
[Burn, Spear of Fury] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 35%.
[Burn, Spear of Fury] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 42%.
[Burn, Spear of Fury] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 50%.
ut.story: Pauldron that Chase wears on one shoulder. It is made up of special ores that are hard to find in the Orbis Continent. It's light but extremely sturdy and unbreakable. An item that Demia managed to get for Chase, since Scarlet was fond of him. Demia didn't show it much, but she was intrigued by how Chase normally seemed so naive, and yet was so enthusiastic when it came to sparring. Demia watched him for a few days, and one day, patting his shoulder, she nonchalantly gave Chase the pauldron. She told him that fighting was important, but it was also important to take care of his own body.

s4.name: Remember This in Hell
s4.description: Not affected by Lifesteal stats. Instead, increases Max HP by {0} , Crit by {1} , CC ACC by {2} , and ACC by {3}. If receiving damage that leads to death, resurrects for {4} seconds, with increased Crit DMG by {5}%, and increased ATK Spd by {6}. The resurrection effect is only activated once per battle, and the resurrected Chase cannot use skills.
s4.light: Upon the activation of resurrection, increases ATK by 50%.
s4.dark: Upon the activation of resurrection, knocks back nearby enemies in range for 3 seconds.

t5.dark: Per every 1% of HP lost, Crit DMG is increased by 1% and ATK Spd is increased by 4.

90.name: May
90.subtitle: The Girl Dreaming of Riches
90.description: The bright girl running a General Store at the Capital of Orvel. It is impossible to dislike this energetic, positive girl. She takes out all sorts of useful items from her basket, helping her allies.
90.story: A girl who runs her own General Shop at the Orvel Castle. She is highly likable, and treats everyone with brightness and enthusiasm. Dreaming of one day she'll become the wealthiest merchant in Orvel, May usually hunts and gathers her own merchandise. Because of the effort she puts into acquiring her goods, her prices aren't exactly cheap, and people often criticize her for this. Currently, she is preparing to travel to Aegina Desert after hearing that someone recently discovered a treasure there.

inn.idle: Hmm... Juno's dishes are best...! This will sell like hotcakes!

affinity.greet: Ah! Welcome, customer! Oh, wait, this was the Inn...
talk: You will visit my shop too, right?
Juno's food is the best!
affinity.gift: Hehehe, thank you!

relationship.greet: I've been working hard every day to become the richest girl in Orvel!
talk: Today, I'm thinking of traveling all the way to Central Elidora to pick up some new items!
Lately, I've picked up making clothes as a hobby. If I get the chance, I'll make something for you too.
Do you know that there was treasure found in the Aegina Desert?

uw.name: The Box of Fragrance, Etelia
description: Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 10%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 12%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 14%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 17%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 20%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 25%.
uw.story: A curious basket always carried by May whenever she goes hunting for new materials. This mysterious basket contains an infinite amount of space, and turns anything that enters it weightless. This allows May to bring back a ridiculous number of items from a single trip. At a quick glance, it might as well be filled with picnic foods. However, rumors claim that, whenever she takes it to her hunting trips, she packs it with......Other questionable things. Or so they say.

s1.name: Take anything!
s1.description: All allies' ATK is increased by {0} for 60 sec, and randomly grants one of the following effects: 1. DEF Penetration {1} up, 2. Atk Spd {2} up, 3. Instant Mana recovery by {3}. All effects other than Mana Recovery can be stacked up to 5 times max.
s1.light: All effects are not dispelled by 'dispel positive effect' effect.
s1.dark: All effects can be stacked max 7 times.

s2.name: Cheer up!
s2.description: All allies' HP is healed by {0} , and per each sec, each ally recovers {1}% of their max HP for 10 sec. There is a 10% chance the heal rate doubles.
s2.light: Increases ally CC Resist by 250 for 10 sec.
s2.dark: There is a 15% chance to recover 1 orb of mana.

ut.name: Sweet Piece of Cake
description: [Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 20% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
[Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 24% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
[Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 29% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
[Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 35% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
[Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 42% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
[Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
ut.story: Special cake made by Juno. Its smells very sweet. May loves it as a snack. No one knows why she doesn't tell anyone what she put in it.

s3.name: Not for sale!
s3.description: Attacks a random target and other enemies in range 3 times, dealing a total of {0} M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 4 sec. There is a 10% chance that the skill range, DMG, and Stun duration are doubled.
s3.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s3.dark: All attacks will be focused on a single enemy.

ut.name: Crystal Ball from Unknown Origin
description: [Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 20% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 24% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 29% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 35% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 42% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 50% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
ut.story: During the days of the ancient civilization, someone stole the spells of the sages and gathered their power in a single crystal ball. It seems like it was part of a plan to become the greatest shaman at the time. But there are no historic records of this crystal ball, and it was found far away from the village, near Eden River. Different elemental spells are mixed up in one place, making it dangerous, so it's unknown how its powers will be released.

s4.name: Take this!
s4.description: Every 15 sec, deals {0} M.DMG to 4 random enemies, and randomly inflicts one of the following: 1. {1} M.DMG over time for 10 sec, 2. Stun for 2 sec, 3. Freeze for 5 sec
s4.light: Activates every 12 sec.
s4.dark: Increases target M.DMG taken by 25%.

t5.dark: Each auto-attack has a 30% chance of healing the ally with the lowest HP by 3% of their HP. Also provides 5% mana to the ally.

91.name: Gladi
91.subtitle: Beast of the Arena
91.description: The man who conquered the Arena of Orvel. People feared him for his battle prowess and began calling him the Beast of the Arena. His amazing combat technique destroys his enemies in split seconds.
91.story: The man who conquered the Orvel Arena. Sitting on the throne of the champion, he is often feared by others. People refer to him as Beast Fist. However, he is actually a cheerful man with a positive and straightforward personality. As reflected by his fighting style, he is a bold man who does not hesitate to act upon his will. After his conquest, Gladi requested the right to run an Arena Shop. Supposedly, his real goal was to gain a monopoly on silvervines. It still remains a mystery as to who will actually buy these plants, but he seems happy enough. Curiously enough, he's currently not even selling any silvervines.

inn.idle: Hmm, I can still smell the silvervine...

affinity.greet: Huh? Hey, how's it going?
talk: This Silver Vine, you know...wow, it smells really good...hahaha!!
Hey! It's kinda funny, seeing you outside of the arena!
affinity.gift: Whew! You're quite the nice guy, eh?

relationship.greet: Hey, you! Come and sit here already!
talk: Haha! That moment, when my fist crushed my opponent - that was great!
I'm fast and strong, even by the standards of our tribe. I wonder how they're doing?
You're curious why I buy all this Silver Vine even when nobody buys it from me? Well, it's all for personal use!

uw.name: Beast Fist, Mastra
description: Upon a Crit Hit, Crit. DMG is increased by 20% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 7 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, Crit. DMG is increased by 24% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 7 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, Crit. DMG is increased by 29% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 7 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, Crit. DMG is increased by 35% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 7 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, Crit. DMG is increased by 42% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 7 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, Crit. DMG is increased by 50% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked up to 7 times max.
uw.story: A pair of gauntlets custom forged for Gladi. They are the proof of his winning the championship at the Orvel Arena. Supposedly, these were crafted from a legendary pair of gauntlets used by a man who was known as the War God hundreds of years ago. These gauntlets, specialized for smashing the opponent, greatly enhance the power of their wearer. However, the physical cost of using them is brutal, and no normal person can handle them. Unless the wearer is incredibly flexible, and physically capable of withstanding the impact of each blow, using them is almost suicidal. Nevertheless, Gladi's natural strength and flexibility allow him to use them freely.

s1.name: Quick Strikes
s1.description: Strikes the target 7 times, dealing a total of {0} P.DMG. The last hit increases the target's P.DMG taken by {1}% for 10 sec.
s1.light: When there is 1 enemy, DMG is boosted by 100%.
s1.dark: P.DMG taken increase effect amount is changed to 50%.

s2.name: Advent of the War God
s2.description: Dispel all negative effects on self and deal {0} P.DMG to nearby enemies within a small radius, gaining the Status 'War God' for 10 sec. While in War God mode, ATK is boosted by {1} and all auto attacks have a 30% chance to consume 5% mana to deal an extra attack of {2} extra P.DMG. Upon taking M.DMG, dodge all M.DMG for 1 sec. Dodge effect only activates 1 time in every 2 sec.

books.0: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%
books.1: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%
books.2: ATK boost and DMG is increased by {0}%

s2.light: War God state lasts 5 seconds longer.
s2.dark: Additional DMG hit chance rises by 20%.

ut.name: Silvervine Box
description: [Advent of the War God] For the skill's duration, recovers 100 MP every second and stacks 1 [This will hurt!] upon inflicting additional P.DMG.
[Advent of the War God] For the skill's duration, recovers 120 MP every second and stacks 1 [This will hurt!] upon inflicting additional P.DMG.
[Advent of the War God] For the skill's duration, recovers 140 MP every second and stacks 1 [This will hurt!] upon inflicting additional P.DMG.
[Advent of the War God] For the skill's duration, recovers 170 MP every second and stacks 1 [This will hurt!] upon inflicting additional P.DMG.
[Advent of the War God] For the skill's duration, recovers 210 MP every second and stacks 1 [This will hurt!] upon inflicting additional P.DMG.
[Advent of the War God] For the skill's duration, recovers 250 MP every second and stacks 1 [This will hurt!] upon inflicting additional P.DMG.
ut.story: Silvervine is used to exponentially boost physical ability. Nothing else, but this silvervine. Others may try chewing silvervine, drink it, boil it, but it won't work. Gladi just needs this silvervine to have the effect of the War God.

s3.name: Ultimate Punch!
s3.description: Charges energy and sprints toward frontal enemies, dealing {0} P.DMG to enemies in range and inflicting stun for 3 sec. If the target is a boss, attack ignores target DEF.
s3.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Champion's Laurel Wreath
description: [Ultimate Punch!] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and per each activation DMG is increased by 4%. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.

ut.story: Wreath given to the strongest warrior of Orbis Continent. It's only given to the winner of the fighting tournament that happens every 4 years. Those who wear this wreath are said to be able to borrow the strength of the War God.

92.name: Veronica
92.subtitle: The Eye of Discernment
92.description: She is the genius from the Tower of Sage who reestablished the formula for Rune Magic. Currently, she is Orvel's financier and the Chief Guild Officer that directs all guilds. Her strong analytical skills and Rune Magic can shackle her enemies.
92.story: A genius scholar from the Tower of Sage who remembers everything she sees. After developing her own theories and systems of Rune Magic, she quickly grew bored and moved onto a different subject. Soon, she was appointed as the highest ranking royal secretary of finance. Unfortunately, many politicians refused to accept a commoner as their superior. After many lies and ill rumors, Veronica eventually decided to leave the palace on her own. But this was hardly a defeat for her, and she soon set out to conquer a new path. She headed to the Orvel Guild Alliance, where she would be measured only by her abilities and nothing else. As expected, her incredible perception and analytical skills made her an indispensable asset to numerous guilds.
92.like: Smart people, fast results, clean documents

inn.idle: Hmm, it's been a while since I just sat back and relaxed.

affinity.greet: I hope you will continue to take care of the evil beasts that continue to attack Orvel.
talk: Rune magic? Hmm, I've learned some at the Tower of Sages. I do also know some Ancient Runes...
Guild management isn't easy. There are way too many guilds...
affinity.gift: Oh, you didn't need to...haah. Well, I thankfully accept.

relationship.greet: I haven't been here in a while...it feels close, and yet so far.
talk: How are your guild activities going? I will help the best I can.
I do want to help more, but it isn't easy. I will try harder.
Fufu, I wonder if I can help you on your next raid.

uw.name: Infinite Charter, Accordio
description: All DMG from skills inflicts an additional M.DMG by 50% of ATK. Additionally, the Top Financier's Knowledge max stack increases to 9.
All DMG from skills inflicts an additional M.DMG by 60% of ATK. Additionally, the Top Financier's Knowledge max stack increases to 10.
All DMG from skills inflicts an additional M.DMG by 70% of ATK. Additionally, the Top Financier's Knowledge max stack increases to 11.
All DMG from skills inflicts an additional M.DMG by 85% of ATK. Additionally, the Top Financier's Knowledge max stack increases to 12.
All DMG from skills inflicts an additional M.DMG by 100% of ATK. Additionally, the Top Financier's Knowledge max stack increases to 13.
All DMG from skills inflicts an additional M.DMG by 125% of ATK. Additionally, the Top Financier's Knowledge max stack increases to 15.
uw.story: Her approval is needed to process any important items in the Guild Alliance. An office item cherished by the founder of the Guild Alliance. A feather pen and folder put together in a set. The pen has a mana ball embedded in it so it requires mana instead of ink, and it must be used on a magic parchment that cannot be written on with a regular pen. The letters that are written by the writer cannot be erased without the writer's mana. Also, text can be written on the magic parchment without any limit, and it has a function to search for stuff one has written before. It makes Veronica's work that much more effective. Of course, it's useful when it's used for work, but outside of work...

s1.light: DMG is increased by 100% when there is 1 enemy.
s1.dark: Number of targets changes to 2.

s2.dark: Reduces cooldown by 5 sec.

ut.story: Pen point that Veronica always carries around. She had soaked it in the Spring of Promise for 100 days, just like Blacksmith Jin had advised. With the power of magic, the letters written by this pen turn red when the actions are not carried out accordingly. Veronica says it's very helpful when managing supplies.

s3.dark: Target takes increased M.DMG and P.DMG.

ut.story: A seal given to the best guild manager of Orvel. All guild affairs can't be processed without this seal. The meticulous Veronica doesn't stamp a document unless it's perfect. An item that shows Veronica's professional spirit.

s4.name: Top Financier's Knowledge
s4.description: All Allies' ATK is increased by {0} , and upon using the skill 3 times, instantly gains The Top Financier's Knowledge. Per each stack of Top Financier's Knowledge, own Crit DMG is increased by 30%, and all skill effects are increased by 10% each. Top Financier's Knowledge can be stacked up to max 5 times, and cannot be dispelled.
s4.light: Recovers the caster's MP by 2 orbs when activated.
s4.dark: When activated, increases the caster's ATK by 50% for 10 sec.

t5.dark: Reduces the cooldown of the caster's all skills by 15% every 20 sec.

93.name: Loman
93.subtitle: The Gatekeeper of Trust
93.description: The Gatekeeper of the Orvel Monarchy. Without royal permission, no one can even get one step past Loman. The great power from his halberd forces his enemies to kneel before him.
93.story: If one were to choose the most trustworthy among the Guardian Knights, Loman's name would be one of the first to come to mind. The royal family trusts him so much that they appointed Loman as the Gatekeeper of the Orvel Monarchy. He is usually a gentle and friendly man, but becomes uncompromising when anyone tries to approach his king without royal permission. No one who has seen his halberd, the one bestowed by Scarlet, split the air has ever returned alive. While off duty, however, he is a sensitive man who enjoys wood carving as a hobby.

inn.idle: I just came out during my break. This is a very nice place. I should drop by more often.

affinity.greet: Come on in. I was working on one of my wood carvings just now, would you like to take a look?
talk: My family has guarded the Orvel Monarchy for centuries. When I came to the castle, my father gave me our family heirloom.
This halberd seems to be pretty special. I asked Jin, and he told me that it holds the essence of some ancient divine beast.
affinity.gift: What? I must tell you, I won't open the vault or labyrinth for you. Ha ha.

relationship.greet: Guarding the monarchy is an important and solemn duty, but sometimes I feel a little jealous of my colleagues since they can come and go as they place.
talk: I'll do all I can to repay Her Highness for the trust she has in me.
Wood carving is an old hobby of mine. Before I realized it, my room became crammed with my woodwork. Haha.
I saw someone with long hair, just shouting cheers all day long. I can see a lot of funny people who live their lives their own way.

uw.name: Wave of Protection, Gaiamenes
description: Pride of Orvelia' is stacked on every use of skills. 'Pride of Orvelia' cannot be dispelled, and when stacked 3 times, 'Blessing of Orvelia' is activated, dealing 200% of ATK as P.DMG to enemies within a wide range and increasing P.Weakness of the targets by 25% for 20 seconds. 'Blessing of Orvelia' also increases M.DEF by 10% for 10 seconds.

Pride of Orvelia' is stacked on every use of skills. 'Pride of Orvelia' cannot be dispelled, and when stacked 3 times, 'Blessing of Orvelia' is activated, dealing 240% of ATK as P.DMG to enemies within a wide range and increasing P.Weakness of the targets by 30% for 20 seconds. 'Blessing of Orvelia' also increases M.DEF by 12% for 10 seconds.

Pride of Orvelia' is stacked on every use of skills. 'Pride of Orvelia' cannot be dispelled, and when stacked 3 times, 'Blessing of Orvelia' is activated, dealing 290% of ATK as P.DMG to enemies within a wide range and increasing P.Weakness of the targets by 36% for 20 seconds. 'Blessing of Orvelia' also increases M.DEF by 14% for 10 seconds.

Pride of Orvelia' is stacked on every use of skills. 'Pride of Orvelia' cannot be dispelled, and when stacked 3 times, 'Blessing of Orvelia' is activated, dealing 350% of ATK as P.DMG to enemies within a wide range and increasing P.Weakness of the targets by 43% for 20 seconds. 'Blessing of Orvelia' also increases M.DEF by 17% for 10 seconds.

Pride of Orvelia' is stacked on every use of skills. 'Pride of Orvelia' cannot be dispelled, and when stacked 3 times, 'Blessing of Orvelia' is activated, dealing 420% of ATK as P.DMG to enemies within a wide range and increasing P.Weakness of the targets by 51% for 20 seconds. 'Blessing of Orvelia' also increases M.DEF by 21% for 10 seconds.

Pride of Orvelia' is stacked on every use of skills. 'Pride of Orvelia' cannot be dispelled, and when stacked 3 times, 'Blessing of Orvelia' is activated, dealing 500% of ATK as P.DMG to enemies within a wide range and increasing P.Weakness of the targets by 60% for 20 seconds. 'Blessing of Orvelia' also increases M.DEF by 25% for 10 seconds.
uw.story: The halberd held by an ancient guardian statue defending the gate of the labyrinth that was recently discovered at the Royal Underground. The old, eroded statue was holding the halberd firmly in its hands, as if showing its determination to protect the labyrinth against intruders. Loman, who was in charge of the labyrinth excavation, felt something indescribably sublime from the statue and showed due courtesy in front of it. At that moment, the statue dropped its halberd to the ground and began to crumble away. The halberd itself seemed unaffected by time and was imbued with a mysterious energy. 'That statue suddenly crumbled and dropped the halberd...' Scarlet said, glancing over the report. 'Yes, ma'am.' Scarlet then gazed at Loman. 'The unyielding sincerity of protecting a place until his very body collapses... I know a man like that.' 'Pardon, ma'am?' He looked at Scarlet with a puzzled face as she handed over the halberd, smiling.

ut.story: Loman used to carve small sculptures as big as his hand while sorting out his thoughts when things went wrong. As he smoothed out their edges, he'd feel at peace, recalling how he was when he was just learning the basics. It was just a pastime at first, but soon it became his hobby, a passion that filled his room with hundreds of sculptures. And one day, Loman started to make wooden dolls to give to his friends and his men. Back then, sorcerous dolls known to protect hearts from evil were popular in Orvelia. Loman asked an old shaman who practiced ancient folk remedies to enchant his wooden dolls with a spell of protection, and he gave them to his colleagues.

s3.name: Knight's Creed
s3.description: Hits frontal enemies within range 3 times. First 2 hits deal {0} P.DMG and stun enemies for {1} second(s) while the last hit attacks enemies in wider range 2 times, dealing {2} P.DMG in total. The last hit stuns enemies for 5 seconds and leaves [Mark of Creed] on the enemies, damaging them for {3} second(s). Targets with [Mark of Creed] take additional {4} P.DMG from allies excluding caster. Additional DMG effect is activated only once every {5} second(s).
s3.light: When there is 1 enemy, DMG is boosted by 100%.
s3.dark: While in use, gains immunity to CC.

ut.story: An heirloom of Loman's family, this special pendant is bestowed by the first King of Orvelia to Loman's family in honor of their service and loyalty to protect the Orvel Monarchy. Its true origin is unknown, but it is believed to be an accessory that has the spirit of the Guardian of Orbis Continent from an ancient civilization. The owners of this item have said the same thing. When they resolve to stake their lives to defend what is important to them, they invoke a mighty power like the waves of the sea. People now believe this blue gem invokes spirits, and it started to be called the Sea of Invocation. Loman received it as an heirloom from his father when he entered the castle, and he always keeps it with him.

s4.name: The Last Gatekeeper
s4.description: Stacks [Endurance] every second. [Endurance] cannot be dispelled, and when stacked {0} times, deals {1} P.DMG, ignoring DEF on nearby enemies and reduces ATK of affected enemies by 20% for {2} second(s). A successful block grants 1 additional [Endurance] stack. This effect is activated only once every {3} second(s).
s4.light: Increases the number of 'Endurance' stacked every second by 1.
s4.dark: Decreases ATK Spd of the affected enemy by 200 for 10 sec.

t5.dark: Upon successfully blocking M.DMG, all allies have their M.Block increased by 200 and M.DEF by 10% of Loman's M.DEF for 5 sec. This effect is activated only once every 5 seconds.

94.name: Juno
94.subtitle: The Chef of Heroes
94.description: One of the best cooks in Orvel. From casual bites to luxury dishes, her culinary skills seem to cover it all. Her food heals the body and fills the heart with courage.
94.story: She's an ordinary young lady from the town, but her culinary skills are Orvel's finest. From the plain, wholesome food of the common people to the luxurious delicacies of the nobility, there isn't a dish she cannot cook. She once received an offer to work as the Royal Chef, but she refused it and opened an inn to let everyone enjoy her dishes. Her inn soon became one of the most famous attractions in Orvel, visited by countless adventurers. Now people call her inn 'the Hero's Inn,' and she's enjoying her life among the 'heroes.'
94.like: Eating, cooking, people who enjoy her dishes

inn.idle: Welcome! It's break time, though...

affinity.greet: Come on in! What would you like to have today?
talk: Just tell me what you want, and I'll cook it right away!
I have seen so many adventurers, but you strike me as different somehow.
affinity.gift: Oh, a tip? Heh heh, thank you.

relationship.greet: Have you eaten yet? If not, I can recommend a dish!
talk: Hot spring eggs tastes amazing! It's also one of my favorite simple dishes!
Business is good these days. I feel great!
A lot of customers, right? All thanks to you know who, Hahaha.

uw.name: Hundred-Flavor Banquet, Tempora Fyrr
description: Every 10 sec, gains 1 stack of [Excellent Ingredient] and recovers 1 orb of Mana.
Every 9 sec, gains 1 stack of [Excellent Ingredient] and recovers 1 orb of Mana.
Every 8 sec, gains 1 stack of [Excellent Ingredient] and recovers 1 orb of Mana.

Every 5 sec, gains 1 stack of [Excellent Ingredient] and recovers 1 orb of Mana.
uw.story: A magical pot known to have been used by a legendary chef in the distant past. It is made with magical metal that even Blacksmith Jin hasn't ever seen before. It has the effects of boosting the taste and aroma of the food, maximizing the natural quality of ingredients. It is such a rare treasure, but it is seldom used by its owner, Juno. As she has great pride in her culinary skills, people assume that she does not like to reply upon such magical artifacts. As a result, the most precious treasure in the culinary world is now merely a decoration in Juno's inn. When the day comes that she decides to use it, however, the world will witness a whole new level of cooking.

ut.story: A jar that Juno in her naive days bought at a rip-off price from a suspicious merchant. The merchant told her that the jar was able to turn plain water into magical broth. He managed to demonstrate the process with his nimble hands, and successfully made her fall for it. What he didn't know, however, was that the Jar would actually become a true Jar of Happiness through Juno's amazing culinary skills. With greatly improved Juno's culinary skills and the addition of Juno's Special Seasoning, an improved version of the magical broth powder that the merchant used, the jar is now one of the most important kitchen tools in Juno's inn, producing top-notch dishes.

linked.name: Help Yourself, Then Get Lost!

When the skill is used again, transforms into a Cook from Heaven.

s3.dark: Recovers 1 orb of Mana upon use.

ut.story: - Here is your order, Juno's Special! No one takes the banner in front her inn that says 'Excellent Taste! Quality Guaranteed!' seriously until they put the food in their mouths. There are very few words that do Juno's food justice. When she was asked what her secret was, she smiled and answered, - It's Juno's Special Seasoning!
